atk-s0305a:4_0: 1-2. Mahāvaggassa paṭhame pubbaṅgamāti sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti dvīhākārehi
atk-s0305a:4_1: pubbaṅgamā. Samāpattiyāti samāpajjanāya sabhāvapaṭilābhāya, uppattiyāti attho. Anvadeva
atk-s0305a:4_2: ahirikaṃ anottappanti sā panesā yadetaṃ alajjanākārasaṇṭhikaṃ ahirikaṃ, abhāyanākārasaṇṭhitañca
atk-s0305a:4_3: anottappaṃ, etaṃ anudeva saheva ekatova, na vinā tena uppajjatīti attho. Avijjāgatassāti
atk-s0305a:4_4: avijjāya upagatassa samannāgatassa. Micchādiṭṭhīti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi aniyyānikadiṭṭhi.
atk-s0305a:4_5: Pahotīti hoti uppajjati. Micchāsaṅkappādīsupi ayāthāvaaniyyānikavaseneva micchābhāvo
atk-s0305a:4_6: veditabbo. Iti imāni aṭṭhapi akusaladhammasamāpattiyā micchattaaṅgāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:4_7: Tāni pana na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti, nānakkhaṇe labbhanti.
atk-s0305a:5_0: Kathaṃ? Yadā hi diṭṭhisampayuttacittaṃ kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ uppajjati, tadā
atk-s0305a:5_1: micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchākammantoti
atk-s0305a:5_2: cha aṅgāni honti. Yadā diṭṭhivippayuttaṃ, tadā micchādiṭṭhivajjāni pañca. Yadā tāneva
atk-s0305a:5_3: dve vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, tadā micchākammantaṭṭhāne micchāvācāya saddhiṃ tāneva
atk-s0305a:5_4: cha vā pañca vā. Ayaṃ ājīvo nāma kuppamāno kāyavacīdvāresuyeva aññatarasmiṃ kuppati,
atk-s0305a:5_5: na manodvāre. Tasmā yadā ājīvasīsena tāneva cittāni kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0305a:5_6: tadā kāyakammaṃ micchājīvo nāma hoti, tathā vacīkammanti micchājīvassa vasena tāneva
atk-s0305a:5_7: cha vā pañca vā. Yadā pana viññattiṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvā tāni cittāni uppajjanti, tadā
atk-s0305a:5_9: cattāri vā hontīti evaṃ na ekakkhaṇe sabbāni labbhanti, nānakkhaṇe labbhantīti.
atk-s0305a:6_0: Sukkapakkhe vijjāti kammassakatañāṇaṃ. Ihāpi sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena cāti
atk-s0305a:6_1: dvīhākārehi pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā. Hirottappanti hirī ca ottappañca. Tattha lajjanākārasaṇṭhitā
atk-s0305a:6_2: hirī, bhāyanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
atk-s0305a:6_3: vuttova. Vijjāgatassāti vijjāya upagatassa samannāgatassa. Viddasunoti viduno paṇḍitassa.
atk-s0305a:6_4: Sammādiṭṭhīti yāthāvadiṭṭhi niyyānikadiṭṭhi. Sammākammantādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti
atk-s0305a:6_5: kusaladhammasamāpattiyā imāni aṭṭhaṅgāni honti, tāni lokiyamaggakkhaṇe na ekato sabbāni
atk-s0305a:6_6: labbhanti, lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana labbhanti. Tāni ca kho paṭhamajjhānikamagge,
atk-s0305a:7_0: Tattha yo evaṃ vadeyya “yasmā majjhimanikāyamhi mahāsaḷāyatanikasutte ‘yā tathābhūtassa
atk-s0305a:7_1: diṭṭhi, sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi. Yo tathābhūtassa, saṅkappo, svāssa hoti sammāsaṅkappo.
atk-s0305a:7_2: Yo tathābhūtassa vāyāmo, svāssa hoti sammāvāyāmo. Yā tathābhūtassa sati, svāssa hoti
atk-s0305a:7_3: sammāsati. Yo tathābhūtassa samādhi, svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi. Pubbeva kho panassa
atk-s0305a:7_4: kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho’ti vuttaṃ tasmā pañcaṅgikopi lokuttaramaggo
atk-s0305a:7_5: hotī”ti so vattabbo – tasmiṃyeva sutte “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
atk-s0305a:7_6: gacchatī”ti idaṃ kasmā na passasi? Yaṃ panetaṃ “pubbeva kho panassā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0305a:7_8: hi parisuddhāni kāyakammādīni lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe atiparisuddhāni hontīti ayamattho dīpito.
atk-s0305a:8_0: Yampi abhidhamme vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī”ti, taṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0305a:8_1: kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmiñhi kāle micchākammantaṃ pahāya sammākammantaṃ
atk-s0305a:8_2: pūreti, tasmiṃ kāle micchāvācā vā micchājīvo vā na hoti, diṭṭhi saṅkappo vāyāmo sati
atk-s0305a:8_3: samādhīti imesuyeva pañcasu kārakaṅgesu sammākammanto pūrati. Virativasena hi sammākammanto
atk-s0305a:8_4: pūrati nāma. Sammāvācāsammāājīvesupi eseva nayo. Iti imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ
atk-s0305a:8_5: vuttaṃ. Lokiyamaggakkhaṇe ca pañceva honti, virati pana aniyatā. Tasmā “chaaṅgiko”ti
atk-s0305a:8_6: avatvā “pañcaṅgiko”tveva vuttaṃ. “Yā ca, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa
atk-s0305a:8_7: ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṃ bhāvayato tīhi kāyaduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati
atk-s0305a:8_8: veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ, ayaṃ bhikkhave sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaramaggo”ti.
atk-s0305a:8_9: Evaṃ pana mahācattālīsakasuttādīsu anekesu suttesu sammākammantādīnañca lokuttaramaggassa
atk-s0305a:8_10: aṅgabhāvasiddhito aṭṭhaṅgikova lokuttaramaggo hotīti veditabboti. Imasmiṃ sutte ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:8_11: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo lokiyalokuttaramissakova kathito. Dutiyaṃ kosalasaṃyutte vuttameva.
atk-s0305a:10_0: 3. Tatiye sakalamidaṃ bhanteti ānandatthero sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ appattatāya
atk-s0305a:10_1: sakalampi maggabrahmacariyaṃ kalyāṇamittasannissayena labbhatīti na aññāsi, dhammasenāpati
atk-s0305a:10_2: pana sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthake ṭhitattā aññāsi, tasmā evamāha. Tenevassa bhagavā
atk-s0305a:12_0: 4. Catutthe sabbasetena vaḷavābhirathenāti sakalasetena catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathena.
atk-s0305a:12_1: So kira sabbo sacakkapañjarakubbaro rajataparikkhitto hoti. Ratho ca nāmesa duvidho
atk-s0305a:12_2: hoti – yodharatho, alaṅkārarathoti. Tattha yodharatho caturassasaṇṭhāno hoti nātimahā
atk-s0305a:12_3: dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā janānaṃ gahaṇasamattho. Alaṅkāraratho mahā hoti dīghato dīgho puthulato
atk-s0305a:12_4: puthulo ca, tattha chattaggāhako vālabījaniggāhako tālavaṇṭaggāhakoti evaṃ aṭṭha
atk-s0305a:12_5: vā dasa vā sukheneva ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā sakkonti. Ayampi alaṅkārarathoyeva.
atk-s0305a:13_0: Setā sudaṃ assāti tā vaḷavā pakatiyā setavaṇṇāva. Setālaṅkārāti pasādhanaṃ tāsaṃ
atk-s0305a:13_1: rajatamayaṃ ahosi. Seto rathoti rathopi vuttanayeneva rajataparikkhittattā tattha
atk-s0305a:13_2: tattha dantakammakhacitattā ca setova. Setaparivāroti yathā aññe rathā sīhacammaparivārāpi
atk-s0305a:13_3: honti, byagghacammaparivārāpi paṇḍukambalaparivārāpi honti, na evaṃ esa. Esa pana
atk-s0305a:13_4: ghanadukūlena parivārito ahosi. Setā rasmiyoti rasmiyopi rajatapanāḷisuparikkhittā.
atk-s0305a:14_0: Setaṃ chattanti rathamajjhe ussāpitachattampi setameva ahosi. Setaṃ uṇhīsanti aṭṭhaṅgulavitthāro
atk-s0305a:14_1: rajatamayo uṇhīsapaṭṭo seto. Setāni vatthānīti vatthānipi setāni pheṇapuñjavaṇṇāni.
atk-s0305a:14_2: Tesu nivāsanaṃ pañcasatagghanakaṃ, uttarāsaṅgo sahassagghanako. Setā upāhanāti upāhanā
atk-s0305a:14_3: nāma maggāruḷhassa vā honti aṭaviṃ vā pavisantassa. Ayaṃ pana rathaṃ abhiruḷho, tenassa
atk-s0305a:14_4: tadanucchaviko rajatapaṭisevito pādālaṅkāro nāma esa evaṃ vuttoti veditabbo. Setāya
atk-s0305a:14_5: sudaṃ vālabījaniyāti phalikamayadaṇḍāya setacamaravālabījaniyā. Na kevalañca ettakamevassa
atk-s0305a:14_6: setaṃ ahosi, so pana brāhmaṇo setavilepanaṃ vilimpi, setamālaṃ piḷandhi, dasasu aṅgulīsu
atk-s0305a:14_7: aṅgulimuddikā kaṇṇesu kuṇḍalānīti evamādi alaṅkāropissa rajatamayova ahosi. Parivārabrāhmaṇāpissa
atk-s0305a:15_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ sāvatthiyā niyyāyantanti vuttaṃ, tatrāyaṃ niyyāyanavibhāvanā – so kira
atk-s0305a:15_1: channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti – “ito ettakehi divasehi
atk-s0305a:15_2: nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karissatī”ti puretarameva ghosanā kayirati. Taṃ sutvā ye nagarato
atk-s0305a:15_3: na pakkantā, te na pakkamanti. Yepi pakkantā, tepi “puññavato sirisampattiṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0305a:15_4: āgacchanti. Yaṃ divasaṃ brāhmaṇo nagaraṃ anuvicarati, tadā pātova nagaravīthiyo sammajjitvā
atk-s0305a:15_5: vālikaṃ okiritvā lājapañcamehi pupphehi vippakiritvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā kadaliyo
atk-s0305a:15_6: ca dhaje ca ussāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhūpitavāsitaṃ karonti.
atk-s0305a:16_0: Brāhmaṇo pātova sīsaṃ nhāyitvā purebhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vuttanayeneva setavatthādīhi
atk-s0305a:16_1: attānaṃ alaṅkaritvā pāsādā oruyha rathaṃ abhiruhati. Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā sabbasetavatthavilepanamālālaṅkārā
atk-s0305a:16_2: setacchattāni gahetvā parivārenti. Tato mahājanassa sannipātatthaṃ paṭhamaṃyeva taruṇadārakānaṃ
atk-s0305a:16_3: phalāphalāni vikiranti, tadanantaraṃ māsakarūpādīni, tadanantaraṃ kahāpaṇe vikiranti.
atk-s0305a:16_4: Mahājano sannipatati, ukkuṭṭhiyo ceva celukkhepā ca vattanti. Atha brāhmaṇo maṅgalikasovatthikādīsu
atk-s0305a:16_5: maṅgalāni ceva suvatthiyo ca karontesu mahāsampattiyā nagaraṃ anuvicarati. Puññavantā
atk-s0305a:16_6: manussā ekabhūmikādipāsāde āruyha sukapattasadisāni vātapānakavāṭāni vivaritvā olokenti.
atk-s0305a:16_7: Brāhmaṇopi attano yasasirisampattiyā nagaraṃ ajjhottharanto viya dakkhiṇadvārābhimukho
atk-s0305a:17_0: Tamenaṃ jano disvāti mahājano taṃ rathaṃ disvā. Brahmanti seṭṭhādhivacanametaṃ. Brahmaṃ
atk-s0305a:17_1: vata bho yānanti seṭṭhayānasadisaṃ vata bho yānanti ayamettha attho. Imasseva kho
atk-s0305a:17_2: etanti, ānanda, manussā nāma vaṇṇabhāṇakānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attano dārikānaṃ vaṇṇagītaṃ
atk-s0305a:17_3: gāyāpenti “abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo mahaddhano mahābhogo”ti, na ca tena vaṇṇabhaṇanamattena
atk-s0305a:17_4: abhirūpā vā honti mahaddhanā vā, evameva mahājano brāhmaṇassa rathaṃ disvā – “brahmaṃ
atk-s0305a:17_5: vata bho yāna”nti kiñcāpi evaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati, na panetaṃ yānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanamatteneva
atk-s0305a:17_6: brahmayānaṃ nāma hoti. Lāmakañhi etaṃ chavaṃ. Paramatthena pana imasseva kho etaṃ,
atk-s0305a:17_7: ānanda, ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṃ. Ayañhi sabbadosavigamena seṭṭho,
atk-s0305a:17_8: iminā ca ariyā nibbānaṃ yantīti brahmayānaṃ itipi, dhammabhūtattā yānattā ca dhammayānaṃ
atk-s0305a:17_9: itipi, anuttarattā kilesasaṅgāmassa ca vijitattā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayo itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:18_1: Tattha rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpeti pariyosānaṃ gacchati nipphajjatīti rāgavinayapariyosānā. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0305a:19_0: Yassa saddhā ca paññā cāti yassa ariyamaggayānassa saddhānusārivasena saddhā, dhammānusārivasena
atk-s0305a:19_1: paññāti ime dve dhammā sadā dhuraṃ yuttā, tatramajjhattatāyuge yuttāti attho. Hirī
atk-s0305a:19_2: īsāti attanā saddhiṃ adhiviṭṭhena bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānena ottappena saddhiṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā
atk-s0305a:19_3: hirī yassa maggarathassa īsā. Mano yottanti vipassanācittañca maggacittañca yottaṃ.
atk-s0305a:19_4: Yathā hi rathassa vākādimayaṃ yottaṃ goṇe ekābaddhe karoti ekasaṅgahite, evaṃ maggarathassa
atk-s0305a:19_6: ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahe karoti. Tena vuttaṃ “mano yotta”nti. Sati ārakkhasārathīti maggasampayuttā
atk-s0305a:19_7: sati ārakkhasārathi. Yathā hi rathassa ārakkho sārathi nāma yoggiyo. Dhuraṃ vāheti
atk-s0305a:19_8: yojeti akkhaṃ abbhañjati rathaṃ peseti rathayuttake nibbisevane karoti, evaṃ maggarathassa
atk-s0305a:19_9: sati. Ayañhi ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ceva kusalākusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesatīti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:20_1: vipassanāsampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena jhānamayaakkho. Cakkavīriyoti
atk-s0305a:20_2: vīriyacakko, kāyikacetasikasaṅkhātāni dve vīriyāni assa cakkānīti attho. Upekkhā
atk-s0305a:20_3: dhurasamādhīti dhurassa samādhi, unnatonatākārassa abhāvena dvinnampi yugapadesānaṃ
atk-s0305a:20_4: samatāti attho. Ayañhi tatramajjhattupekkhā cittuppādassa līnuddhaccabhāvaṃ haritvā
atk-s0305a:20_5: payogamajjhatte cittaṃ ṭhapeti, tasmā imassa maggarathassa “dhurasamādhī”ti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:20_6: Anicchā parivāraṇanti bāhirakarathassa sīhacammādīni viya imassāpi ariyamaggarathassa
atk-s0305a:21_0: Abyāpādoti mettā ca mettāpubbabhāgo ca. Avihiṃsāti karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca.
atk-s0305a:21_1: Vivekoti kāyavivekādi tividhaviveko. Yassa āvudhanti yassa ariyamaggarathe ṭhitassa
atk-s0305a:21_2: kulaputtassa etaṃ pañcavidhaṃ āvudhaṃ. Yathā hi rathe ṭhito pañcahi āvudhehi sapatte
atk-s0305a:21_3: vijjhati, evaṃ yogāvacaropi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramaggarathe ṭhito mettāya dosaṃ
atk-s0305a:21_4: vijjhati, karuṇāya vihiṃsaṃ, kāyavivekena gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ, cittavivekena kilesasaṅgaṇikaṃ,
atk-s0305a:21_5: upadhivivekena sabbākusalaṃ vijjhati. Tenassetaṃ pañcavidhaṃ “āvudha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:21_6: Titikkhāti duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ adhivāsanakkhanti. Cammasannāhoti
atk-s0305a:21_7: sannaddhacammo. Yathā hi rathe ṭhito rathiko paṭimukkacammo āgatāgate sare khamati,
atk-s0305a:21_8: na naṃ te vijjhanti, evaṃ adhivāsanakkhantisamannāgato bhikkhu āgatāgate vacanapathe
atk-s0305a:21_9: khamati, na naṃ te vijjhanti. Tasmā “titikkhā cammasannāho”ti vutto. Yogakkhemāya
atk-s0305a:21_10: vattatīti catūhi yogehi khemāya nibbānāya vattati, nibbānābhimukho gacchatiyeva,
atk-s0305a:22_0: Etadattani sambhūtanti etaṃ maggayānaṃ attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā attani
atk-s0305a:22_1: sambhūtaṃ nāma hoti. Brahmayānaṃ anuttaranti asadisaṃ seṭṭhayānaṃ. Niyyanti dhīrā
atk-s0305a:22_2: lokamhāti yesaṃ etaṃ yānaṃ atthi, te dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:22_3: Aññadatthūti ekaṃsena. Jayaṃ jayanti rāgādayo sapatte jinantā jinantā.
atk-s0305a:24: 5-6. Pañcame ayamevāti evasaddo niyamattho. Tena aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭikkhipati. Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭadukkhañceva missakamaggo ca kathito. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0305a:26_0: 7. Sattame nibbānadhātuyā kho etaṃ bhikkhu adhivacananti asaṅkhatāya amatāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0305a:26_1: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatīti apica tena rāgādivinayena āsavānaṃ
atk-s0305a:26_2: khayotipi vuccati. Āsavakkhayo nāma arahattaṃ, arahattassāpi etaṃ rāgavinayotiādi
atk-s0305a:26_3: nāmamevāti dīpeti. Etadavocāti “satthārā nibbānadhātūti vadantena amataṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0305a:26_4: kathitaṃ, maggo panassa na kathito. Taṃ kathāpessāmī”ti anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0305a:28_0: 8. Aṭṭhame katamā ca bhikkhave sammādiṭṭhīti ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvā
atk-s0305a:28_1: puna aparena pariyāyena vibhajitukāmo idaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha dukkhe ñāṇanti
atk-s0305a:28_3: eseva nayo. Sesesu pana dvīsu sammasanassa abhāvā tividhameva vaṭṭati. Evametaṃ “dukkhe
atk-s0305a:29_0: Tattha purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, pacchimāni vivaṭṭaṃ. Tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso
atk-s0305a:29_1: hoti, vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso. Purimāni hi dve saccāni “pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0305a:29_2: taṇhā samudayo”ti evaṃ saṅkhepena ca, “katame pañcakkhandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā
atk-s0305a:29_3: nayena vitthārena ca ācariyasantike uggaṇhitvā vācāya punappunaṃ parivattento yogāvacaro
atk-s0305a:29_4: kammaṃ karoti. Itaresu pana dvīsu saccesu – “nirodhasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0305a:29_5: maggasaccaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti evaṃ savaneneva kammaṃ karoti. So evaṃ karonto
atk-s0305a:29_6: cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati, ekābhisamayena abhisameti. Dukkhaṃ pariññāpaṭivedhena
atk-s0305a:29_7: paṭivijjhati, samudayaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena, nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyapaṭivedhena, maggaṃ
atk-s0305a:29_8: bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhati. Dukkhaṃ pariññābhisamayena…pe… maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti.
atk-s0305a:30_1: hoti, dvīsu savanapaṭivedhoyeva. Aparabhāge tīsu kiccato paṭivedho hoti, nirodhe
atk-s0305a:30_2: ārammaṇapaṭivedho. Paccavekkhaṇā pana pattasaccassa hoti. Imassa bhikkhuno pubbe
atk-s0305a:30_3: pariggahato – “dukkhaṃ parijānāmi, samudayaṃ pajahāmi, nirodhaṃ sacchikaromi, maggaṃ
atk-s0305a:30_5: hoti. Aparabhāge pana dukkhaṃ pariññātameva hoti…pe… maggo bhāvitova hoti.
atk-s0305a:31_0: Tattha dve saccāni duddasattā gambhīrāni, dve gambhīrattā duddasāni. Dukkhasaccañhi
atk-s0305a:31_1: uppattito pākaṭaṃ, khāṇukaṇṭakapahārādīsu “aho dukkha”nti vattabbatampi āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:31_3: pana ubhayampi gambhīraṃ. Iti tāni duddasattā gambhīrāni. Itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ dassanatthāya
atk-s0305a:31_4: payogo bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya avīciphusanatthaṃ pādapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:31_5: viya satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanaṃ viya ca hoti. Iti tāni gambhīrattā
atk-s0305a:31_6: duddasāni. Evaṃ duddasattā gambhīresu gambhīrattā ca duddasesu catūsu saccesu uggahādivasena
atk-s0305a:31_7: idaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭivedhakkhaṇe pana ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:32_0: Nekkhammasaṅkappādīsu kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhena kāmato nissaṭabhāvena vā, kāmaṃ sammasantassa
atk-s0305a:32_1: uppannoti vā, kāmapadaghātaṃ kāmavūpasamaṃ karonto uppannoti vā, kāmavivittante uppannoti
atk-s0305a:32_2: vā nekkhammasaṅkappo. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Sabbepi ca te nekkhammasaṅkappādayo
atk-s0305a:32_3: kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāviramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesu
atk-s0305a:32_4: tīsu ṭhānesu uppannassa akusalasaṅkappassa padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ
atk-s0305a:32_5: pūrayamāno ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāsaṅkappo nāma.
atk-s0305a:33_0: Musāvādā veramaṇīādayopi musāvādādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:33_1: pana imesu catūsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya padacchedato anuppattisādhanavasena
atk-s0305a:33_2: maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāvācā nāma.
atk-s0305a:34_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī ādayopi pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā,
atk-s0305a:34_1: maggakkhaṇe pana imesu tīsu ṭhānesu uppannāya akusaladussīlyacetanāya akiriyato padacchedato
atk-s0305a:34_2: anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammākammanto nāma.
atk-s0305a:35_0: Micchāājīvanti khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāya pavattitaṃ kāyavacīduccaritaṃ. Pahāyāti
atk-s0305a:35_1: vajjetvā. Sammāājīvenāti buddhapasatthena ājīvena. Jīvikaṃ kappetīti jīvitavuttiṃ
atk-s0305a:35_2: pavatteti. Sammājīvopi kuhanādīhi viramaṇasaññānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā. Maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:35_3: pana imesuyeva sattasu ṭhānesu uppannāya micchājīvadussīlyacetanāya padacchedato
atk-s0305a:35_4: anuppattisādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva kusalaveramaṇī uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāājīvo nāma.
atk-s0305a:36_0: Anuppannānanti ekasmiṃ bhave tathārūpe vā ārammaṇe attano na uppannānaṃ, parassa
atk-s0305a:36_1: pana uppajjamāne disvā – “aho vata me evarūpā pāpakā dhammā na uppajjeyyu”nti evaṃ
atk-s0305a:36_2: anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya. Chandanti tesaṃ akusalānaṃ
atk-s0305a:36_3: anuppādakapaṭipattisādhakaṃ vīriyacchandaṃ janeti. Vāyamatīti vāyāmaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:36_4: ārabhatīti vīriyaṃ pavatteti. Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti vīriyena cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:36_5: Padahatīti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti padhānaṃ pavatteti. Uppannānanti
atk-s0305a:36_6: samudācāravasena attano uppannapubbānaṃ. Idāni tādise na uppādessāmīti tesaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti.
atk-s0305a:37_0: Anuppannānaṃ kusalānanti apaṭiladdhānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ. Uppannānanti tesaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:37_1: paṭiladdhānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti punappunaṃ uppattipabandhavasena ṭhitatthaṃ. Asammosāyāti
atk-s0305a:37_2: avināsatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti uparibhāvāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya. Pāripūriyāti
atk-s0305a:37_3: bhāvanāya paripūraṇatthaṃ. Ayampi sammāvāyāmo anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādicittanānattā
atk-s0305a:37_4: pubbabhāge nānā. Maggakkhaṇe pana imesuyeva catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ
atk-s0305a:37_5: pūrayamānaṃ ekameva kusalavīriyaṃ uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāvāyāmo nāma.
atk-s0305a:38_0: Sammāsatipi kāyādipariggāhakacittānaṃ nānattā pubbabhāge nānā, maggakkhaṇe pana imesu
atk-s0305a:38_1: catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasena maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekā sati uppajjati. Ayaṃ sammāsati nāma.
atk-s0305a:39_0: Jhānādīni pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānā, pubbabhāge samāpattivasena nānā, maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:39_1: nānāmaggavasena. Ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti, dutiyamaggādayopi paṭhamajjhānikā
atk-s0305a:39_2: vā dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikā vā. Ekassa paṭhamamaggo dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhāniko
atk-s0305a:39_3: hoti, dutiyādayopi dutiyādīnaṃ aññatarajjhānikā vā paṭhamajjhānikā vā. Evaṃ cattāropi
atk-s0305a:39_4: maggā jhānavasena sadisā vā asadisā vā ekaccasadisā vā honti.
atk-s0305a:40_0: Ayaṃ panassa viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena hoti. Pādakajjhānaniyamena hi paṭhamajjhānalābhino
atk-s0305a:40_1: paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppannamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko hoti, maggaṅgabojjhaṅgāni
atk-s0305a:40_2: panettha paripuṇṇāneva honti. Dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno dutiyajjhāniko
atk-s0305a:40_3: hoti, maggaṅgāni panettha satta honti. Tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa uppanno
atk-s0305a:40_4: tatiyajjhāniko, maggaṅgāni panettha satta, bojjhaṅgāni cha honti. Esa nayo catutthajjhānato
atk-s0305a:41_0: Āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca lokuttaraṃ, no lokiyanti vuttaṃ. Ettha
atk-s0305a:41_1: kathanti? Etthāpi paṭhamajjhānādīsu yato vuṭṭhāya sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā arūpasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0305a:41_2: bhāvetvā so āruppe uppanno, taṃjhānikāvassa tattha tayo maggā uppajjanti. Evaṃ pādakajjhānameva
atk-s0305a:41_3: niyameti. Keci pana therā – “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0305a:41_5: vadanti. Tesaṃ vādavinicchayo visuddhimagge vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanādhikāre vuttanayeneva
atk-s0305a:41_6: veditabbo. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhīti ayaṃ pubbabhāge lokiyo, aparabhāge
atk-s0305a:43_0: 9. Navame micchāpaṇihitanti sūkaṃ nāma uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ
atk-s0305a:43_1: vā bhindati, tathā aṭṭhapitaṃ pana micchāpaṇihitaṃ nāma. Micchāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyāti
atk-s0305a:43_3: avijjaṃ bhindissati. Vijjaṃ uppādessatīti arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādessati. Micchāpaṇihitattā,
atk-s0305a:43_4: bhikkhave, diṭṭhiyāti kammassakatapaññāya ceva maggabhāvanāya ca micchā ṭhapitattā,
atk-s0305a:43_5: appavattitattāti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte kammassakatañāṇaṃ magganissitaṃ katvā missakamaggo kathito.
atk-s0305a:49_0: 11. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti ahaṃ,
atk-s0305a:49_1: bhikkhave, ekaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti
atk-s0305a:49_2: attho. Namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā
atk-s0305a:49_3: payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya saddhesu kulesu paṭiyattaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0305a:49_4: upanāmeyya, taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā namhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā
atk-s0305a:50_0: Kasmā pana evamāhāti? Tasmiṃ kira aḍḍhamāse vinetabbo satto nāhosi. Atha satthā –
atk-s0305a:50_1: “imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ phalasamāpattisukheneva vītināmessāmi, iti mayhañceva sukhavihāro
atk-s0305a:50_2: bhavissati, anāgate ca pacchimā janatā ‘satthāpi gaṇaṃ vihāya ekako vihāsi, kimaṅgaṃ
atk-s0305a:50_3: pana maya’nti diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjissati, tadassā bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti
atk-s0305a:50_4: iminā kāraṇena evamāha. Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0305a:51_0: Yena svāhanti yena so ahaṃ. Paṭhamābhisambuddhoti abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:51_1: ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare. Viharāmīti idaṃ atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ. Tassa padesena
atk-s0305a:51_2: vihāsinti tassa paṭhamābhisambuddhavihārassa padesena. Tattha padeso nāma khandhapadeso
atk-s0305a:51_4: nānāvidho. Taṃ sabbampi sandhāya – “tassa padesena vihāsi”nti āha. Bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:51_5: ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare yathā nāma pattarajjo rājā attano vibhavasāradassanatthaṃ
atk-s0305a:51_6: taṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamuttāmaṇiādīni ratanāni paccavekkhanto vihareyya,
atk-s0305a:51_7: evameva pañcakkhandhe nippadese katvā sammasanto paccavekkhanto vihāsi. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0305a:51_8: aḍḍhamāse tesaṃ khandhānaṃ padesaṃ vedanākkhandhameva paccavekkhanto vihāsi. Tassa
atk-s0305a:51_9: “ime sattā evarūpaṃ nāma sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti, evarūpaṃ dukkha”nti olokayato yāva
atk-s0305a:51_10: bhavaggā pavattā sukhavedanā, yāva avīcito pavattā dukkhavedanā, sabbā sabbākārena
atk-s0305a:51_11: upaṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ “micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpi vedayita”ntiādinā nayena pariggaṇhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a:52_0: Tathā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ dvādasāyatanāni nippadesāneva katvā vihāsi, imasmiṃ pana aḍḍhamāse
atk-s0305a:52_1: tesaṃ āyatanānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvasena dhammāyatanekadesaṃ, dhātūnaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvasena
atk-s0305a:52_3: paccayānaṃ padesaṃ phassapaccayā vedanāvasena paccayekadesaṃ jhānānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvaseneva
atk-s0305a:52_4: jhānaṅgekadesaṃ, nāmarūpānaṃ padesaṃ vedanāvaseneva nāmekadesaṃ paccavekkhanto vihāsi.
atk-s0305a:52_5: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi ekūnapaññāsadivasabbhantare kusalādidhamme nippadese katvā anantanayāni
atk-s0305a:52_6: satta pakaraṇāni paccavekkhanto vihāsi. Imasmiṃ pana aḍḍhamāse sabbadhammānaṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0305a:52_7: vedanāttikameva paccavekkhanto vihāsi. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sā sā ca vihārasamāpatti
atk-s0305a:53_0: Idāni yenākārena vihāsi, taṃ dassento micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpītiādimāha. Tattha micchādiṭṭhipaccayāpīti
atk-s0305a:53_1: diṭṭhisampayuttā vedanāpi vaṭṭati. Diṭṭhiṃ upanissayaṃ katvā uppannā kusalākusalavedanāpi
atk-s0305a:53_2: vaṭṭati vipākavedanāpi. Tattha micchādiṭṭhisampayuttā akusalāva hoti, diṭṭhiṃ pana
atk-s0305a:53_3: upanissāya kusalāpi uppajjanti akusalāpi. Micchādiṭṭhikā hi diṭṭhiṃ upanissāya pakkhadivasesu
atk-s0305a:53_4: yāgubhattādīni denti, addhikādīnaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paṭṭhapenti, catumahāpathe sālaṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a:53_5: pokkharaṇiñca khaṇāpenti, devakulādīsu mālāgacchaṃ ropenti, nadīviduggādīsu setuṃ
atk-s0305a:53_6: attharanti, visamaṃ samaṃ karonti, iti nesaṃ kusalavedanā uppajjati. Micchādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0305a:53_7: pana nissāya sammādiṭṭhike akkosanti paribhāsanti, vadhabandhanādīni karonti, pāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:53_8: vadhitvā devatānaṃ upahāraṃ upaharanti, iti nesaṃ akusalavedanā uppajjati. Vipākavedanā
atk-s0305a:54_0: Sammādiṭṭhipaccayāti etthāpi sammādiṭṭhisampayuttā vedanāpi vaṭṭati, sammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0305a:54_1: upanissayaṃ katvā uppannā kusalākusalavedanāpi vipākavedanāpi. Tattha sammādiṭṭhisampayuttā
atk-s0305a:54_2: kusalāva hoti, sammādiṭṭhiṃ pana upanissāya buddhapūjaṃ dīpamālaṃ mahādhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0305a:54_3: appatiṭṭhite disābhāge cetiyapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīni puññāni karonti, iti nesaṃ
atk-s0305a:54_4: kusalā vedanā uppajjati. Sammādiṭṭhiṃyeva nissāya micchādiṭṭhike akkosanti paribhāsanti,
atk-s0305a:54_5: attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti, paraṃ vambhenti, iti nesaṃ akusalavedanā uppajjati. Vipākavedanā
atk-s0305a:54_6: pana bhavantaragatānaṃyeva hoti. Micchāsaṅkappapaccayātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Chandapaccayātiādīsu
atk-s0305a:54_7: pana chandapaccayā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittasampayuttā vedanā veditabbā, vitakkapaccayā
atk-s0305a:54_8: paṭhamajjhānavedanāva. Saññā paccayā ṭhapetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ sesā cha saññāsamāpattivedanā.
atk-s0305a:55_0: Chando ca avūpasantotiādīsu tiṇṇaṃ avūpasame aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittasampayuttā vedanā
atk-s0305a:55_1: hoti, chandamattassa vūpasame paṭhamajjhānavedanāva. Chandavitakkānaṃ vūpasame dutiyajjhānādivedanā
atk-s0305a:55_2: adhippetā, tiṇṇampi vūpasame nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavedanā. Appattassa pattiyāti arahattaphalassa
atk-s0305a:55_3: pattatthāya. Atthi āyāmanti atthi vīriyaṃ. Tasmimpi ṭhāne anuppatteti tassa vīriyārambhassa
atk-s0305a:55_4: vasena tassa arahattaphalassa kāraṇe anuppatte. Tappaccayāpi vedayitanti arahattassa
atk-s0305a:55_5: ṭhānapaccayā vedayitaṃ. Etena catumaggasahajātā nibbattitalokuttaravedanāva gahitā.
atk-s0305a:57_1: micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo nāma sammādiṭṭhi. Tasmā yaṃ sammādiṭṭhipaccayā vedayitaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a:57_2: tadeva micchādiṭṭhivūpasamapaccayā veditabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte vipākavedanaṃ atidūreti
atk-s0305a:57_3: maññamānā na gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Yassa yassa
atk-s0305a:57_4: hi vūpasamapaccayāti vuccati, tassa tassa paṭipakkhadhammapaccayāva taṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ
atk-s0305a:57_5: adhippetaṃ. Chandavūpasamapaccayātiādīsu pana chandavūpasamapaccayā tāva paṭhamajjhānavedanā
atk-s0305a:57_7: Saññāvūpasamapaccayā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavedanā. Chando ca vūpasantotiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0305a:59_0: 13-17. Tatiye sekkhoti sikkhanasīlo. Kiṃ sikkhatīti? Tisso sikkhā. Sekkhāyāti tīhi
atk-s0305a:59_1: phalehi catūhi ca maggehi saddhiṃ uppannāya. Sāpi hi aniṭṭhitakiccattā attano kiccaṃ
atk-s0305a:61: 18-20. Aṭṭhame ummaṅgoti paññāummaṅgo, paññāvīmaṃsanaṃ, paññāgavesananti attho. Evañhi tvaṃ āvusoti idaṃ tassa pucchāpatiṭṭhāpanatthāya āha. Navamadasamāni uttānatthāmevāti.
atk-s0305a:64_0: 21-30. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame micchattanti micchāsabhāvaṃ. Sammattanti sammāsabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0305a:64_2: karoti, tasmāti attho. Nārādhakoti na sampādako. Ñāyaṃ dhammanti ariyamaggadhammaṃ.

atk-s0305a:123_0: 182. Bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttassa paṭhame nāgāti imepi mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe ūmiantaravāsinova,

atk-s0305a:123_9: bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya
atk-s0305a:123_10: dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi

atk-s0305a:126_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, nissaraṇavivekanissitanti,

atk-s0305a:128_0: 183. Dutiye āhāraṭṭhitikoti paccayaṭṭhitiko. Āhāraṃ paṭiccāti paccayaṃ paṭicca. Subhanimittanti

atk-s0305a:135_0: Vicikicchaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā. Ayonisomanasikāro sabbattha
atk-s0305a:135_1: vuttanayova. Evamettha kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā,

atk-s0305a:137_0: Kusalākusalā dhammātiādīsu kusalāti kosallasambhūtā anavajjasukhavipākā. Akusalāti
atk-s0305a:137_1: akosallasambhūtā sāvajjadukkhavipākā. Sāvajjāti akusalā. Anavajjāti kusalā. Hīnapaṇītakaṇhasukkesupi
atk-s0305a:137_2: eseva nayo. Sappaṭibhāgāti kaṇhasukkāyeva. Kaṇhā hi kaṇhavipākadānato, sukkā ca sukkavipākadānato
atk-s0305a:137_3: sappaṭibhāgā nāma, sadisavipākakoṭṭhāsāti attho. Paṭipakkhabhūtassa vā bhāgassa atthitāya
atk-s0305a:137_4: sappaṭibhāgā. Kaṇhānañhi sukkā paṭipakkhabhāgā, sukkānañca kaṇhā paṭipakkhabhāgāti
atk-s0305a:137_5: evampi sappaṭibhāgā. Sappaṭibāhitaṭṭhena vā sappaṭibhāgā. Akusalañhi kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0305a:137_6: attano vipākaṃ deti, kusalañca akusalaṃ paṭibāhitvāti evampi kaṇhasukkā sappaṭibhāgā.
atk-s0305a:138_0: Ārambhadhātūti paṭhamārambhavīriyaṃ. Nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ.
atk-s0305a:138_1: Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavataranti tīhipi padehi
atk-s0305a:139_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyāti pītiyā ārammaṇadhammā. Kāyapassaddhīti tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:139_2: samathopi samathanimittaṃ, ārammaṇampi. Abyagganimittanti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:140_0: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyāti upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammā, atthato pana majjhattākāro
atk-s0305a:142_0: 184. Tatiye sīlasampannāti ettha khīṇāsavassa lokiyalokuttarasīlaṃ kathitaṃ, tena
atk-s0305a:142_1: sampannāti attho. Samādhipaññāsupi eseva nayo. Vimutti pana phalavimuttiyeva. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ
atk-s0305a:142_2: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Evamettha sīlādayo tayo lokiyalokuttarā, vimutti lokuttarāva,
atk-s0305a:143_0: Dassanampāhanti dassanampi ahaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ dassanaṃ – cakkhudassanaṃ, ñāṇadassananti
atk-s0305a:143_1: duvidhaṃ. Tattha pasannehi cakkhūhi ariyānaṃ dassanaṃ olokanaṃ cakkhudassanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:143_2: Ariyehi pana diṭṭhassa lakkhaṇassa dassanaṃ, paṭividdhassa ca paṭivijjhanaṃ jhānena
atk-s0305a:143_3: vā vipassanāya vā maggaphalehi vā ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma. Imasmiṃ panettha cakkhudassanaṃ
atk-s0305a:143_4: adhippetaṃ. Ariyānañhi pasannehi cakkhūhi olokanampi bahukārameva. Savananti “asuko
atk-s0305a:143_5: nāma khīṇāsavo asukasmiṃ nāma raṭṭhe vā janapade vā gāme vā nigame vā vihāre vā leṇe
atk-s0305a:143_6: vā vasatī”ti kathentānaṃ sotena savanaṃ, etampi bahukārameva. Upasaṅkamananti “dānaṃ
atk-s0305a:143_7: vā dassāmi, pañhaṃ vā pucchissāmi, dhammaṃ vā sossāmi, sakkāraṃ vā karissāmī”ti evarūpena
atk-s0305a:143_8: cittena ariyānaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ. Payirupāsananti pañhāpayirupāsanaṃ. Ariyānaṃ guṇe
atk-s0305a:143_9: sutvā te upasaṅkamitvā nimantetvā dānaṃ datvā “kiṃ, bhante, kusala”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0305a:144_0: Anussatinti rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinnassa “idāni ariyā leṇaguhamaṇḍapādīsu jhānavipassanāmaggaphalasukhehi
atk-s0305a:144_1: vītināmentī”ti anussaraṇaṃ. Yo vā tesaṃ santike ovādo laddho hoti, taṃ āvajjitvā
atk-s0305a:144_2: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ samādhi, imasmiṃ vipassanā, imasmiṃ maggo,
atk-s0305a:144_3: imasmiṃ phala”nti evaṃ anussaraṇaṃ. Anupabbajjanti ariyesu cittaṃ pasādetvā gharā
atk-s0305a:144_4: nikkhamma tesaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ. Ariyānañhi santike cittaṃ pasādetvā tesaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:144_5: santike pabbajitvā tesaṃyeva ovādānusāsaniṃ paccāsīsamānassa caratopi pabbajjā anupabbajjā
atk-s0305a:144_6: nāma. Ariyesu pasādena aññattha pabbajitvā ariyānaṃ santike ovādānusāsaniṃ paccāsīsamānassa
atk-s0305a:144_7: carato pabbajjāpi anupabbajjā nāma. Aññesu pana pasādena aññesaṃyeva santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0305a:144_8: aññesaṃyeva ovādānusāsaniṃ paccāsīsamānassa carato pabbajjā anupabbajjā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0305a:145_0: Evaṃ pabbajitesu pana mahākassapattherassa tāva anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā satasahassamattā
atk-s0305a:145_1: ahesuṃ, tathā therasseva saddhivihārikassa ca candaguttattherassa, tassāpi saddhivihārikassa
atk-s0305a:145_2: sūriyaguttattherassa, tassāpi saddhivihārikassa assaguttattherassa, tassāpi saddhivihārikassa
atk-s0305a:145_3: yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa, tassa pana saddhivihāriko asokarañño kaniṭṭhabhātā
atk-s0305a:145_4: tissatthero nāma ahosi, tassa anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā aḍḍhateyyakoṭisaṅkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0305a:145_5: Mahindattherassa anupabbajitānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi. Yāvajjadivasā laṅkādīpe
atk-s0305a:145_6: satthari pasādena pabbajantā mahindattherasseva pabbajjaṃ anupabbajanti nāma.
atk-s0305a:146_0: Taṃ dhammanti taṃ tesaṃ ovādānusāsanīdhammaṃ. Anussaratīti sarati. Anuvitakketīti
atk-s0305a:146_1: vitakkāhataṃ karoti. Āraddho hotīti paripuṇṇo hoti. Pavicinatītiādi sabbaṃ tattha
atk-s0305a:146_2: ñāṇacāravaseneva vuttaṃ. Atha vā pavicinatīti tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vicinati.
atk-s0305a:146_3: Pavicaratīti tattha ñāṇaṃ carāpeti. Parivīmaṃsamāpajjatīti vīmaṃsanaṃ olokanaṃ gavesanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:147_0: Satta phalā sattānisaṃsāti ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekaṃ. Diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacca aññaṃ
atk-s0305a:147_1: ārādhetīti arahattaṃ ārādhento imasmiṃyeva attabhāve ārādheti, tañca kho paṭikacca,
atk-s0305a:147_2: asampatteyeva maraṇakāleti attho. Atha maraṇakāleti atha maraṇassa āsannakāle.
atk-s0305a:148_0: Antarāparinibbāyīti yo āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā parinibbāyati, so tividho hoti.
atk-s0305a:148_1: Kappasahassāyukesu tāva avihesu nibbattitvā eko nibbattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a:148_2: No ce nibbattadivase pāpuṇāti, paṭhamassa pana kappasatassa matthake pāpuṇāti. Ayameko
atk-s0305a:148_3: antarāparinibbāyī. Aparo evaṃ asakkonto dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:148_4: dutiyo. Aparo evampi asakkonto catunnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ tatiyo antarāparinibbāyī.
atk-s0305a:149_0: Pañcamaṃ pana kappasataṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patto upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:149_1: Atappādīsupi eseva nayo. Yattha katthaci uppanno pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:149_2: patto sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma, asaṅkhārena appayogena patto asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
atk-s0305a:149_3: nāma. Avihādīsupi nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0305a:150_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṭṭhacattārīsa anāgāmino kathetabbā. Avihesu hi tayo antarāparinibbāyī,
atk-s0305a:150_1: eko upahaccaparinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca honti. Te asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino
atk-s0305a:150_2: pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa honti, tathā atappādīsu. Akaniṭṭhesu
atk-s0305a:150_3: pana uddhaṃsoto natthi, tasmā tattha cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti
atk-s0305a:150_4: aṭṭhāti evaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa honti. Tesaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī sabbajeṭṭho ceva
atk-s0305a:150_5: hoti sabbakaniṭṭho ca. Kathaṃ? So hi soḷasakappasahassāyukattā āyunā sabbesaṃ jeṭṭho,
atk-s0305a:150_6: sabbapacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti sabbesaṃ kaniṭṭho. Imasmiṃ sutte apubbaṃ acarimaṃ
atk-s0305a:150_7: ekacittakkhaṇikā nānālakkhaṇā arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:152_0: 185. Catutthe satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me hotīti satisambojjhaṅgoti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ
atk-s0305a:152_1: hoti. Appamāṇoti me hotīti appamāṇoti evaṃ me hoti. Susamāraddhoti suparipuṇṇo. Tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0305a:152_2: ettha aṭṭhahākārehi satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati – uppādaṃ anāvajjitattā anuppādaṃ āvajjitattā
atk-s0305a:152_3: satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati, pavattaṃ, appavattaṃ, nimittaṃ, animittaṃ saṅkhāre anāvajjitattā,
atk-s0305a:152_4: visaṅkhāraṃ āvajjitattā satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhatīti. Imehi aṭṭhahākārehi tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0305a:152_5: thero jānāti, vuttākāraviparīteheva aṭṭhahākārehi cavantaṃ cavatīti pajānāti. Sesabojjhaṅgesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:153_0: Iti imasmiṃ sutte therassa phalabojjhaṅgā kathitā. Yadā hi thero satisambojjhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0305a:153_1: sīsaṃ katvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tadā itare cha tadanvayā honti. Yadā dhammavicayādīsu
atk-s0305a:153_2: aññataraṃ, tadāpi sesā tadanvayā hontīti evaṃ phalasamāpattiyaṃ attano ciṇṇavasitaṃ
atk-s0305a:155_0: 186. Pañcame bodhāya saṃvattantīti bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti. Kiṃ bujjhanatthāya?
atk-s0305a:155_1: Maggena asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ, paccavekkhaṇāya katakiccataṃ, maggena vā kilesaniddāto
atk-s0305a:155_2: pabujjhanatthāya, phalena pabujjhanabhāvatthāyātipi vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevettha nibbānasacchikiriyā
atk-s0305a:157_0: 187-188. Chaṭṭhe ārāmanissayīti ārāmaṃ nissāya vasanabhāvena ārāmanissayī. Parisāvacaroti
atk-s0305a:157_1: parisāya avacaro. Parisaṃ nāma bālāpi, paṇḍitāpi osaranti, yo pana parappavādaṃ madditvā
atk-s0305a:157_2: attano vādaṃ dīpetuṃ sakkoti, ayaṃ parisāvacaro nāma. Ārāmena ārāmanti ārāmeneva
atk-s0305a:157_3: ārāmaṃ anucaṅkamāmi, na bāhirenāti attho. Uyyānena uyyānanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:157_4: Aññena vā ārāmena pavisitvā aññaṃ ārāmaṃ, aññena uyyānena aññaṃ uyyānanti ayamettha
atk-s0305a:157_5: attho. Itivādappamokkhānisaṃsanti “evaṃ pucchā hoti, evaṃ vissajjanaṃ, evaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:157_6: evaṃ nibbeṭhana”nti iminā nayena itivādo hoti itivādappamokkhoti etaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0305a:157_7: Upārambhānisaṃsanti “ayaṃ pucchāya doso, ayaṃ vissajjane”ti evaṃ vādadosānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0305a:158_0: Kathaṃ bhāvito ca, kuṇḍaliya, indriyasaṃvaroti satthā “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ paribbājakena
atk-s0305a:158_1: pucchitaṃ, idāni pucchituṃ na sakkotī”ti ñatvā “na tāva ayaṃ desanā yathānusandhiṃ
atk-s0305a:158_2: gatā. Idāni naṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpessāmī”ti sayameva pucchanto imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:158_3: Tattha manāpaṃ nābhijjhatīti iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nābhijjhāyati. Nābhihaṃsatīti na sāmisāya
atk-s0305a:158_4: tuṭṭhiyā abhihaṃsati. Tassa ṭhito ca kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattanti tassa nāmakāyo
atk-s0305a:158_5: ca cittañca gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hoti. Susaṇṭhitanti kammaṭṭhānavasena suṭṭhu saṇṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:158_6: Suvimuttanti kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suvimuttaṃ. Amanāpanti aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ. Na maṅku
atk-s0305a:158_7: hotīti tasmiṃ na maṅku hoti. Appatiṭṭhitacittoti kilesavasena aṭṭhitacitto. Adīnamānasoti
atk-s0305a:159_0: Evaṃ bhāvito kho, kuṇḍaliya, indriyasaṃvaro evaṃ bahulīkato tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti
atk-s0305a:159_1: ettha evaṃ sucaritapūraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ – imesu tāva chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni
atk-s0305a:159_2: honti. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā
atk-s0305a:159_3: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe lobhaṃ uppādentassa manoduccaritaṃ hoti. Lobhasahagatena cittena
atk-s0305a:159_4: “aho vatidaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa”nti bhaṇantassa vacīduccaritaṃ, tadeva hatthena
atk-s0305a:160_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – sotadvārasmiñhi saddārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ saṅkhapaṇavāditūriyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0305a:160_1: anāmāsaṃ āmasantassa, ghānadvāre gandhārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ gandhamālādiṃ, jivhādvāre
atk-s0305a:160_2: rasārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ macchamaṃsādiṃ, kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇassa vatthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0305a:160_4: āmasantassa kāyaduccaritaṃ veditabbaṃ. Saṅkhepato panettha chasu dvāresu kāyavītikkamo
atk-s0305a:160_5: kāyaduccaritaṃ, vacīvītikkamo vacīduccaritaṃ, manovītikkamo manoduccaritanti tīṇeva duccaritāni honti.
atk-s0305a:161_0: Ayaṃ pana bhikkhu attano bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhito imāni duccaritāni sucaritaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:161_1: vipariṇāmeti. Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acāletvā
atk-s0305a:161_2: rūpārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhāpayato manosucaritaṃ hoti, vipassanāsahagatena cittena
atk-s0305a:161_3: khayadhammaṃ vayadhammanti bhaṇantassa vacīsucaritaṃ, “anāmāsabhaṇḍaṃ eta”nti anāmasantassa
atk-s0305a:161_4: kāyasucaritaṃ. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ imāni vitthārato aṭṭhārasa sucaritāni
atk-s0305a:161_5: honti. Saṅkhepato panetthāpi chasu dvāresu kāyasaṃvaro kāyasucaritaṃ, vacīsaṃvaro
atk-s0305a:161_6: vacīsucaritaṃ, manosaṃvaro manosucaritanti tīṇeva sucaritāni honti. Evaṃ indriyasaṃvaro
atk-s0305a:161_7: tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretīti veditabbo. Ettāvatā sīlānurakkhitaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:162_0: Kāyaduccaritaṃ pahāyātiādīsu tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ,
atk-s0305a:162_1: tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ. Tassa paṭipakkhavasena kāyasucaritādīni veditabbāni. Ettāvatā
atk-s0305a:162_2: kāyasaṃvaravacīsaṃvarehi pātimokkhasīlaṃ, manosaṃvarena tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ
atk-s0305a:162_3: kathitaṃ hoti. Sakale pana imasmiṃ sutte sucaritamūlakā satipaṭṭhānā lokuttaramissakā,
atk-s0305a:162_4: sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ mūlabhūtā satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, tepi satipaṭṭhānamūlakā
atk-s0305a:162_5: bojjhaṅgā pubbabhāgāva. Vijjāvimuttimūlakā pana lokuttarāva kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:164_0: 189. Aṭṭhame paccattanti attanāva. Yonisomanasikārāti yoniso manasikārena. Ārabbhamānovāti
atk-s0305a:164_1: kurumānoyeva. Suvimuttanti kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. Aṭṭhiṃkatvāti atthaṃ
atk-s0305a:166: 190. Navame nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvāti tathāgatassa pātubhāvaṃ vinā na aññasmiṃ kāle uppajjantīti attho.
atk-s0305a:168: 191. Dasame nāññatra sugatavinayāti sugatovādaṃ vinā na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0305a:172_0: 192-194. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame cattāro iriyāpathe kappentīti yesaṃ cattāro iriyāpathā
atk-s0305a:172_1: atthi, tesaṃyeva vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nissāyāti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ nissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0305a:172_2: Satta bojjhaṅgeti sahavipassanake maggabojjhaṅge. Dutiyatatiyāni uttānatthāneva.
atk-s0305a:174_0: 195-201. Catutthe tathā pahīno cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosīti therassa
atk-s0305a:174_1: kira imaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanaṃ sādhukaṃ suṇantassa etadahosi “mayhaṃ pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0305a:174_2: sattame divase saccāni paṭivijjhantassa ime bojjhaṅgā pātubhūtā”ti. Athassa “niyyānikaṃ
atk-s0305a:174_3: vata satthusāsana”nti cintayato lohitaṃ pasīdi, upādārūpaṃ visuddhaṃ ahosi, pokkharapatte
atk-s0305a:174_4: patitaudakabindu viya sarīrato rogo vinivattitvā gato. Tena vuttaṃ “tathā pahīno
atk-s0305a:174_5: cāyasmato mahākassapassa so ābādho ahosī”ti. Pañcamachaṭṭhesupi eseva nayo. Imesaṃ
atk-s0305a:174_6: pana tiṇṇampi janānaṃ pabbatapāde pupphitavisarukkhavātasamphassena uppanno mandasītajaro
atk-s0305a:178_0: 202-203. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bojjhaṅgāti vuccantīti
atk-s0305a:178_1: bhante, kittakena nu kho bujjhanakaaṅgā nāma vuccantīti pucchati. Bodhāya saṃvattantīti
atk-s0305a:178_2: bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti. Imasmiṃ sutte missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā. Dutiye dhammaparicchedo kathito.
atk-s0305a:180_1: Byāpādaṭṭhāniyādīsupi eseva nayo. Sakalañhi idaṃ suttaṃ ārammaṇeneva kathitaṃ. Paṭhamavaggassa
atk-s0305a:180_2: dutiyasutte vuttaparicchedopettha labbhateva. Catutthe missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:182_0: 207-208. Chaṭṭhe etadavocāti “imissaṃ parisati nisinno udāyitthero nāma anusandhikusalo
atk-s0305a:182_1: bhikkhu atthi, so maṃ pucchissatīti bhagavatā osāpitadesanaṃ ñatvā desanānusandhiṃ
atk-s0305a:182_2: ghaṭessāmī”ti pucchanto etaṃ avoca. Vipulantiādi sabbaṃ subhāvitattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:182_3: Subhāvito hi satisambojjhaṅgo vipulo ca mahaggato ca appamāṇo ca abyāpajjo ca nāma
atk-s0305a:182_4: hoti. So hi patthaṭattā vipulo, mahantabhāvaṃ gatattā mahaggato, vaḍḍhipamāṇattā
atk-s0305a:182_5: appamāṇo, nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvena byāpādarahitattā abyāpajjho nāma hoti. Taṇhāya
atk-s0305a:182_6: pahānā kammaṃ pahīyatīti yaṃ taṇhāmūlakaṃ kammaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ taṇhāpahānena pahīyati.
atk-s0305a:182_7: Kammassa pahānā dukkhanti yampi kammamūlakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ uppajjeyya, taṃ kammapahānena
atk-s0305a:182_8: pahīyati. Taṇhakkhayādayo taṇhādīnaṃyeva khayā, atthato panetehi nibbānaṃ kathitanti
atk-s0305a:184_1: satisambojjhaṅgena bhāvitena, satisambojjhaṅgaṃ vā bhāvetvā ṭhitena, evamettha maggabojjhaṅgā
atk-s0305a:184_2: missakā. Tehi bhāvitaṃ, te vā bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva. Tampi
atk-s0305a:184_3: pana magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:186: 210. Navame saṃyojanavinibandhāti saṃyojanasaṅkhātā vinibandhā. Ajjhosānāti pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇā.
atk-s0305a:188_0: 211. Dasame abahukatoti akatabahumāno. Ukkujjāvakujjanti ettha ukkujjaṃ vuccati udayo,
atk-s0305a:188_1: avakujjaṃ vayoti udayabbayavasena parivattento sammasantoti dīpeti. Dhammo ca me,
atk-s0305a:188_2: bhante, abhisamitoti vipassanādhammo abhisamāgato. Maggoti vipassanāmaggova. Sace
atk-s0305a:188_3: hi thero tasmiṃ samaye sotāpanno, upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya, sace anāgāmī, arahattamaggassa
atk-s0305a:188_4: atthāya ayaṃ vipassanā veditabbā. Tathā tathā viharantanti tena tenākārena viharantaṃ.
atk-s0305a:188_5: Tathattāyāti tathābhāvāya. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi tathattāyāti adhippetaṃ tathābhāvaṃ
atk-s0305a:188_6: dasseti. Paccavekkhaṇatthāya upanīyatīti hi ettha adhippāyo, taṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0305a:192_0: 214-215. Catutthavaggassa tatiye na ca pabhassaranti na ca pabhāvantaṃ. Pabhaṅgu
atk-s0305a:192_1: cāti pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ. Ayoti kāḷalohaṃ. Ṭhapetvā idha vuttāni cattāri avasesaṃ
atk-s0305a:192_2: lohaṃ nāma. Sajjhūti rajataṃ. Cittassāti catubhūmakacittassa. Lokiyassa tāva upakkileso
atk-s0305a:192_3: hotu, lokuttarassa kathaṃ hotīti? Uppajjituṃ appadānena. Yadaggena hi uppajjituṃ
atk-s0305a:192_4: na denti, tadaggeneva te lokiyassāpi lokuttarassāpi upakkilesā nāma honti. Pabhaṅgu
atk-s0305a:192_5: cāti ārammaṇe cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvūpagamanena bhijjanasabhāvaṃ. Anāvaraṇā anīvaraṇāti
atk-s0305a:192_6: kusaladhamme na āvarantīti anāvaraṇā, na nīvaranti na paṭicchādentīti anīvaraṇā.
atk-s0305a:194: 219. Aṭṭhame paññāya dubbalīkaraṇāti paññāya mandabhāvakarā. Nīvaraṇānañhi abhiṇhuppāde sati antarantarā uppajjamānā paññā dubbalā hoti mandā avisadā.
atk-s0305a:195_0: Pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na honti. Sattabojjhaṅgā tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ
atk-s0305a:195_1: gacchantīti ariyasāvakassa hi sappāyadhammassavanaṃ suṇantassa pañca nīvaraṇā dūre
atk-s0305a:195_2: honti. So sace tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti, evamassa satta bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0305a:195_3: bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. No ce sakkoti, tato vuṭṭhāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gato
atk-s0305a:195_4: tameva pītiṃ avijahanto pañca nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā visesaṃ nibbattessati. Tattha
atk-s0305a:195_5: asakkontopi yāva sattadivasabbhantarā tameva pītiṃ avijahanto nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0305a:195_6: visesaṃ nibbattessatīti idaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammassavanavasena sakiṃ pītipāmojjapakkhiyā
atk-s0305a:195_7: paṭiladdhabojjhaṅgā hi kammārāmatādīni āgamma nassanti, tathārūpaṃ pana utusappāyādiṃ
atk-s0305a:195_8: labhitvā puna uppajjantāpi tasmiṃ samaye bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti icceva vuccati.
atk-s0305a:197: 220. Navame ajjhāruhāti abhiruhanakā. Kacchakoti aṭṭhikacchako. Kapitthanoti makkaṭathanasadisaphalo vijātapilakkho.
atk-s0305a:199_0: 221. Dasame andhakaraṇāti andhabhāvakaraṇā. Acakkhukaraṇāti paññācakkhussa akaraṇā.
atk-s0305a:199_1: Paññānirodhikāti paññāya nirodhanā. Vighātapakkhiyāti dukkhapakkhikā. Anibbānasaṃvattanikāti
atk-s0305a:199_2: nibbānatthāya asaṃvattanikā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva. Sakalepi imasmiṃ vagge
atk-s0305a:203: 222. Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame tisso vidhāti tayo mānakoṭṭhāsā, mānoyeva vā. Tathā tathā vidahanato hi mānova vidhāti vuccati.
atk-s0305a:205_0: 223. Dutiye rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissāti ettha attano sirisampattiyā rājati,
atk-s0305a:205_1: catūhi vā saṅgahavatthūhi lokaṃ rañjetīti rājā, tassa rañño. “Pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti
atk-s0305a:205_2: puññānubhāvena abbhuggatāya vācāya codento cakkaṃ vattetīti cakkavattī, tassa cakkavattissa.
atk-s0305a:205_3: Pātubhāvāti pātubhāvena. Sattannanti gaṇanaparicchedo. Ratanānanti paricchinnaatthadassanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:208_0: Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, sabbeva
atk-s0305a:208_1: gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:208_2: Cakkaratanassa ca “ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatī”ti aggho natthi, iti mahagghaṭṭhenāpi
atk-s0305a:208_3: ratanaṃ. Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:208_4: Yasmā pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti, tasmiṃyeva cakkavattino, buddhā ca kadāci
atk-s0305a:208_5: karahaci uppajjanti, tasmā dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Tadetaṃ jātirūpakulaissariyādīhi
atk-s0305a:208_6: anomassa uḷārasattasseva uppajjati, na aññassāti anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenāpi ratanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:208_7: Yathā ca cakkaratanaṃ, evaṃ sesānipīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0305a:211_0: Pātubhāvo hotīti nibbatti hoti. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṃ
atk-s0305a:211_1: ratanānaṃ pātubhāvoti ayuttaṃ. Uppannañhi cakkaṃ vattetvā so cakkavattī nāma hotīti
atk-s0305a:211_2: nāyuttaṃ. Kasmā? Cakkavattananiyamāpekkhatāya. Yo hi niyamena cakkaṃ vattessati,
atk-s0305a:211_3: so paṭisandhito pabhuti “cakkavatti pātubhūto”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Laddhanāmassa
atk-s0305a:211_4: ca purisassa mūluppattivacanatopi yuttamevetaṃ. Yo hi esa cakkavattīti laddhanāmo
atk-s0305a:211_5: sattaviseso, tassa paṭisandhisaṅkhāto pātubhāvoti ayamettha attho. Tassa hi pātubhāvā
atk-s0305a:211_6: ratanāni pātubhavanti. Pātubhūtehi pana tehi saddhiṃ paripakke puññasambhāre so saṃyujjati,
atk-s0305a:211_7: tadā lokassa tesu pātubhāvacittaṃ uppajjati. Bahulavacanato cāpi yuttamevetaṃ. Yadā
atk-s0305a:211_8: hi lokassa tesu pātubhāvasaññā uppajjati, tadā ekameva paṭhamaṃ, pacchā itarāni cha
atk-s0305a:211_9: pātubhavantīti bahulavacanato cāpi etaṃ yuttaṃ. Pātubhāvassa ca atthabhedatopi yuttamevetaṃ.
atk-s0305a:211_10: Na kevalañhi pātubhūtameva pātubhāvo, pātubhāvayatīti pātubhāvo. Ayaṃ pātubhāvassa
atk-s0305a:211_11: atthabhedo. Yasmā yo so puññasambhāro rājānaṃ cakkavattiṃ paṭisandhivasena pātubhāvayati,
atk-s0305a:211_12: tasmā rañño cakkavattissa pātubhāvā. Na kevalañhi cakkavattiyeva, imāni pana satta
atk-s0305a:211_13: ratanānipi pātubhavantīti ayamettha attho. Yatheva hi so puññasambhāro rañño janakahetu,
atk-s0305a:211_14: evaṃ ratanānampi pariyāyena upanissayahetūti yuttamevetaṃ “rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa
atk-s0305a:212_0: Idāni tesaṃ ratanānaṃ sarūpavasena dassanatthaṃ katamesaṃ sattannaṃ cakkaratanassātiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:212_1: Tattha cakkaratanassātiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepādhippāyo – dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0305a:212_2: mahādīpānaṃ sirivibhavaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ samatthassa cakkaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0305a:212_3: tathā purebhattameva sāgarapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anupariyāyanasamatthassa vehāsaṅgamassa
atk-s0305a:212_4: hatthiratanassa, tādisasseva assaratanassa, caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:212_5: andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokadassanasamatthassa maṇiratanassa, chabbidhaṃ dosaṃ vivajjetvā
atk-s0305a:212_6: manāpacārino itthiratanassa, yojanappamāṇe padese antopathavigatānaṃ nidhīnaṃ dassanasamatthassa
atk-s0305a:212_8: jeṭṭhaputtasaṅkhātassa pariṇāyakaratanassa ca pātubhāvo hotīti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
atk-s0305a:212_9: Vitthārato pana tesaṃ cakkaratanādīnaṃ pātubhāvavidhānaṃ mahāsudassanādīsu suttesu
atk-s0305a:213_0: Satisambojjhaṅgaratanassātiādīsu sarikkhakatā evaṃ veditabbā – yatheva hi cakkavattino
atk-s0305a:213_1: cakkaratanaṃ sabbaratanānaṃ purecaraṃ, evaṃ satisambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ sabbesaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ
atk-s0305a:213_2: purecaranti, purecaraṇaṭṭhena cakkavattirañño cakkaratanasadisaṃ hoti. Cakkavattino
atk-s0305a:213_3: ca ratanesu mahākāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ hatthiratanaṃ, idampi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ
atk-s0305a:213_4: mahantaṃ dhammakāyūpapannaṃ accuggataṃ vipulaṃ mahantanti hatthiratanasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:213_5: Cakkavattino assaratanaṃ sīghaṃ lahu javaṃ, idampi vīriyasambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ sīghaṃ
atk-s0305a:213_6: lahu javanti imāya sīghalahujavatāya assaratanasadisaṃ hoti. Cakkavattino maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0305a:213_7: andhakāraṃ vidhamati, ālokaṃ dasseti, idampi pītisambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ tāya ekantakusalattā
atk-s0305a:213_8: kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamati, sahajātapaccayādivasena ñāṇālokaṃ dassetīti iminā andhakāravidhamanaālokadassanabhāvena
atk-s0305a:214_0: Cakkavattino itthiratanaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ paṭipassambheti, pariḷāhaṃ vūpasameti.
atk-s0305a:214_2: vūpasametīti itthiratanasadisaṃ hoti. Cakkavattino gahapatiratanaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:214_3: dhanadānena vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karoti, idampi samādhisambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ
atk-s0305a:214_4: yathicchitādivasena appanaṃ sampādeti, vikkhepaṃ pacchinditvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ karotīti
atk-s0305a:214_5: gahapatiratanasadisaṃ hoti. Cakkavattino ca pariṇāyakaratanaṃ sabbatthakiccasampādanena
atk-s0305a:214_6: appossukkataṃ karoti. Idampi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaratanaṃ cittuppādaṃ līnuddhaccato
atk-s0305a:214_7: mocetvā payogamajjhatte ṭhapayamānaṃ appossukkataṃ karotīti pariṇāyakaratanasadisaṃ
atk-s0305a:214_8: hoti. Iti imasmiṃ sutte catubhūmako sabbasaṅgāhikadhammaparicchedo kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:216: 225-231. Catutthe eḷamūgoti mukhena vācaṃ nicchāretuṃ sakkontopi dosehi mūgo asampannavacano. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:220_0: 232. Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāyātiādīsu
atk-s0305a:220_1: ayaṃ purimanayato viseso. Na kevalañhi satisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ete vuttappakārāva uppādāya,
atk-s0305a:220_2: uppannānaṃ vā bhāvanāya pāripūriyā paccayā honti, aññepi pana evaṃ veditabbā. Aparepi
atk-s0305a:220_3: hi cattāro dhammā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti satisampajaññaṃ muṭṭhassatipuggalaparivajjanatā
atk-s0305a:220_4: upaṭṭhitassatipuggalasevanatā tadadhimuttatāti. Abhikkantādīsu hi sattasu ṭhānesu
atk-s0305a:220_7: ca satisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. Evaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena
atk-s0305a:221_0: Satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paripucchakatā vatthuvisadakiriyā
atk-s0305a:222_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yadā hissa
atk-s0305a:222_1: kesanakhalomāni dīghāni honti, sarīraṃ vā ussannadosañceva sedamalamakkhitañca, tadā
atk-s0305a:222_2: ajjhattikavatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Yadā pana cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ
atk-s0305a:222_3: hoti, senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ, tadā bāhiravatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Tasmā kesādichedanena
atk-s0305a:222_6: visadaṃ kātabbaṃ. Etasmiñhi ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu
atk-s0305a:222_7: ñāṇampi avisadaṃ aparisuddhaṃ hoti aparisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya
atk-s0305a:222_8: uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu
atk-s0305a:222_9: cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakavaṭṭitelāni nissāya
atk-s0305a:222_10: uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Tena vuttaṃ – “vatthuvisadakiriyā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
atk-s0305a:223_0: Indriyasamattapaṭipādanā nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace hissa
atk-s0305a:223_1: saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, itarāni mandāni, tato vīriyindriyaṃ paggahakiccaṃ, satindriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:223_2: upaṭṭhānakiccaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepakiccaṃ, paññindriyaṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0305a:223_3: na sakkoti. Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā, yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ
atk-s0305a:223_4: jātaṃ, tathā amanasikaraṇena hāpetabbaṃ. Vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassanaṃ. Sace
atk-s0305a:223_5: pana vīriyindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:223_6: na itarāni itarakiccabhedaṃ. Tasmā taṃ passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabbaṃ. Tatthāpi
atk-s0305a:223_7: soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ
atk-s0305a:224_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti. Balavasaddho
atk-s0305a:224_1: hi mandapañño mudhappasanno hoti, avatthusmiṃ pasīdati. Balavapañño pana mandasaddho
atk-s0305a:224_2: kerāṭikapakkhaṃ bhajati, bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hoti. Cittuppādamatteneva
atk-s0305a:224_3: kusalaṃ hotīti atidhāvitvā dānādīni akaronto niraye uppajjati. Ubhinnaṃ samatāya
atk-s0305a:224_4: vatthusmiṃyeva pasīdati. Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā
atk-s0305a:224_5: kosajjaṃ abhibhavati. Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ
atk-s0305a:224_6: abhibhavati. Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati, vīriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:224_7: samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ samaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:225_0: Api ca samādhikammikassa balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ saddahanto okappento appanaṃ
atk-s0305a:225_1: pāpuṇissati. Samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi
atk-s0305a:225_2: so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vipassanākammikassa paññā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0305a:225_3: pāpuṇāti. Ubhinnaṃ pana samatāyapi appanā hotiyeva. Sati pana sabbattha balavatī
atk-s0305a:225_4: vaṭṭati. Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato,
atk-s0305a:225_5: kosajjapakkhikena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati. Tasmā sā loṇadhūpanaṃ viya
atk-s0305a:225_6: sabbabyañjanesu, sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā.
atk-s0305a:225_7: Tenāha “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Cittañhi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:225_8: ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ca sati, na vinā satiyā cittassa paggahaniggaho hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a:226_3: gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā. Tadadhimuttatā
atk-s0305a:226_5: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:227_0: Ekādasa dhammā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇatā,
atk-s0305a:228_2: pana sakaṭavahanādikālepi, pettivisaye anekānipi vassasahassāni ekaṃ buddhantarampi
atk-s0305a:228_4: aṭṭhicammamatteneva attabhāvena vātātapādidukkhānubhavanakālepi na sakkā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0305a:228_5: uppādetuṃ. Ayameva te bhikkhu kālo”ti evaṃ apāyabhayaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:229_0: “Na sakkā kusītena navalokuttaradhammaṃ laddhuṃ, āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā ayamānisaṃso
atk-s0305a:229_2: gatamaggo te gantabbo. So ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthiṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:230_0: “Ye taṃ piṇḍapātādīhi upaṭṭhahanti, ime te manussā neva ñātakā, na dāsakammakarā,
atk-s0305a:230_1: nāpi ‘taṃ nissāya jīvissāmā’ti te paṇītāni piṇḍapātādīni denti. Atha kho attano kārānaṃ
atk-s0305a:230_2: mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsamānā denti. Satthārāpi “ayaṃ ime paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyadaḷhibahulo
atk-s0305a:230_3: sukhaṃ viharissatī”ti na evaṃ sampassatā tuyhaṃ paccayā anuññātā, atha kho “ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:230_4: ime paribhuñjamānova samaṇadhammaṃ katvā vaṭṭadukkhato muccissatī’ti te paccayā anuññātā,
atk-s0305a:230_5: so dāni tvaṃ kusīto viharanto na taṃ piṇḍaṃ apacāyissasi, āraddhavīriyasseva hi piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ
atk-s0305a:230_6: nāma hotī”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi uppajjati mahāmittattherassa viya.
atk-s0305a:231_0: Thero kira kassakaleṇe nāma paṭivasati. Tasseva gocaragāme ekā mahāupāsikā theraṃ
atk-s0305a:231_1: puttaṃ katvā paṭijaggati. Sā ekadivasaṃ araññaṃ gacchantī dhītaraṃ āha – “amma, asukasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:231_2: ṭhāne purāṇataṇḍulā, asukasmiṃ khīraṃ, asukasmiṃ sappi, asukasmiṃ phāṇitaṃ, tava
atk-s0305a:231_3: bhātikassa ayyamittassa āgatakāle bhattaṃ pacitvā khīrasappiphāṇitehi saddhiṃ dehi,
atk-s0305a:231_4: tvañca bhuñjeyyāsi, ahaṃ pana hiyyo pakkaṃ pārivāsikabhattaṃ kañjiyena bhuttāmhī”ti.
atk-s0305a:231_5: “Divā kiṃ bhuñjissasi, ammā”ti? “Sākapaṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā kaṇataṇḍulehi ambilayāguṃ
atk-s0305a:232_0: Thero cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharantova taṃ saddaṃ sutvā attānaṃ ovadi “mahāupāsikā
atk-s0305a:232_1: kira kañjiyena pārivāsikabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā divāpi kaṇapaṇṇambilayāguṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0305a:232_2: tuyhaṃ atthāya pana purāṇataṇḍulādīni ācikkhati, taṃ nissāya kho panesā neva khettaṃ
atk-s0305a:232_3: na vatthuṃ na bhattaṃ na vatthaṃ paccāsīsati, tisso pana sampattiyo patthayamānā
atk-s0305a:232_4: deti, tvaṃ etissā tā sampattiyo dātuṃ sakkhissasi, na sakkhissasīti, ayaṃ kho pana
atk-s0305a:232_5: piṇḍapāto tayā sarāgena sadosena samohena na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti pattaṃ thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0305a:232_6: gaṇṭhikaṃ muñcitvā nivattitvā kassakaleṇameva gantvā pattaṃ heṭṭhāmañce, cīvaraṃ
atk-s0305a:232_7: cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā “arahattaṃ apāpuṇitvā na nikkhamissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0305a:232_8: nisīdi. Dīgharattaṃ appamatto hutvā nivutthabhikkhu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purebhattameva
atk-s0305a:232_9: arahattaṃ patvā vikasamānamiva padumaṃ mahākhīṇāsavo sitaṃ karontova nikkhami. Leṇadvāre
atk-s0305a:234: Yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0305a:235_0: Udānaṃ udānetvā “bhante, piṇḍāya paviṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ arahantānaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā
atk-s0305a:235_1: mahallakitthiyo dukkhā muccissantī”ti āha. Thero uṭṭhahitvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā kālaṃ
atk-s0305a:235_2: olokento “pātoyevā”ti ñatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a:236_0: Dārikāpi bhattaṃ sampādetvā “idāni me bhātā āgamissati, idāni āgamissatī”ti dvāraṃ
atk-s0305a:236_1: olokayamānā nisīdi. Sā there gharadvāraṃ sampatte pattaṃ gahetvā sappiphāṇitayojitassa
atk-s0305a:236_2: khīrapiṇḍapātassa pūretvā hatthe ṭhapesi. Thero “sukhaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:236_3: pakkāmi. Sāpi taṃ olokayamānāva aṭṭhāsi. Therassa hi tadā ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo
atk-s0305a:236_4: ahosi, vippasannāni indriyāni, mukhaṃ bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0305a:237_0: Mahāupāsikā araññato āgantvā “kiṃ, amma, bhātiko te āgato”ti pucchi. Sā sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0305a:237_1: pavattiṃ ārocesi. Upāsikā “ajja me puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti ñatvā
atk-s0305a:237_2: “abhiramati te, amma, bhātā buddhasāsane, na ukkaṇṭhatī”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:238_0: “Mahantaṃ kho panetaṃ satthudāyajjaṃ, yadidaṃ satta ariyadhanāni nāma, taṃ na sakkā
atk-s0305a:238_1: kusītena gahetuṃ. Yathā hi vippaṭipannaṃ puttaṃ mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ amhākaṃ aputto’ti
atk-s0305a:238_2: paribāhiraṃ karonti, so tesaṃ accayena dāyajjaṃ na labhati, evaṃ kusītopi idaṃ ariyadhanadāyajjaṃ
atk-s0305a:238_3: na labhati, āraddhavīriyova labhatī”ti dāyajjamahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:239_0: “Mahā kho pana te satthā, satthuno hi te mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakālepi abhinikkhamanepi
atk-s0305a:239_2: parinibbānakālepi dasasahassilokadhātu akampittha. Yuttaṃ nu kho te evarūpassa satthu
atk-s0305a:239_3: sāsane pabbajitvā kusītena bhavitu”nti evaṃ satthumahattaṃ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:240_0: “Jātiyāpi tvaṃ idāni na lāmakajātiko, asambhinnāya mahāsammatapaveṇiyā āgataukkākarājavaṃse
atk-s0305a:240_1: jātosi, suddhodanamahārājassa ca mahāmāyādeviyā ca nattā, rāhulabhaddassa kaniṭṭho,
atk-s0305a:240_2: tayā nāma evarūpena jinaputtena hutvā na yuttaṃ kusītena viharitu”nti evaṃ jātimahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:241_0: “Sāriputtamoggallānā ceva asīti mahāsāvakā ca vīriyeneva lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:241_1: Tvaṃ pana etesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjasi, na paṭipajjasī”ti evaṃ sabrahmacārimahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:242_0: Kucchiṃ pūretvā ṭhitaajagarasadise vissaṭṭhakāyikacetasikavīriye kusītapuggale parivajjentassāpi,
atk-s0305a:242_1: āraddhavīriye pahitatte puggale sevantassāpi ṭhānanisajjādīsu vīriyuppādanatthaṃ
atk-s0305a:242_2: ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:243_0: Ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – buddhānussati dhammo, saṅgho,
atk-s0305a:243_1: sīlaṃ, cāgo, devatānussati, upasamānussati, lūkhapuggalaparivajjanatā, siniddhapuggalasevanatā,
atk-s0305a:244_0: Buddhaguṇe anussarantassāpi hi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo
atk-s0305a:244_1: uppajjati, dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassāpi, dīgharattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā rakkhitaṃ
atk-s0305a:244_3: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃ nāma adamhā”ti cāgaṃ
atk-s0305a:244_4: paccavekkhantassāpi, gihinopi evarūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a:244_5: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devattaṃ pattā, tathārūpānaṃ attani atthitaṃ paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a:244_6: samāpattiyā vikkhambhitā kilesā saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni na samudācarantīti paccavekkhantassāpi,
atk-s0305a:244_9: pasādabahule muducitte siniddhapuggale sevantassāpi, ratanattayaguṇaparidīpake pasādanīye
atk-s0305a:244_11: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:245_0: Satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – paṇītabhojanasevanatā,
atk-s0305a:246_0: Paṇītañhi siniddhaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi, sītuṇhesu utūsu ṭhānādīsu ca iriyāpathesu
atk-s0305a:246_1: sappāyaṃ utuñca iriyāpathañca sevantassāpi passaddhi uppajjati. Yo pana mahāpurisajātiko
atk-s0305a:246_2: sabbautuiriyāpathakkhamova hoti, na taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā
atk-s0305a:246_3: atthi, tasseva visabhāge utuiriyāpathe vajjetvā sabhāge sevantassa uppajjati. Majjhattapayogo
atk-s0305a:246_4: vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇā. Iminā majjhattapayogena uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:246_5: Yo leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paraṃ viheṭhayamānova vicarati, evarūpaṃ sāraddhakāyapuggalaṃ parivajjentassāpi,
atk-s0305a:246_6: saṃyatapādapāṇiṃ passaddhakāyaṃ puggalaṃ sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu passaddhiuppādanatthāya
atk-s0305a:246_7: ninnapoṇapabbhāracittassāpi uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:247_0: Dasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – vatthuvisadakiriyatā, indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā,
atk-s0305a:247_1: nimittakusalatā, samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatā, samaye cittassa niggaṇhanatā, samaye
atk-s0305a:247_3: tadadhimuttatāti. Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyatā ca indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:248_0: Nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā. Samaye cittassa paggaṇhanatāti
atk-s0305a:248_1: yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayavīriyapītisambojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpanena
atk-s0305a:248_2: tassa paggaṇhanaṃ. Samaye cittassa niggaṇhanatāti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi
atk-s0305a:248_4: tassa niggaṇhanaṃ. Samaye sampahaṃsanatāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya
atk-s0305a:248_5: vā upasamasukhānaṃ vigamena vā nirassādaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena
atk-s0305a:248_6: saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni nāma jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ
atk-s0305a:248_7: pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ
atk-s0305a:248_8: dukkhanti. Ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena ca pasādaṃ janeti, ayaṃ vuccati “samaye sampahaṃsanatā”ti.
atk-s0305a:249_0: Samaye ajjhupekkhanatā nāma yasmiṃ samaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ
atk-s0305a:249_1: anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
atk-s0305a:249_2: na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya samappavattesu assesu. Ayaṃ vuccati “samaye ajjhupekkhanatā”ti.
atk-s0305a:249_3: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā appattānaṃ vikkhittacittānaṃ
atk-s0305a:249_4: puggalānaṃ ārakā parivajjanaṃ. Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma upacārena vā appanāya
atk-s0305a:249_5: vā samāhitacittānaṃ sevanā bhajanā payirupāsanā. Tadadhimuttatā nāma ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0305a:249_6: samādhiuppādanatthameva ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatā. Evañhi paṭipajjato esa uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:249_7: Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:250_0: Pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti – sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā,
atk-s0305a:250_2: tadadhimuttatāti. Tattha dvīhākārehi sattamajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpeti – “tvaṃ attanova
atk-s0305a:250_3: kammena āgantvā attanova kammena gamissasi, esopi attano kammena āgantvā attanova
atk-s0305a:250_4: kammena gamissati, tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ kammassakatapaccavekkhaṇena ca – “paramatthato
atk-s0305a:250_5: sattoyeva natthi, so tvaṃ kaṃ kelāyasī”ti evaṃ nissattapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Dvīhevākārehi
atk-s0305a:250_6: saṅkhāramajjhattataṃ samuṭṭhāpeti – “idaṃ cīvaraṃ anupubbena vaṇṇavikāratañceva jiṇṇabhāvañca
atk-s0305a:250_7: upagantvā pādapuñchanacoḷakaṃ hutvā yaṭṭhikoṭiyā chaḍḍanīyaṃ bhavissati, sace panassa
atk-s0305a:250_8: sāmiko bhaveyya, nāyaṃ evaṃ vinassituṃ dadeyyā”ti evaṃ assāmikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena
atk-s0305a:250_9: ca, “anaddhaniyaṃ idaṃ tāvakālika”nti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena ca. Yathā
atk-s0305a:250_10: ca cīvare, evaṃ pattādīsupi yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0305a:251_0: Sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanatāti ettha yo puggalo gihi vā attano puttadhītādike,
atk-s0305a:251_1: pabbajito vā attano antevāsikasamānupajjhāyakādike mamāyati, sahatthāva nesaṃ kesacchedana-sūcikamma-cīvaradhovana-rajana-pattapacanādīni
atk-s0305a:251_2: karoti, muhuttampi apassanto “asuko sāmaṇero kuhiṃ, asuko daharo kuhi”nti bhantamigo
atk-s0305a:251_3: viya ito cito ca āloketi, aññena kesacchedanādīnaṃ atthāya “muhuttaṃ tāva asukaṃ
atk-s0305a:251_4: pesethā”ti yāciyamānopi “amhepi taṃ attano kammaṃ na kārema, tumhe naṃ gahetvā kilamessathā”ti
atk-s0305a:251_5: na deti, ayaṃ sattakelāyano nāma. Yo pana cīvarapattathālakakattarayaṭṭhiādīni mamāyati,
atk-s0305a:251_6: aññassa hatthena parāmasitumpi na deti, tāvakālikaṃ yācitopi “mayampi imaṃ dhanāyantā
atk-s0305a:251_7: na paribhuñjāma, tumhākaṃ kiṃ dassāmā”ti vadati, ayaṃ saṅkhārakelāyano nāma. Yo pana
atk-s0305a:251_8: tesu dvīsupi vatthūsu majjhatto udāsino, ayaṃ sattasaṅkhāramajjhatto nāma. Iti ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:251_11: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti.
atk-s0305a:252_0: Asubhanimittanti uddhumātakādibhedā dasa asubhārammaṇā dhammā. Yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti
atk-s0305a:252_1: ettha pana yonisomanasikāro nāma upāyamanasikāro, pathamanasikāro, uppādakamanasikāro.
atk-s0305a:252_2: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti – asubhanimittassa uggaho, asubhabhāvanānuyogo,
atk-s0305a:252_3: indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti.
atk-s0305a:253_0: Dasavidhañhi asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati, bhāventassāpi,
atk-s0305a:253_1: indriyesu guttadvārassāpi, catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā
atk-s0305a:256_1: pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu dasaasubhanimittāya-sappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0305a:256_2: “cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa
atk-s0305a:257_0: Mettā cetovimuttīti ettha mettāti vutte appanāpi upacāropi vaṭṭati, cetovimuttīti
atk-s0305a:257_1: appanāyeva. Yonisomanasikāro vuttalakkhaṇova. Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya
atk-s0305a:258_1: pahīyati, tathā odhisoanodhisodisāpharaṇavasena mettaṃ bhāventassāpi. “Tvaṃ etassa
atk-s0305a:258_2: kuddho kiṃ karissasi? Kimassa sīlādīni nāsetuṃ sakkhissasi? Nanu tvaṃ attano kammena
atk-s0305a:258_3: āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi? Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccikaṅgāratattaayasalākagūthādīni
atk-s0305a:258_4: gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti. Esopi tava kuddho kiṃ karissati? Kiṃ te
atk-s0305a:258_5: sīlādīni vināsetuṃ sakkhissati? Esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati?
atk-s0305a:258_6: Appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake
atk-s0305a:258_7: patissatī”ti evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi, ubhayakammassakataṃ
atk-s0305a:258_8: paccavekkhitvā paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassāpi, assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte
atk-s0305a:258_9: sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu mettānissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati.
atk-s0305a:258_10: Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi
atk-s0305a:258_11: pahīnassa byāpādassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti.
atk-s0305a:259_0: Atthi bhikkhave aratītiādi vuttatthameva. Api ca cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya
atk-s0305a:260_0: Āharahatthakaṃ, bhuttavamitakaṃ, tatravaṭṭakaṃ, alaṃsāṭakaṃ, kākamāsakabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0305a:260_1: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī
atk-s0305a:260_2: viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati, catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa
atk-s0305a:260_3: bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassapi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0305a:260_4: Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, tato aññaṃ parivattentassāpi, rattiṃ candālokadīpālokaukkāloke
atk-s0305a:260_5: divā sūriyālokaṃ manasikarontassāpi, abbhokāse vasantassāpi, mahākassapattherasadise
atk-s0305a:260_6: pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu
atk-s0305a:260_7: dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā thinamiddhassa
atk-s0305a:260_8: pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnassa thinamiddhassa arahattamaggena
atk-s0305a:261_0: Atthi bhikkhave cetaso vūpasamotiādīni vuttatthāneva. Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa
atk-s0305a:261_1: pahānāya saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, vuddhasevitatā,
atk-s0305a:262_0: Bāhusaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca
atk-s0305a:262_1: atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassāpi,
atk-s0305a:262_2: vinayapaññattiyaṃ ciṇṇavasībhāvatāya pakataññunopi, vuddhe mahallakatthere upasaṅkamantassāpi,
atk-s0305a:262_3: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a:262_5: dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīne
atk-s0305a:262_6: uddhaccakukkucce uddhaccassa arahattamaggena, kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo hotīti.
atk-s0305a:263_0: Kusalākusalā dhammātiādīnipi vuttatthāneva. Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya
atk-s0305a:263_1: saṃvattanti – bahussutatā, paripucchakatā, vinaye pakataññutā, adhimokkhabahulatā,
atk-s0305a:264_0: Bāhusaccenapi hi ekaṃ vā…pe… pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi
atk-s0305a:264_1: vicikicchā pahīyati, tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha paripucchābahulassāpi, vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassāpi,
atk-s0305a:264_3: kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, ṭhānanisajjādīsu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ
atk-s0305a:264_4: guṇanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati. Tena vuttaṃ “cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya
atk-s0305a:264_5: saṃvattantī”ti. Imehi pana chahi dhammehi pahīnāya vicikicchāya sotāpattimaggena
atk-s0305a:264_6: āyatiṃ anuppādo hoti. Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte desanaṃ tīhi bhavehi nivattetvā arahattena
atk-s0305a:264_7: kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:266_0: 233. Dutiye sambahulāti vinayapariyāyena tayo janā sambahulāti vuccanti, tato paraṃ
atk-s0305a:266_1: saṅgho. Suttantapariyāyena tayo tayo eva, tato uddhaṃ sambahulā. Idha suttantapariyāyena
atk-s0305a:266_2: sambahulāti veditabbā. Piṇḍāya pavisiṃsūti piṇḍāya paviṭṭhā. Te pana na tāva paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0305a:266_3: “pavisissāmā”ti nikkhantattā pana pavisiṃsūti vuttā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0305a:266_4: nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ apattopi “kahaṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati,
atk-s0305a:266_5: evaṃ. Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti jetavanassa avidūre aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo
atk-s0305a:266_6: atthi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Samaṇo āvusoti āvuso tumhākaṃ satthā samaṇo gotamo.
atk-s0305a:267_0: Mayampi kho āvuso sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desemāti titthiyānaṃ samaye “pañca nīvaraṇā
atk-s0305a:267_1: pahātabbā, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvetabbā”ti etaṃ natthi. Te pana ārāmaṃ gantvā parisapariyante
atk-s0305a:267_2: ṭhatvā aññaṃ olokento viya aññavihitakā viya hutvā bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0305a:267_3: Tato “samaṇo gotamo ‘idaṃ pajahatha idaṃ bhāvethā’ti vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā attano
atk-s0305a:267_4: ārāmaṃ gantvā ārāmamajjhe āsanaṃ paññāpetvā upaṭṭhāyakaupaṭṭhāyikāhi parivutā sīsaṃ
atk-s0305a:267_5: ukkhipitvā kāyaṃ unnāmetvā attano sayambhūñāṇena paṭividdhākāraṃ dassentā – “pañca
atk-s0305a:267_6: nīvaraṇā nāma pahātabbā, satta bojjhaṅgā nāma bhāvetabbā”ti kathenti.
atk-s0305a:268_0: Idha no āvusoti ettha idhāti imasmiṃ paññāpane. Ko visesoti kiṃ adhikaṃ? Ko adhippayāsoti
atk-s0305a:268_1: ko adhikappayogo? Kiṃ nānākaraṇanti kiṃ nānattaṃ? Dhammadesanāya vā dhammadesananti
atk-s0305a:268_2: yadidaṃ samaṇassa vā gotamassa dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ amhākaṃ dhammadesanaṃ, amhākaṃ
atk-s0305a:268_3: vā dhammadesanāya saddhiṃ samaṇassa gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ ārabbha nānākaraṇaṃ vucceyya,
atk-s0305a:268_4: taṃ kinnāmāti vadanti. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:269_0: Neva abhinandiṃsūti “evameva”nti na sampaṭicchiṃsu. Nappaṭikkosiṃsūti “nayidaṃ eva”nti
atk-s0305a:269_1: na paṭisedhiṃsu. Kiṃ pana te pahontā evaṃ akaṃsu, udāhu appahontāti? Pahontā. Na
atk-s0305a:269_2: hi te ettakaṃ kathaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkonti “āvuso tumhākaṃ samaye pañca nīvaraṇā pahātabbā
atk-s0305a:269_3: nāma natthi, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvetabbā nāma natthī”ti. Evaṃ pana tesaṃ ahosi – “atthi
atk-s0305a:269_4: no etaṃ kathāpābhataṃ, mayaṃ etaṃ satthu ārocessāma, atha no satthā madhuradhammadesanaṃ desessatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:270_0: Pariyāyoti kāraṇaṃ. Na ceva sampāyissantīti sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0305a:270_1: Uttariñca vighātanti asampāyanato uttarimpi dukkhaṃ āpajjissanti. Sampādetvā kathetuṃ
atk-s0305a:270_2: asakkontānañhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati. Yathā taṃ, bhikkhave, avisayasminti ettha tanti
atk-s0305a:270_3: nipātamattaṃ, yathāti kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā avisaye pañho pucchitoti attho. Sadevaketi
atk-s0305a:270_4: saha devehi sadevake. Samārakādīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ tīṇi ṭhānāni loke pakkhipitvā
atk-s0305a:270_5: dve pajāyāti, pañcahipi sattalokameva pariyādiyitvā etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke
atk-s0305a:270_6: devaṃ vā manussaṃ vā na samanupassāmīti dīpeti. Ito vā pana sutvāti ito vā pana mama
atk-s0305a:270_7: sāsanato sutvā. Ito sutvā hi tathāgato tathāgatasāvakopi ārādheyya, paritoseyya,
atk-s0305a:271_0: Idāni attano tesaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena cittārādhanaṃ dassento katamo ca bhikkhave
atk-s0305a:271_1: pariyāyotiādimāha. Tattha ajjhattaṃ kāmacchandoti attano pañcakkhandhe ārabbha uppannachandarāgo.
atk-s0305a:271_2: Bahiddhā kāmacchandoti paresaṃ pañcakkhandhe ārabbha uppannachandarāgo. Uddesaṃ gacchatīti
atk-s0305a:271_3: gaṇanaṃ gacchati. Ajjhattaṃ byāpādoti attano hatthapādādīsu uppannapaṭigho. Bahiddhā
atk-s0305a:271_4: byāpādoti paresaṃ tesu uppannapaṭigho. Ajjhattaṃ dhammesu vicikicchāti attano khandhesu
atk-s0305a:271_5: vimati. Bahiddhā dhammesu vicikicchāti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mahāvicikicchā. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0305a:271_6: dhammesu satīti ajjhattike saṅkhāre paṭiggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. Bahiddhā dhammesu
atk-s0305a:271_7: satīti bahiddhā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:272_0: Kāyikanti caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. Cetasikanti – “na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0305a:272_1: pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi, yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī”ti evaṃ kāyapayogaṃ
atk-s0305a:272_2: vinā uppannavīriyaṃ. Kāyappassaddhīti tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ darathapassaddhi. Cittappassaddhīti
atk-s0305a:273_0: Imasmiṃ sutte missakasambojjhaṅgā kathitā. Etesu hi ajjhattadhammesu sati, pavicayo,
atk-s0305a:273_1: upekkhāti ime attano khandhārammaṇattā lokiyāva honti, tathā maggaṃ apattaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:273_2: Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhī kiñcāpi rūpāvacarā honti, rūpāvacare pana bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0305a:273_3: na labbhantīti lokuttarāva honti. Ye ca therā brahmavihāravipassanāpādakajjhānādīsu
atk-s0305a:273_4: bojjhaṅge uddharanti, tesaṃ matena rūpāvacarāpi arūpāvacarāpi honti. Bojjhaṅgesu
atk-s0305a:273_5: hi arūpāvacare pītiyeva ekantena na labbhati, sesā cha missakāva hontīti. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0305a:273_6: keci bhikkhū sotāpannā jātā, keci sakadāgāmī, keci anāgāmī, keci arahantoti.
atk-s0305a:275_0: 234. Tatiye satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmīti loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbakammikāmaccaṃ
atk-s0305a:275_1: viya ca sabbattha icchitabbaṃ vadāmīti attho. Yathā hi loṇadhūpanaṃ sabbabyañjanesupi
