atk-s0305a:275_2: nivisati, yathā ca sabbakammiko amacco yodhakammampi karoti mantakammampi paṭihārakammampīti
atk-s0305a:275_3: sabbakiccāni sādheti, evaṃ uddhatassa cittassa niggaṇhanaṃ, līnassa paggaṇhananti
atk-s0305a:275_4: sabbametaṃ satiyā ijjhati, na sakkā vinā satiyā etaṃ sampādetuṃ, tasmā evamāha. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:277_0: 235. Catutthe mettāsahagatena cetasātiādi sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0305a:277_1: Mayampi kho, āvuso, sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desemāti idampi te purimanayeneva satthu
atk-s0305a:277_2: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā vadanti. Titthiyānañhi samaye pañcanīvaraṇappahānaṃ vā mettādibrahmavihārabhāvanā
atk-s0305a:277_3: vā natthi. Kiṃ gatikā hotīti kiṃ nipphatti hoti. Kiṃ paramāti kiṃ uttamā. Kiṃ phalāti
atk-s0305a:277_4: kiṃ ānisaṃsā. Kiṃ pariyosānāti kiṃ niṭṭhā. Mettāsahagatanti mettāya sahagataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0305a:277_5: sampayuttaṃ. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Vivekanissitādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-s0305a:278_0: Appaṭikūlanti duvidhaṃ appaṭikūlaṃ – sattaappaṭikūlañca, saṅkhāraappaṭikūlañca. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:278_1: appaṭikūle iṭṭhe vatthusminti attho. Paṭikūlasaññīti aniṭṭhasaññī. Kathaṃ panettha
atk-s0305a:278_2: evaṃ viharati? Asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ
atk-s0305a:278_3: “kathaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharati. Iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati,
atk-s0305a:278_4: aniccato vā upasaṃharatī”ti. Paṭikūle pana aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ
atk-s0305a:278_5: vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma. Yathāha “kathaṃ paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī
atk-s0305a:278_6: viharati. Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṃharatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:278_7: Ubhayamissakapadesupi eseva nayo. Appaṭikūlappaṭikūlesu hi tadeva asubhapharaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:278_8: vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma. Paṭikūlāpaṭikūlesu
atk-s0305a:278_9: ca tadeva mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a:278_10: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṃ
atk-s0305a:278_11: pavattayamāno “appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako tattha
atk-s0305a:279_0: Ettāvatā ca imassa bhikkhuno mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ
atk-s0305a:279_1: katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassa saha vipassanāya maggasambojjhaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0305a:279_2: ariyiddhiyā ca dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā siyā. Idaṃ pana mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0305a:279_3: katvā saṅkhāre sammasantopi yo arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti, yasmā tassa arahattaparamā
atk-s0305a:279_4: mettā na hoti. Yaṃparamā pana hoti, taṃ dassetabbaṃ. Tasmā tassa dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:279_5: desanā āraddhā. Parato sabbaso vā pana rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīsupi iminā nayena
atk-s0305a:280_0: Subhaparamanti subhaniṭṭhaṃ, subhakoṭikaṃ, subhanipphattiṃ. Idhapaññassāti idheva
atk-s0305a:280_1: paññā assa, nayimaṃ lokaṃ atikkamatīti idhapañño, tassa idhapaññassa, lokiyapaññassāti
atk-s0305a:280_2: attho. Uttarivimuttiṃ appaṭivijjhatoti lokuttaradhammaṃ appaṭivijjhantassa. Yo pana
atk-s0305a:280_3: paṭivijjhituṃ sakkoti, tassa arahattaparamāva mettā hotīti attho. Karuṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:281_0: Kasmā panetāsaṃ mettādīnaṃ subhaparamāditā vuttā bhagavatāti? Sabhāgavasena tassa
atk-s0305a:281_1: tassa upanissayattā. Mettāvihārissa hi sattā appaṭikūlā honti, athassa appaṭikūlaparicayā
atk-s0305a:281_2: appaṭikūlesu parisuddhavaṇṇesu nīlādīsu cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha
atk-s0305a:281_3: cittaṃ pakkhandati. Iti mettā subhavimokkhassa upanissayo hoti, na tato paraṃ, tasmā
atk-s0305a:282_1: pavattisambhavato rūpe ādīnavo parividito hoti, athassa parividitarūpādīnavattā pathavīkasiṇādīsu
atk-s0305a:282_2: aññataraṃ ugghāṭetvā rūpanissaraṇe ākāse cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha
atk-s0305a:282_3: cittaṃ pakkhandati. Iti karuṇā ākāsānañcāyatanassa upanissayo hoti, na tato paraṃ,
atk-s0305a:283_0: Muditāvihārissa pana tena tena pāmojjakāraṇena uppannapāmojjasattānaṃ viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa
atk-s0305a:283_1: muditāya pavattisambhavato viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitaṃ hoti, athassa anukkamādhigataṃ
atk-s0305a:283_2: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ atikkamma ākāsanimittagocare viññāṇe cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva
atk-s0305a:283_3: tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Iti muditā viññāṇañcāyatanassa upanissayo hoti, na tato
atk-s0305a:284_0: Upekkhāvihārissa pana “sattā sukhitā vā hontu, dukkhato vā vimuccantu, sampattasukhato
atk-s0305a:284_2: hoti. Athassa paramatthagāhato vimukhabhāvaparicitacittassa paramatthato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittassa
atk-s0305a:284_3: ca anukkamādhigataṃ viññāṇāñcāyatanaṃ samatikkammasambhavato avijjamāne paramatthabhūtassa
atk-s0305a:284_4: viññāṇassa abhāve cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Iti
atk-s0305a:284_5: upekkhā ākiñcaññāyatanassa upanissayo hoti, na tato paraṃ, tasmā ākiñcaññāyatanaparamāti
atk-s0305a:284_6: vuttā. Desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0305a:286_0: 236. Pañcame pagevāti paṭhamaññeva. Kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitenāti kāmarāgagahitena. Kāmarāgaparetenāti
atk-s0305a:286_1: kāmarāgānugatena. Nissaraṇanti tividhaṃ kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:286_2: tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ samucchedanissaraṇanti. Tattha asubhe paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:286_3: nāma, vipassanā tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ nāma, arahattamaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:286_4: Taṃ tividhampi nappajānātīti attho. Attatthampītiādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho
atk-s0305a:286_5: attattho nāma, paccayadāyakānaṃ attho parattho nāma, sveva duvidhopi ubhayattho nāma.
atk-s0305a:287_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – byāpādassa nissaraṇantiādīsu hi dveva nissaraṇāni vikkhambhananissaraṇañca
atk-s0305a:287_1: samucchedanissaraṇañca. Tattha byāpādassa tāva mettāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:287_3: arahattamaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ. Uddhaccakukkuccassa yo koci samatho vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:287_4: uddhaccassa panettha arahattamaggo, kukkuccassa anāgāmimaggo samucchedanissaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a:288_0: Yā panettha seyyathāpi brāhmaṇa udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vātiādikā upamā vuttā,
atk-s0305a:288_1: tāsu udapattoti udakabharitā pāti. Saṃsaṭṭhoti vaṇṇabhedakaraṇavasena saṃsaṭṭho.
atk-s0305a:288_2: Pakkuthitoti kuthito. Usmudakajātoti usumajāto. Sevālapaṇakapariyonaddhoti tilabījakādibhedena
atk-s0305a:288_3: sevālena vā nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena vā udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā nibbattapaṇakena pariyonaddho.
atk-s0305a:288_4: Vāteritoti vātena erito kampito. Āviloti appasanno. Luḷitoti asannisinno. Kalalībhūtoti
atk-s0305a:288_5: kaddamībhūto. Andhakāre nikkhittoti koṭṭhantarādibhede anālokaṭṭhāne ṭhapito. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:288_6: sutte bhagavā tīhi bhavehi desanaṃ nivattetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0305a:290_0: 237. Chaṭṭhe aññāṇāya adassanāyāti aññāṇatthāya adassanatthāya. Taggha bhagavā nīvaraṇāti
atk-s0305a:290_1: ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇā. Kāyakilamathoti kāyadaratho. Cittakilamathoti cittadaratho.
atk-s0305a:290_2: Sopi me paṭippassaddhoti tassa kira satthu santike sītalaṃ utusappāyaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0305a:290_3: nisinnassa kāyadaratho paṭipassambhi, tasmiṃ paṭipassaddhe tadanvayeneva cittadarathopi.
atk-s0305a:290_4: Apica maggenevassa etaṃ ubhayampi passaddhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:293_0: 238. Sattamādīsu aṭṭhikasaññāti aṭṭhikaṃ aṭṭhikanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā. Taṃ
atk-s0305a:293_1: panetaṃ bhāvayato yāva nimittaṃ na uppajjati, tāva chavipi cammampi upaṭṭhāti. Nimitte
atk-s0305a:293_2: pana uppanne chavicammāni neva upaṭṭhahanti, saṅkhavaṇṇo suddhaaṭṭhikasaṅghāṭova
atk-s0305a:293_3: upaṭṭhāti hatthikkhandhagataṃ dhammikatissarājānaṃ olokentassa sāmaṇerassa viya,
atk-s0305a:293_4: paṭimagge hasamānaṃ itthiṃ olokentassa cetiyapabbatavāsino tissattherassa viya cāti.
atk-s0305a:293_5: Vatthūni visuddhimagge vitthāritāni. Sati vā upādiseseti gahaṇasese upādānasese vijjamānamhi.
atk-s0305a:295_0: 239-247. Puḷavakasaññāti puḷavaṃ puḷavanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā. Vinīlakasaññādīsupi
atk-s0305a:295_1: eseva nayo. Vinicchayakathā panettha saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttā. Mettādayo
atk-s0305a:298_1: maraṇapaṭibaddhaṃ me jīvita”nti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasaññā. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti
atk-s0305a:298_2: odanakummāsādimhi ajjhoharaṇīye paṭikūlasaññā. Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāti sakalalokasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:298_3: anabhiratiṃ uppādentassa uppannasaññā. Pahānasaññāvirāgasaññāti dve pubbabhāgā. Nirodhasaññā
atk-s0305a:298_4: missakā. Evametāni aṭṭhikasaññādīni vīsati kammaṭṭhānāni niddiṭṭhāni. Tesaṃ navasu
atk-s0305a:298_5: appanā honti, ekādasa upacārajjhānikā. Sesā panettha vinicchayakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0305a:301_0: 367. Satipaṭṭhānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā
atk-s0305a:301_1: ropite ambavane. Taṃ kira tassā uyyānaṃ ahosi. Sā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā
atk-s0305a:301_2: tattha vihāraṃ kāretvā tathāgatassa niyyātesi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ekāyanvāyanti
atk-s0305a:301_3: ekāyano ayaṃ. Tattha ekāyanoti ekamaggo. Maggassa hi –
atk-s0305a:303: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0305a:304_0: Bahūni nāmāni. Svāyaṃ idha ayananāmena vutto. Tasmā ekāyanvāyaṃ, bhikkhave, maggoti
atk-s0305a:304_1: ettha ekamaggo. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:304_2: Maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena ca.
atk-s0305a:305_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ
atk-s0305a:305_1: sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya. Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca
atk-s0305a:305_2: samatikkamāya, pahānāyāti attho. Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa
atk-s0305a:305_3: ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ñāyassa
atk-s0305a:305_4: adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0305a:305_5: hoti. Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya
atk-s0305a:305_6: saṃvattati. Tenāha “ñāyassa adhigamāyā”ti. Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā
atk-s0305a:305_7: nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya, attapaccakkhāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:305_8: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti. Tenāha “nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
atk-s0305a:306_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sattahi padehi ekāyanamaggassa vaṇṇo bhāsito, so kasmāti ce? Bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0305a:306_1: ussāhajananatthaṃ. Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū – “ayaṃ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṃ
atk-s0305a:306_2: sokaṃ, vācāvippalāpabhūtaṃ paridevaṃ, kāyikaasātabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ, cetasikaasātabhūtaṃ
atk-s0305a:306_3: domanassanti cattāro upaddave harati. Visuddhiṃ, ñāyaṃ, nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti
atk-s0305a:306_4: ussāhajātā imaṃ desanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ, dhāretabbaṃ, imañca maggaṃ
atk-s0305a:306_5: bhāvetabbaṃ maññissanti. Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi kambalavāṇijādayo
atk-s0305a:307_0: Yadidanti nipāto, ye imeti ayamassa attho. Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena “na tato
atk-s0305a:307_1: heṭṭhā, na uddha”nti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṃ dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā
atk-s0305a:307_2: satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0305a:307_3: “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi taṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0305a:307_4: Ko ca, bhikkhave, kāyassa samudayo? Āharasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro
atk-s0305a:307_5: satipaṭṭhānanti vutto. Tathā “kāyo upaṭṭhānaṃ, no sati, sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati
atk-s0305a:307_6: cā”tiādīsupi. Tassa attho – patiṭṭhāti asminti paṭṭhānaṃ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā
atk-s0305a:307_7: paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Padhānaṃ ṭhānanti vā paṭṭhānaṃ. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:308_0: “Tayo satipaṭṭhānā, yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti
atk-s0305a:308_1: ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0305a:308_2: vuttā. Tassattho – paṭṭhapetabbato paṭṭhānaṃ, pavattayitabbatoti attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabboti?
atk-s0305a:309_0: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana
atk-s0305a:309_1: satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Tassattho – patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā
atk-s0305a:309_2: pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho. Satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0305a:309_3: sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ, iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Idamidha adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0305a:310_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā “satipaṭṭhānā”ti bahuvacanaṃ katanti? Satīnaṃ bahuttā. Ārammaṇabhedena
atk-s0305a:310_1: hi bahukā satiyo. Atha “maggo”ti kasmā ekavacananti? Magganaṭṭhena ekattā. Catassopi
atk-s0305a:310_2: hi etā satiyo magganaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti. Vutañhetaṃ “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo?
atk-s0305a:310_3: Nibbānamagganaṭṭhena, nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena cā”ti. Catassopi cetā aparabhāge
atk-s0305a:310_4: kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti, ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi
atk-s0305a:310_5: maggiyantīti tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā. Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti.
atk-s0305a:311_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Kāyeti rūpakāye. Kāyānupassīti kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo,
atk-s0305a:311_1: kāyaṃ vā anupassamāno. Ayañhi bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ
atk-s0305a:311_2: vasena aniccato anupassati, no niccato, dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato, anattato
atk-s0305a:311_3: anupassati, no attato, nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no rajjati, nirodheti,
atk-s0305a:311_4: no samudeti, paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:311_5: pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṃ pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:311_6: pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṃ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṃ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṃ
atk-s0305a:312_0: Viharatīti irīyati. Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapatīti ātāpo, vīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0305a:312_1: Ātāpo assa atthīti ātāpī. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti
atk-s0305a:312_2: kāyapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā
atk-s0305a:312_3: paññāya anupassati. Na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi, tenevāha “satiñca
atk-s0305a:312_4: khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti. Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti
atk-s0305a:312_5: ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo
atk-s0305a:312_6: antarāyakaro hoti, asampajāno upāyapariggahe anupāyaparivajjane ca sammuyhati, muṭṭhassati
atk-s0305a:312_7: upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti, tenassa taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0305a:312_8: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati, tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno
atk-s0305a:313_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañjassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0305a:313_1: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
atk-s0305a:313_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi tasmiṃyeva kāye. Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti
atk-s0305a:313_3: adhippeto. Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati, vedanādīsupi
atk-s0305a:313_4: pahīyati eva. Tasmā “pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko”ti vibhaṅge vuttaṃ. Lokasaṅkhātattā
atk-s0305a:313_5: vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panāha “tattha katamo loko, sveva
atk-s0305a:313_6: kāyo loko”ti, ayamevettha attho. Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:314_0: Vedanāsūti ettha tisso vedanā, tā ca lokiyā eva, cittampi lokiyaṃ, tathā dhammā.
atk-s0305a:314_1: Yathā pana vedanā anupassitabbā, tathā anupassanto esa vedanānupassīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:314_2: Esa nayo cittadhammesu. Kathañca vedanā anupassitabbāti? Sukhā tāva vedanā dukkhato,
atk-s0305a:317: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:318_0: Sabbā eva cetā dukkhātipi anupassitabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0305a:318_1: taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti. Sukhadukkhatopi ca anupassitabbā, yathāha – “sukhā kho,
atk-s0305a:318_2: āvuso visākha, vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Apica
atk-s0305a:319_1: aniccādianupassanānaṃ sarāgādīnañca bhedānaṃ vasena anupassitabbaṃ. Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ
atk-s0305a:319_3: pabhedānaṃ vasena anupassitabbā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
atk-s0305a:321_0: 368. Dutiye satoti kāyādianupassanāsatiyā samannāgato. Sampajānoti catusampajaññapaññāya
atk-s0305a:321_1: samannāgato. Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ, paṭikkantaṃ
atk-s0305a:321_2: nivattanaṃ, tadubhayampi catūsu iriyāpathesu labbhati. Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto
atk-s0305a:321_3: abhikkamati nāma, paṭinivattanto paṭikkamati nāma. Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato
atk-s0305a:321_4: onamanto abhikkamati nāma, pacchato apanāmento paṭikkamati nāma. Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova
atk-s0305a:321_5: āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma, pacchimaaṅgappadesaṃ paccāsaṃsaranto
atk-s0305a:322: Sampajānakārī hotīti sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī. So hi abhikkantādīsu sampajaññaṃ karoteva, na katthaci sampajaññavirahito hoti.
atk-s0305a:323_1: catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ. Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṃ
atk-s0305a:323_2: nu me ettha gatena attho atthi, natthī”ti atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ
atk-s0305a:323_4: dhammato vaḍḍhi. Cetiyaṃ disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṃ, saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:323_5: pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Mahāvihārasmiñhi dakkhiṇadvāre
atk-s0305a:323_6: ṭhatvā mahācetiyaṃ olokentā tiṃsasahassabhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, tathā pacchimadvāre
atk-s0305a:323_7: uttaradvāre pācīnadvāre ca, tathā pañhamaṇḍapaṭṭhāne abhayavāpipāḷiyaṃ, thūpārāmadvāre
atk-s0305a:324_0: Mahāariyavaṃsabhāṇakatthero panāha “kiṃ tumhe vadatha, mahācetiyassa samantā kucchivedikāya
atk-s0305a:324_1: heṭṭhimabhāgato paṭṭhāya paññāyanaṭṭhāne yattha yattha dve pādā sakkā honti samaṃ
atk-s0305a:324_2: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ, tattha tattha ekapaduddhāre tiṃsatiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:324_3: pāpuṇiṃsūti sakkā vatu”nti. Aparo pana mahāthero āha – “mahācetiyatale ākiṇṇavālikāya
atk-s0305a:324_4: bahutarā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā”ti. There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā
atk-s0305a:324_5: tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā
atk-s0305a:324_6: etesaṃ dassanaṃ sātthaṃ. Keci pana – “āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva, taṃ nissāya brahmacariyānuggahāya
atk-s0305a:325_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:325_1: Seyyathidaṃ? Cetiyadassanaṃ tāva sātthaṃ. Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare
atk-s0305a:325_2: parisā sannipatanti, attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni
atk-s0305a:325_3: viya sañcaranti. Tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe paṭigho, asamapekkhane
atk-s0305a:325_4: moho uppajjati, kāyasaṃsagge kāyasaṃsaggāpattiṃ āpajjati, jīvitabrahmacariyānaṃ vā
atk-s0305a:325_5: antarāyo ca hoti. Evaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ hoti, vuttappakāraantarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:325_6: Saṅghadassanampi sātthaṃ. Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0305a:325_7: kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0305a:325_8: ṭhānaṃ asappāyaṃ, antarāyābhāve sappāyaṃ. Mahāparivārānaṃ therānaṃ dassanepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:326_0: Asubhadassanampi sātthaṃ. Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṃ vatthu – eko kira daharabhikkhu
atk-s0305a:326_1: sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato. Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto
atk-s0305a:326_2: asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0305a:326_3: tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Daharo
atk-s0305a:326_4: taṃ apassanto “sāmaṇerā”ti pakkosi. So – “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā
atk-s0305a:326_5: saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā, aññasmimpi divase uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti
atk-s0305a:326_6: cintetvā “kiṃ, bhante,”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. “Ehī”ti vutte ekavacaneneva āgantvā
atk-s0305a:326_7: – “bhante, iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukhā hutvā
atk-s0305a:326_8: olokethā”ti āha. So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi. Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0305a:326_9: janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ. Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a:326_10: mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṃ, sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṃ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:327_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucikaṃ
atk-s0305a:327_1: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:328_0: Tassāvibhāvatthaṃ idaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ – idhekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0305a:328_1: ekacco paccāharati na harati, ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati, ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca.
atk-s0305a:329_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā
atk-s0305a:329_1: tathā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā, pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi
atk-s0305a:329_2: vītināmetvā, pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā
atk-s0305a:329_3: pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni samādāya vattati.
atk-s0305a:329_4: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento
atk-s0305a:329_6: senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:329_7: hoti, taṃ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pavisati. Aññaṃ ce kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sopānapādamūle
atk-s0305a:329_8: ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:329_9: āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce, tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:329_10: khuddakaṃ ce, tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ. Cetiyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0305a:329_11: bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bodhi
atk-s0305a:329_12: vanditabbā. So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0305a:329_13: hatthena gaṇhanto viya nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-s0305a:330_0: Atha naṃ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya
atk-s0305a:330_1: vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti, tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā
atk-s0305a:330_2: purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti, dhammaṃ vā sotukāmā honti. Sacepi na kathāpenti,
atk-s0305a:330_3: janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti. Dhammakathā
atk-s0305a:330_4: hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-s0305a:330_5: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato
atk-s0305a:330_6: nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0305a:331_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā
atk-s0305a:331_1: paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti. Porāṇakabhikkhū kira na “amhākaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0305a:331_2: ācariyo”ti mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti, sampattaparicchedeneva karonti. Te taṃ
atk-s0305a:331_3: pucchanti – “bhante, ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃ honti, mātipakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhato”ti?
atk-s0305a:331_4: Kiṃ disvā pucchathāti? Tumhesu etesaṃ pemaṃ bahumānanti. “Āvuso, yaṃ mātāpitūhipi
atk-s0305a:331_5: dukkarataraṃ, taṃ ete amhākaṃ karonti, pattacīvarampi no etesaṃ santakameva, etesaṃ
atk-s0305a:331_6: ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṃ, na chātake chātakaṃ jānāma, edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino
atk-s0305a:331_7: natthī”ti tesaṃ guṇe kathayanto gacchati. Ayaṃ vuccati harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0305a:332_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0305a:332_1: anupādiṇṇakaṃ muñcitvā upādiṇṇakaṃ gaṇhāti, sarīrato sedā muccanti, kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ
atk-s0305a:332_2: nārohati, so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva
atk-s0305a:332_3: gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati. Athassa dvittikkhattuṃ
atk-s0305a:332_4: ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādiṇṇakaṃ muñcitvā anupādiṇṇakaṃ gaṇhāti, ghaṭasatena
atk-s0305a:332_5: nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0305a:332_6: pattañca mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya
atk-s0305a:332_7: caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ
atk-s0305a:332_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati. Ayaṃ vuccati paccāharati na haratīti. Edisā ca
atk-s0305a:332_9: bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ
atk-s0305a:332_10: vītivattā. Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ na taṃ āsanamatthi, yattha
atk-s0305a:332_11: yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0305a:333_0: Yo pana pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro, sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetovinibandhabaddhacitto
atk-s0305a:333_1: viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṃ akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena
atk-s0305a:333_2: gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati. Ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0305a:334_0: Yo panāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto, so gatapaccāgatikavattavasena veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:334_1: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi
atk-s0305a:334_2: satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti “āvuso, tumhe na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā,
atk-s0305a:334_3: na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā, dukkhā muccitukāmā panettha pabbajitā, tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ
atk-s0305a:334_4: gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne, nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilesaṃ sayaneyeva niggaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0305a:334_5: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-s0305a:334_6: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-s0305a:334_7: kileso uppajjati, tattheva naṃ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati. Athassa pacchato
atk-s0305a:334_8: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati, so “ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannavitakkaṃ jānāti, ananucchavikaṃ
atk-s0305a:334_9: te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati,
atk-s0305a:334_10: tathā asakkonto nisīdatīti so eva nayo. Ariyabhūmiṃ okkamituṃ asakkontopi, taṃ kilesaṃ
atk-s0305a:334_11: vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati, na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena cittena
atk-s0305a:334_12: pādaṃ uddharati. Uddharati ce, paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaṃyeva eti ālindakavāsī
atk-s0305a:335_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi. Manussāpi sudaṃ
atk-s0305a:335_1: antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ
atk-s0305a:335_2: disvā – “ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nu kho maggamūḷho, udāhu
atk-s0305a:335_3: kiñci pamuṭṭho”ti samullapanti. So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0305a:335_4: karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:335_5: adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi. Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca
atk-s0305a:335_6: devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamaṃsu. Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero
atk-s0305a:335_7: taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi – “rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi, kiṃ so obhāso”ti?
atk-s0305a:335_8: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti, maṇiobhāsopī”ti evamādimāha.
atk-s0305a:335_9: Tato “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0305a:336_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsīmahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento
atk-s0305a:336_1: paṭhamaṃ tāva “bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-s0305a:336_2: adhiṭṭhāsi. Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So
atk-s0305a:336_3: kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto
atk-s0305a:336_4: gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0305a:336_5: kacchakarakato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ karoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? “Mā me bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0305a:336_6: dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo
atk-s0305a:336_7: ahosī”ti “ajja, bhante, katimī”ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito
atk-s0305a:336_8: pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti. Sace divasādipucchakā na honti, nikkhamanavelāyaṃ gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvā yāti.
atk-s0305a:337_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca. Te kira āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:337_1: katikavattaṃ akaṃsu – “arahattaṃ apatvā aññamaññaṃ nālapissāmā”ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-s0305a:337_2: pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu. Divasādīsu pucchitesu vuttanayeneva paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:337_3: Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṃ disvā jāniṃsu – “ajjeko āgato, ajja dve”ti. Evañca cintesuṃ
atk-s0305a:337_4: – “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti, udāhu aññamaññampi. Yadi aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:337_5: na sallapanti, addhā vivādajātā bhavissanti. Etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe
atk-s0305a:337_6: vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu. Tato yo tesu
atk-s0305a:337_7: cakkhumā puriso, so āha – “na bho kalahakārakānaṃ okāso īdiso hoti, susammaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0305a:337_8: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ, sunikkhittā sammajjaniyo, supaṭṭhitaṃ pānīyaṃ paribhojanīya”nti.
atk-s0305a:337_9: Te tatova nivattā. Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāyaṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0305a:338_0: Evaṃ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya, kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū
atk-s0305a:338_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ
atk-s0305a:338_2: katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0305a:338_3: vā natthi, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya
atk-s0305a:338_4: javena gacchati. Na hi javena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi. Visamabhūmibhāgapattaṃ
atk-s0305a:338_5: pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati. Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā
atk-s0305a:338_6: adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā antogāme vā
atk-s0305a:338_7: bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:338_9: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhāreti, neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya
atk-s0305a:338_10: na vibhūsanāya…pe… bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭipassambhetvā
atk-s0305a:338_11: yathā purebhattaṃ, evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0305a:338_12: manasikaroti. Ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0305a:339_0: Imaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno
atk-s0305a:339_1: hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. No ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti, atha majjhimavaye
atk-s0305a:339_2: pāpuṇāti. No ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti, atha pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti, no ce pacchimavaye
atk-s0305a:339_3: pāpuṇāti, atha maraṇasamaye. No ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti, atha devaputto hutvā. No
atk-s0305a:339_4: ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti, anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0305a:339_5: No ce paccekabodhiṃ sacchikaroti, atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti,
atk-s0305a:339_6: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā, seyyathāpi thero sāriputto, mahiddhiko
atk-s0305a:339_7: vā, seyyathāpi thero mahāmoggallāno, dhutavādo vā, seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo,
atk-s0305a:339_8: dibbacakkhuko vā, seyyathāpi thero anuruddho, vinayadharo vā, seyyathāpi thero upāli,
atk-s0305a:339_9: dhammakathiko vā, seyyathāpi thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, āraññiko vā, seyyathāpi thero
atk-s0305a:339_10: revato, bahussuto vā, seyyathāpi thero ānando, sikkhākāmo vā, seyyathāpi thero rāhulo
atk-s0305a:339_11: buddhaputtoti. Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati paccāharati ca, tassa gocarasampajaññaṃ sikhāpattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:340_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ. Taṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ – idha bhikkhu
atk-s0305a:340_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu – “attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0305a:340_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti vā “ahaṃ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito”ti
atk-s0305a:340_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
atk-s0305a:340_4: saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati, iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-s0305a:340_5: ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati. Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe
atk-s0305a:340_6: pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
atk-s0305a:340_7: balavatiyo, tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu, vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
atk-s0305a:340_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo, tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesu.
atk-s0305a:341_0: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tathā atiharaṇe
atk-s0305a:341_1: pavattā vītiharaṇaṃ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṃ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:341_2: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṃ sandhisandhi
atk-s0305a:341_3: odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya taṭataṭāyantā bhijjanti. Tattha ko
atk-s0305a:341_4: eko abhikkamati, kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṃ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṃyeva gamanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:341_5: dhātūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ, dhātūnaṃ nisajjā, dhātūnaṃ sayanaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi koṭṭhāse saddhiṃ rūpena –
atk-s0305a:346_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ, vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:346_1: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato anupekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:346_2: Tāni idha na gahitāni, sāruppavasena pana imāneva dve gahitāni. Iminā vā mukhena
atk-s0305a:347: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0305a:348_0: “Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā
atk-s0305a:348_1: nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0305a:348_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāsavissantī’ti. Itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-s0305a:348_3: nandassa pacchimā disā, uttarā disā, dakkhiṇā disā, uddhaṃ, adho, anudisā āloketabbā
atk-s0305a:348_4: hoti, sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ ālokayato’…pe… sampajāno hotī”ti.
atk-s0305a:349_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:349_1: Kammaṭṭhānassa pana avijahanameva gocarasampajaññaṃ, tasmā khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi
atk-s0305a:349_2: attano kamaṭṭhānavaseneva kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:350_0: “Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi, ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne
atk-s0305a:350_1: teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:350_2: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati, uparimaṃ
atk-s0305a:350_3: uddhaṃ laṅgheti, koci yantakena vivaranto nāma natthi, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
atk-s0305a:350_4: sādhentaṃ uppajjatī”ti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:354_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati, taṃ āvaṭṭetvā
atk-s0305a:354_1: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
atk-s0305a:354_2: sādhayamānaṃ, tannirodhā vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā
atk-s0305a:354_4: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā sattakkhattuṃ javanaṃ javati. Tattha paṭhamajavanepi
atk-s0305a:354_5: “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0305a:354_6: dutiyajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi. Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena
atk-s0305a:354_7: bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:355_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccanipphādanavasena
atk-s0305a:355_1: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati, taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ
atk-s0305a:355_2: āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe
atk-s0305a:355_3: kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:355_4: na yuttaṃ, evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
atk-s0305a:355_5: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti evaṃ āgantukabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:356_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṃ
atk-s0305a:356_1: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṃ na passanti, ittarāni tāvakālikāni
atk-s0305a:356_2: honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:356_3: maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma, evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu
atk-s0305a:356_4: āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi
atk-s0305a:356_5: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:357_1: ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho, dassanaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0305a:357_2: saññā saññākkhandho, phassādikā saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho, evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:357_3: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi? Tathā cakkhu
atk-s0305a:357_4: cakkhāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, dassanaṃ manāyatanaṃ, vedanādayo sampayuttadhammā
atk-s0305a:357_5: dhammāyatanaṃ, evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a:357_6: Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi? Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṃ rūpadhātu, dassanaṃ
atk-s0305a:357_7: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṃsampayuttā vedanādayo dhammā dhammadhātu, evametesaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-s0305a:357_8: dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi?
atk-s0305a:357_9: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṃ anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
atk-s0305a:357_10: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātapaccayo. Evametesaṃ paccayānaṃ samavāye
atk-s0305a:357_11: ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketīti evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenapi
atk-s0305a:358_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:358_1: akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ
atk-s0305a:358_2: sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa
atk-s0305a:358_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ paripatati,
atk-s0305a:358_4: visesaṃ nādhigacchati. Kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:358_5: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ phātiṃ gacchati, visesamadhigacchatīti evaṃ atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:359_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:359_1: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – mahācetiyaṅgaṇe kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ piṭṭhipasse
atk-s0305a:359_2: daharabhikkhuniyo dhammaṃ suṇanti. Tattheko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
atk-s0305a:359_3: patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto. Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0305a:359_4: aṭṭhiṃ āhacca pādo jhāyi. Aparo vammike pasāresi, so āsīvisena daṭṭho. Aparo cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake
atk-s0305a:359_5: pasāresi, taṃ maṇisappo ḍaṃsi. Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:360_0: Gocarasampajaññaṃ pana mahātheravatthunā dīpetabbaṃ – mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno
atk-s0305a:360_1: antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a:360_2: saṇikaṃ samiñjesi. Taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsu – “kasmā, bhante, sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā
atk-s0305a:360_3: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthā”ti. Yato paṭṭhāyāhaṃ, āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:360_4: manasikātuṃ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo, idāni pana
atk-s0305a:360_5: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito, tasmā puna yathāṭhāne
atk-s0305a:360_6: ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena bhavitabbanti. Evametthāpi
atk-s0305a:361_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjanto vā pasārento vā natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-s0305a:361_1: pana suttākaḍḍhanavasena dāruyantassa hatthapādalaḷanaṃ viya samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti
atk-s0305a:362_1: bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma. Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe
atk-s0305a:362_2: tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho, “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0305a:362_3: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma. Tassa vasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:363_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ, sītālukassa ghanaṃ
atk-s0305a:363_1: dupaṭṭaṃ. Viparītaṃ asappāyaṃ. Yassa kassaci jiṇṇaṃ asappāyameva. Aggaḷādidānena
atk-s0305a:363_2: hissa taṃ palibodhakaraṃ hoti. Tathā paṭṭuṇṇadukūlādibhedaṃ lobhanīyacīvaraṃ. Tādisañhi
atk-s0305a:363_3: araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṃ, jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti. Nippariyāyena pana
atk-s0305a:363_4: yaṃ nimittakammādimicchājīvavasena uppannaṃ, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā
atk-s0305a:363_5: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ asappāyaṃ. Viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ, tassa
atk-s0305a:363_6: vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṃ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva ca gocarasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:364_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a:364_1: pana cīvarapārupanaṃ hoti. Tattha cīvarampi acetanaṃ, kāyopi acetano. Cīvaraṃ na
atk-s0305a:364_2: jānāti “mayā kāyo pārupito”ti. Kāyopi na jānāti “ahaṃ cīvarena pārupito”ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0305a:364_3: dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya. Tasmā neva
atk-s0305a:364_4: sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ, na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassaṃ.
atk-s0305a:364_5: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti, keci
atk-s0305a:364_6: gūthamuttakaddamadaṇḍasatthapahārādīhi asakkāraṃ. Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ
atk-s0305a:364_7: vā karonti domanassaṃ vā. Evamevaṃ neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:364_8: na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:365_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṃ sahasāva aggahetvā – “imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0305a:365_2: veditabbaṃ. Kisadubbalasarīrassa pana garupatto asappāyo. Yassa kassaci catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato
atk-s0305a:365_3: dubbisodhanīyo asappāyova. Duddhotapatto hi na vaṭṭati, taṃ dhovantasseva cassa palibodho
atk-s0305a:365_4: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo. Nimittakammādivasena
atk-s0305a:365_5: laddho, pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0305a:365_6: ayaṃ ekantaasappāyova. Viparīto sappāyo. Tassa vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṃ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva
atk-s0305a:366_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a:366_1: pattaggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na jānāti
atk-s0305a:366_2: “ahaṃ hatthehi gahito”ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti “patto amhehi gahito”ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0305a:366_3: dhātusamūhaṃ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0305a:367_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe
atk-s0305a:367_1: anāthasālāya anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi
atk-s0305a:367_2: bhesajjāni ca upanāmenti. Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni, kesañci thūlāni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0305a:367_3: bhesajjakapālānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni, kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti, na te tattha
atk-s0305a:367_4: sumanā vā dummanā vā honti. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahamatteneva
atk-s0305a:367_5: ca kapālakena tesaṃ attho. Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ, bhesajjakapālakaṃ
atk-s0305a:367_6: viya ca pattaṃ, kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṃ sallakkheti. Ayaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
atk-s0305a:368_0: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātabhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjakādikhādane.
atk-s0305a:368_1: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi
atk-s0305a:368_2: attho attho nāma, tassa vasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:369_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti, taṃ tassa asappāyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:369_1: Yaṃ pana nimittakammādivasena paṭiladdhaṃ, yañcassa bhuñjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0305a:369_2: kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṃ ekantaasappāyameva. Viparītaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa vasenettha
atk-s0305a:370_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a:370_1: pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:370_2: nāma hoti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopakaraṇaṃ ālopuddharaṇaṃ mukhavivaraṇañca
atk-s0305a:370_3: hoti. Na koci kuñcikāya na yantakena hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a:370_4: ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṃ uparidantānaṃ musalakiccasādhanaṃ heṭṭhādantānaṃ udukkhalakiccasādhanaṃ
atk-s0305a:370_5: jivhāya hatthakiccasādhanañca hoti. Iti naṃ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo, mūlajivhāya
atk-s0305a:370_6: bahalakheḷo makkheti. Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ
atk-s0305a:370_7: uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:370_8: vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasantharaṃ katvā dhārento nāma
atk-s0305a:370_9: natthi, vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhati. Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā
atk-s0305a:370_10: pacanto nāma natthi, tejodhātuyāva paccati. Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0305a:370_11: vā bahi nīharako nāma natthi, vāyodhātuyeva nīharati. Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca
atk-s0305a:370_12: vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca; pathavīdhātu
atk-s0305a:370_13: dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca; āpodhātu sineheti ca allattañca
atk-s0305a:370_14: anupāleti; tejodhātu antopaviṭṭhaṃ paripāceti; ākāsadhātu añjaso hoti; viññāṇadhātu
atk-s0305a:370_15: tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:371_0: Apica gamanato, pariyesanato, paribhogato, āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato,
atk-s0305a:371_1: phalato, nissandato, sammakkhanatoti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭikūlabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇatopettha
atk-s0305a:371_2: asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vitthārakathā panettha visuddhimagge āhārapaṭikūlasaññāniddesato gahetabbā.
atk-s0305a:372_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-s0305a:372_1: akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti, akkhīni bhamanti, cittaṃ na ekaggaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:372_2: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti. Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho. Tassa
atk-s0305a:372_3: vasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti
atk-s0305a:372_4: hoti, ayaso vaḍḍhati, jīvitantarāyopi hoti. Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0305a:372_5: na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ. Tassa vasena sappāyasampajaññaṃ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavasena
atk-s0305a:373_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a:373_1: pana uccārapassāvakammaṃ hoti. Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya
atk-s0305a:373_2: nikkhamati, yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati, evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu
atk-s0305a:373_3: sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti. So panāyaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0305a:373_4: nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa, kevalaṃ sarīranissandova
atk-s0305a:373_5: hoti. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā udakatumbato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti
atk-s0305a:373_6: na paresaṃ, kevalaṃ paṭijagganamattameva hoti. Evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0305a:374_0: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Jāgarite
atk-s0305a:374_1: ti jāgaraṇe. Bhāsiteti kathane. Tuṇhībhāveti akathane. Ettha ca yo ciraṃ gantvā vā
atk-s0305a:374_2: caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
atk-s0305a:374_3: ettheva niruddhā”ti, ayaṃ gate sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a:375_0: Yo sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto pañhaṃ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ
atk-s0305a:375_1: ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno iti paṭisañcikkhati “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva
atk-s0305a:376: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati – “nisinnakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti, ayaṃ nisinne sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a:377_0: Yo pana nipannakova sajjhāyaṃ karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā
atk-s0305a:377_1: aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati – “sayanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva
atk-s0305a:377_2: niruddhā”ti, ayaṃ sutte ca jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma. Kiriyamayacittānañhi appavattaṃ
atk-s0305a:378_0: Yo pana bhāsamāno – “ayaṃ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca paṭicca
atk-s0305a:378_1: cittassa ca tadanurūpaṃ payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajāno bhāsati, ciraṃ vā
atk-s0305a:378_2: pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ katvā dhammaṃ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā parivattetvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0305a:378_3: vā vissajjetvā aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati “bhāsitakāle uppannā rūpārūpadhammā
atk-s0305a:378_4: ettheva niruddhā”ti ayaṃ bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a:379_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati
atk-s0305a:379_2: sati bhāsati nāma, asati tuṇhī bhavati nāmāti, ayaṃ tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāmāti.
atk-s0305a:379_3: Evamettha asammohasampajaññaṃ tassa vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0305a:381_0: 369. Tatiye evameva panidhekacceti so kira bhikkhu kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā ito cito
atk-s0305a:381_1: ca āhiṇḍati, kāyavivekaṃ nānuyuñjati. Tena naṃ bhagavā niggaṇhanto evamāha. Tasmāti
atk-s0305a:381_2: yasmā saṃkhittena desanaṃ yācasi, tasmā. Diṭṭhīti kammassakatādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0305a:383_0: 370. Catutthe dhammavinayoti dhammoti vā vinayoti vā ubhayametaṃ satthusāsanasseva
atk-s0305a:383_1: nāmaṃ. Samādapetabbāti gaṇhāpetabbā. Ekodibhūtāti khaṇikasamādhinā ekaggabhūtā. Samāhitā
atk-s0305a:383_2: ekaggacittāti upacārappanāvasena sammā ṭhapitacittā ca ekaggacittā ca. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0305a:383_3: navakabhikkhūhi ceva khīṇāsavehi ca bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, sattahi sekhehi bhāvitā missakā.
atk-s0305a:385_0: 372. Chaṭṭhe sakuṇagghīti sakuṇaṃ hanatīti sakuṇagghi, senassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sahasā
atk-s0305a:385_1: ajjhapattāti lobhasāhasena pattā. Alakkhikāti nissirikā. Appapuññāti parittapuññā.
atk-s0305a:385_2: Sacejja mayanti sace ajja mayaṃ. Naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇanti naṅgalena kasikaraṇaṃ, adhunā
atk-s0305a:385_3: kaṭṭhaṃ khettaṭṭhānanti attho. Leḍḍuṭṭhānanti leḍḍūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ. Saṃvadamānāti sammā
atk-s0305a:385_4: vadamānā, attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānāti attho. Mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvāti
atk-s0305a:385_5: uddhanasaṇṭhānena ṭhitesu tīsu leḍḍūsu “ito sene āgacchante ito nikkhamissāmi, ito
atk-s0305a:385_6: āgacchante ito”ti sallakkhetvā tesu ekaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā aṭṭhāsi avadamāno. Sannayhāti
atk-s0305a:385_7: khurappaṃ sannayhamāno viya sannayhitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā. Bahuāgato kho myāyanti “mayhaṃ
atk-s0305a:385_8: atthāya ayaṃ bahutaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato, appaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ, idāni maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0305a:385_9: dāruguḷo viya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi, paṭipanno paviṭṭhoti
atk-s0305a:385_10: attho. Uraṃ paccatāḷesīti “ekappahāreneva lāpassa sīsaṃ chinditvā gahessāmī”ti pakkhandattā
atk-s0305a:385_11: vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ leḍḍusmiṃ uraṃ patāḷesi. Tāvadevassa hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0305a:385_12: phāliyittha. Atha lāpo “diṭṭhā vata sattuno piṭṭhī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa hadaye aparāparaṃ caṅkami.
atk-s0305a:387_0: 373. Sattame duggāti duggamā. Cārīti sañcāro. Lepaṃ oḍḍentīti vaṭarukkhakhīrādīhi
atk-s0305a:387_1: yojetvā lepaṃ karonti, taṃ makkaṭānaṃ dhuvagamanaṭṭhānanti sallakkhetvā rukkhasākhādīsu
atk-s0305a:387_2: ṭhapenti. Pañcoḍḍitoti pañcasu ṭhānesu kājadaṇḍakaṃ pavesetvā gahetabbā kājasikkā
atk-s0305a:387_3: viya oḍḍito. Thunaṃ setīti thunanto sayati.
atk-s0305a:389_0: 374. Aṭṭhame sūdoti bhattakārako. Nānaccayehīti nānācayehi, nānāvidhehīti attho.
atk-s0305a:389_1: Ayameva vā pāṭho. Ambilaggehīti ambilakoṭṭhāsehi. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Abhiharatīti
atk-s0305a:389_2: gahaṇatthāya hatthaṃ pasāreti. Bahuṃ gaṇhātīti ekaggahaṇena bahuṃ gaṇhantopi punappunaṃ
atk-s0305a:389_3: gaṇhantopi bahuṃ gaṇhateva. Abhihārānanti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ukkhipitvā abhihaṭānaṃ
atk-s0305a:389_4: dāyānaṃ. Upakkilesāti pañca nīvaraṇā. Nimittaṃ na uggaṇhātīti “imaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:389_5: anulomaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ vā āhacca ṭhita”nti na jānāti, attano cittassa nimittaṃ gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0305a:389_6: na sakkoti. Imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā.
atk-s0305a:391_0: 375. Navame beḷuvagāmaketi vesāliyā samīpe evaṃnāmako pādagāmo atthi, tasmiṃ. Yathāmittantiādīsu
atk-s0305a:391_1: mittāti mittāva. Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā. Sambhattāti
atk-s0305a:391_2: suṭṭhu bhattā sinehavanto daḷhamittā. Yesaṃ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū atthi,
atk-s0305a:391_3: te tattha tattha vassaṃ upethāti attho. Kasmā evamāha? Tesaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya. Tesaṃ
atk-s0305a:391_4: kira beḷuvagāmake senāsanaṃ nappahoti, bhikkhāpi mandā. Samantā vesāliyā pana bahūni
atk-s0305a:392_0: Atha kasmā “yathāsukhaṃ gacchathā”ti na vissajjesi? Tesaṃ anukampāya. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0305a:392_1: ahosi – “ahaṃ dasamāsamattaṃ ṭhatvā parinibbāyissāmi. Sace ime dūraṃ gacchissanti,
atk-s0305a:392_2: maṃ parinibbānakāle daṭṭhuṃ na sakkhissanti. Atha nesaṃ ‘satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṃ
atk-s0305a:392_3: satimattampi na adāsi. Sace jāneyyāma, na evaṃ dūre vaseyyāmā’ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya.
atk-s0305a:392_4: Vesāliyā samantā pana vassaṃ vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre āgantvā dhammaṃ suṇissanti,
atk-s0305a:393_0: Kharoti pharuso. Ābādhoti visabhāgarogo. Bāḷhāti balavatiyo. Māraṇantikāti maraṇantaṃ
atk-s0305a:393_1: maraṇasantikaṃ pāpanasamatthā. Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:393_2: ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi. Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṃ
atk-s0305a:393_3: parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno ca adhivāsesi. Anāmantetvāti ajānāpetvā.
atk-s0305a:393_4: Anapaloketvāti ajānāpetvāva ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vīriyenāti pubbabhāgavīriyena
atk-s0305a:393_5: ceva phalasamāpattivīriyena ca. Paṭipaṇāmetvāti vikkhambhetvā. Jīvitasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0305a:393_6: ettha jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro. Yena jīvitaṃ saṅkharīyati chijjamānaṃ ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati,
atk-s0305a:393_7: so phalasamāpattidhammopi jīvitasaṅkhāro. So idha adhippeto. Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0305a:393_8: pavattetvā jīvitaṭhapanasamatthaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a:394_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjatīti? Samāpajjati. Sā pana
atk-s0305a:394_1: khaṇikasamāpatti. Khaṇikasamāpatti ca antosamāpattiyaṃyeva vedanaṃ vikkhambheti,
atk-s0305a:394_2: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṃ,
atk-s0305a:394_3: puna sarīraṃ vedanā ajjhottharati. Yā pana rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṃ
atk-s0305a:394_4: nijjaṭaṃ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti, sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti. Yathā
atk-s0305a:394_5: nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyuḷhasevālo cirena
atk-s0305a:394_6: udakaṃ ottharati, evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati. Iti bhagavā taṃdivasaṃ
atk-s0305a:394_7: mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca
atk-s0305a:394_8: niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0305a:394_9: “dasamāse mā uppajjitthā”ti samāpattiṃ samāpajji, samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā dasa
atk-s0305a:395_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito. Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo
atk-s0305a:395_1: sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya. Na pakkhāyantīti na pakāsanti, nānākārato
atk-s0305a:395_2: na upaṭṭhahanti. Dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānadhammā mayhaṃ pākaṭā na
atk-s0305a:395_3: hontīti dīpeti. Tantidhammā pana therassa suppaguṇā. Na udāharatīti pacchimaovādaṃ
atk-s0305a:396_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṃ akatvā. “Ettakaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0305a:396_1: parassa na desessāmī”ti hi cintento dhammaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma, “ettakaṃ parassa
atk-s0305a:396_2: desessāmī”ti cintento bāhiraṃ karoti nāma. “Imassa puggalassa desessāmī”ti cintento
atk-s0305a:396_3: pana puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma, “imassa na desessāmī”ti cintento puggalaṃ
atk-s0305a:396_4: bāhiraṃ karoti nāma. Evaṃ akatvā desitoti attho. Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṃ
atk-s0305a:396_5: ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti, daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā
atk-s0305a:396_6: piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti, evaṃ tathāgatassa “idaṃ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭhāne
atk-s0305a:396_7: kathessāmī”ti muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:397_0: Ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmīti vā, mamuddesikoti ahaṃ
atk-s0305a:397_1: uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko, mameva uddissitvā maṃ paccāsīsamāno
atk-s0305a:397_2: bhikkhusaṅgho hotu mama accayena mā vā ahosi, yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotūti iti vā pana yassa
atk-s0305a:397_3: assāti attho. Na evaṃ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmaccherānaṃ vigatattā evaṃ na
atk-s0305a:397_4: hoti. Sa kinti so kiṃ. Āsītikoti asītisaṃvacchariko, idaṃ pacchimavayaṃ anuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0305a:397_6: Maññeti jarasakaṭaṃ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti, arahattaphalaveṭhanena catuiriyāpathakappanaṃ
atk-s0305a:398_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pakāsento yasmiṃ ānanda samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbanimittānanti
atk-s0305a:398_1: rūpanimittādīnaṃ. Ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanānaṃ. Tasmātihānandāti yasmā
atk-s0305a:398_2: iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti, tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṃ viharathāti
atk-s0305a:398_3: dasseti. Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatā dīpaṃ viya attānaṃ dīpaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0305a:398_4: Attasaraṇāti attagatikāva hotha, mā aññagatikā. Dhammadīpadhammasaraṇapadesupi eseva
atk-s0305a:398_5: nayo. Ettha ca dhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo. Tamataggeti tamaagge,
atk-s0305a:398_6: majjhe ta-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime aggatamāti tamataggāti.
atk-s0305a:398_7: Evaṃ sabbaṃ tamasotaṃ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda, mama bhikkhū
atk-s0305a:398_8: bhavissanti, tesaṃ agge bhavissanti. Ye keci sikkhākāmā, sabbesaṃ tesaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva
atk-s0305a:398_9: bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0305a:400_0: 376. Dasame tenupasaṅkamīti tasmiṃ upassaye kammaṭṭhānakammikā bhikkhuniyo atthi,
atk-s0305a:400_1: tāsaṃ ussukkāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmīti upasaṅkami. Uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesanti
atk-s0305a:400_2: pubbavisesato aparaṃ uḷāravisesaṃ. Tattha mahābhūtapariggaho pubbaviseso, upādārūpapariggaho
atk-s0305a:400_3: aparaviseso nāma. Tathā sakalarūpapariggaho pubbaviseso, arūpapariggaho aparaviseso
atk-s0305a:400_4: nāma. Rūpārūpapariggaho pubbaviseso, paccayapariggaho aparaviseso nāma sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ
atk-s0305a:400_5: pubbaviseso, tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ aparaviseso nāma. Evaṃ pubbenāparaṃ uḷāravisesaṃ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0305a:401_0: Kāyārammaṇoti yaṃ kāyaṃ anupassati, tameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati kilesapariḷāho.
atk-s0305a:401_1: Bahiddhā vā cittaṃ vikkhipatīti bahiddhā vā puthuttārammaṇe cittuppādo vikkhipati.
atk-s0305a:401_2: Kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṃ paṇidahitabbanti evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe ca līnatte
atk-s0305a:401_3: ca bahiddhāvikkhepe ca uppanne kilesānurañjitena na vattitabbaṃ, kismiñcideva pasādanīye
atk-s0305a:401_4: pasādāvahe buddhādīsu aññatarasmiṃ ṭhāne kammaṭṭhānacittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti
atk-s0305a:401_5: ārammaṇe sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ ṭhapiyati. Paṭisaṃharāmīti pasādanīyaṭṭhānato
atk-s0305a:401_6: paṭisaṃharāmi, mūlakammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃyeva naṃ karomīti attho. So paṭisaṃharati
atk-s0305a:401_7: cevāti mūlakammaṭṭhānābhimukhañca peseti. Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesavitakkaṃ
atk-s0305a:401_8: na vitakketi, kilesavicāraṃ na vicāreti. Avitakkomhi avicāroti kilesavitakkavicārehi
atk-s0305a:401_9: avitakkāvicāro. Ajjhattaṃ satimā sukhamasmīti gocarajjhatte pavattāya satiyā “satimāhamasmi
atk-s0305a:402_0: Evaṃ kho, ānanda, paṇidhāya bhāvanā hotīti evaṃ, ānanda, ṭhapetvā bhāvanā hoti. Imassa
atk-s0305a:402_1: hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa mahantaṃ ucchubhāraṃ ukkhipitvā yantasālaṃ nentassa
atk-s0305a:402_2: kilantakilantakāle bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ucchukhaṇḍaṃ khāditvā puna ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ
atk-s0305a:402_3: hoti; evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa kāyapariḷāhādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0305a:402_4: taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:402_5: bhāvanā pavattā, tasmā “paṇidhāya bhāvanā hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa pana purisassa ucchubhāraṃ
atk-s0305a:402_6: yantasālaṃ netvā pīḷetvā rasapānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0305a:403_0: Bahiddhāti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya bahi aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe. Appaṇidhāyāti aṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0305a:403_1: Atha pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānātīti ettha kammaṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0305a:403_2: vā sarīravasena vā desanāvasena vā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:404_0: Tattha kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma, arahattaṃ pacchā nāma.
atk-s0305a:404_1: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kilesapariḷāhassa vā līnattassa vā bahiddhāvikkhepassa
atk-s0305a:404_2: vā uppajjituṃ okāsaṃ adento sudantagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassacchidde sutacchitaṃ
atk-s0305a:404_3: caturassaghaṭikaṃ pakkhipanto viya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā atiṭṭhanto alagganto arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:404_4: pāpuṇāti, so puresaṅkhātassa kammaṭṭhānābhinivesassa pacchāsaṅkhātassa arahattassa
atk-s0305a:404_5: ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a:405_0: Sarīre pana pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbāni pure nāma, sīsakaṭāhaṃ pacchā nāma. Tattha yo
atk-s0305a:405_1: bhikkhu pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbaaṭṭhikesu abhinivisitvā byābhaṅgiyā yavakalāpaṃ mocento
atk-s0305a:405_2: viya vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena aṭṭhīni pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:405_3: uppattiṃ vāretvā yāva sīsakaṭāhā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti, so puresaṅkhātānaṃ aggapādaṅgulipabbānaṃ
atk-s0305a:405_4: pacchāsaṅkhātassa sīsakaṭāhassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a:406_0: Desanāyapi dvattiṃsākāradesanāya kesā pure nāma, matthaluṅgaṃ pacchā nāma. Tattha
atk-s0305a:406_1: yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsavasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0305a:406_2: antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ vāretvā yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti. So
atk-s0305a:406_3: puresaṅkhātānaṃ kesānaṃ pacchāsaṅkhātassa matthaluṅgassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ
atk-s0305a:407_0: Evaṃ kho, ānanda, appaṇidhāya bhāvanā hotīti evaṃ, ānanda, aṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā hoti.
atk-s0305a:407_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa guḷabhāraṃ labhitvā attano gāmaṃ atiharantassa
atk-s0305a:407_2: antarā aṭṭhapetvāva uccaṅge pakkhittāni guḷakhaṇḍādīni khādanīyāni khādantassa attano
atk-s0305a:407_3: gāmeyeva otaraṇaṃ hoti, evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ āraddhabhāvanassa kāyapariḷāhādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:407_4: uppattiṃ vāretvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā, tasmā “appaṇidhāya bhāvanā”ti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:407_5: Tassa pana purisassa taṃ guḷabhāraṃ attano gāmaṃ netvā ñātīhi saddhiṃ paribhogo viya
atk-s0305a:407_6: imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahattaṃ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ
atk-s0305a:407_7: veditabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:411_0: 378. Dutiyavaggassa dutiye nālandāyanti nālandāti evaṃnāmake nagare, taṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0305a:411_1: gocaragāmaṃ katvā. Pāvārikambavaneti dussapāvārikaseṭṭhino ambavane. Taṃ kira tassa
atk-s0305a:411_2: uyyānaṃ ahosi. So bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0305a:411_3: bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyātesi. So vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya pāvārikambavanantveva
atk-s0305a:411_4: saṅkhaṃ gato. Tasmiṃ pāvārikambavane viharatīti attho.
atk-s0305a:412_0: Evaṃpasannoti evaṃ uppannasaddho, evaṃ saddahāmīti attho. Bhiyyobhiññataroti bhiyyataro
atk-s0305a:412_1: abhiññāto bhiyyatarābhiyyo vā, uttaritarañāṇoti attho. Sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe
atk-s0305a:412_2: arahattamaggañāṇe vā arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti, dvepi
atk-s0305a:412_3: aggasāvakā arahattamaggeneva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ paṭilabhanti, paccekabuddhā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:412_4: buddhā sabbaññutaññāṇañceva sakale ca buddhaguṇe. Sabbampi nesaṃ arahattamaggeneva
atk-s0305a:412_5: ijjhati. Tasmā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ sambodhi nāma hoti. Tena uttaritaro ca bhagavatā
atk-s0305a:413_0: Uḷārāti seṭṭhā. Ayañhi uḷārasaddo “uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī”tiādīsu madhure āgacchati.
atk-s0305a:413_1: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0305a:413_2: “Appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso”tiādīsu vipule. Svāyamidha seṭṭhe āgato. Tena vuttaṃ “uḷārāti
atk-s0305a:413_3: seṭṭhā”ti. Āsabhīti usabhassa vācāsadisī acalā asampavedhī. Ekaṃso gahitoti anussavena
atk-s0305a:413_4: vā ācariyaparamparāya vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena vā
atk-s0305a:413_5: diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena
atk-s0305a:413_6: paṭivijjhitvā viya ekaṃso gahito, sanniṭṭhānakathāva kathitāti attho. Sīhanādoti
atk-s0305a:413_7: seṭṭhanādo, vane unnādayantena sīhena viya uttamanādo naditoti attho.
atk-s0305a:414_0: Kiṃ nu te sāriputtāti imaṃ desanaṃ kasmā ārabhi? Anuyogadāpanatthaṃ. Ekacco hi sīhanādaṃ
atk-s0305a:414_1: naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, nighaṃsanaṃ na khamati, silese
atk-s0305a:414_2: patitamakkaṭo viya hoti. Yathā dhamamānaṃ aparisuddhaṃ lohaṃ jhāyitvā aṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0305a:414_3: evaṃ jhāmaṅgāro viya hoti. Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dāpiyamāno dātuṃ sakkoti, nighaṃsanaṃ
atk-s0305a:414_4: khamati, dhamamānaṃ niddosajātarūpaṃ viya adhikataraṃ sobhati, tādiso thero. Tena
atk-s0305a:414_5: naṃ bhagavā “anuyogakkhamo aya”nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:415_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā. Evaṃsīlāti maggasīlena phalasīlena lokiyalokuttarasīlena
atk-s0305a:415_1: evaṃsīlā. Evaṃdhammāti ettha samādhipakkhā dhammā adhippetā, maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā
atk-s0305a:415_2: lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā evaṃsamādhīti attho. Evaṃpaññāti maggapaññādivaseneva
atk-s0305a:415_3: evaṃpaññā. Evaṃvihārinoti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā
atk-s0305a:415_4: vihāro gahitopi puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhatīti ce. Therena idaṃ gahitameva. Idañhi
atk-s0305a:415_5: nirodhasamāpattidīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārino te bhagavanto
atk-s0305a:416_0: Evaṃvimuttāti ettha vikkhambhanavimutti, tadaṅgavimutti, samucchedavimutti, paṭipassaddhivimutti,
atk-s0305a:416_1: nissaraṇavimuttīti pañcavidhā vimutti. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi
atk-s0305a:416_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Aniccānupassanādikā
atk-s0305a:416_3: satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā
atk-s0305a:416_4: tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi
atk-s0305a:416_5: vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena
atk-s0305a:416_6: kilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā paṭipassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Nibbānaṃ
atk-s0305a:416_7: sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0305a:416_8: Iti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ vimuttīnaṃ vasena evaṃ vimuttāti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:417_0: Kiṃ pana te sāriputta ye te bhavissantīti atītā tāva niruddhā apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā
atk-s0305a:417_1: dīpasikhā viya nibbutā, evaṃ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gate tvaṃ kathaṃ jānissasi,
atk-s0305a:417_2: anāgatabuddhānaṃ pana guṇā kiṃ tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a:418_0: Kiṃ pana tyāhaṃ sāriputta etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā, te
atk-s0305a:418_1: kathaṃ jānissasi. Tesañhi jānanaṃ apade ākāse padadassanaṃ viya hoti. Idāni mayā
atk-s0305a:418_2: saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasasi, ekato bhikkhāya carasi, dhammadesanākāle dakkhiṇapasse
atk-s0305a:418_3: nisīdasi, kiṃ pana mayhaṃ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto
atk-s0305a:418_4: evamāha. Thero pana pucchitapucchite “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0305a:419_0: Therassa ca viditampi atthi, aviditampi. Kiṃ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:419_1: aviditaṭṭhāneti? Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti, aviditaṭṭhāneyeva karoti. Thero kira anuyoge
atk-s0305a:419_2: āraddhe evaṃ aññāsi “nāyaṃ anuyogo sāvakapāramīñāṇe, sabbaññutaññāṇe pana ayaṃ anuyogo”ti
atk-s0305a:419_3: attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ akatvāva aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ
atk-s0305a:419_4: karoti. Tena idampi dīpeti – bhagavā mayhaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0305a:420_0: Etthāti etesu atītādibhedesu buddhesu. Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṃ ñāṇe asati
atk-s0305a:420_1: tayā evaṃ kathitanti vadati. Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṃ
atk-s0305a:420_2: anugantvā uppannaṃ anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito, sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva iminā
atk-s0305a:420_3: ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati. Therassa hi nayaggāho appamāṇo apariyanto. Yathā
atk-s0305a:420_4: ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṃ vā pariyanto vā natthi, evaṃ dhammasenāpatino nayaggāhassa.
atk-s0305a:420_5: Tena so – “iminā evaṃvidho iminā evaṃvidho, iminā anuttaro iminā anuttaro satthā”ti
atk-s0305a:420_6: jānāti. Therassa hi nayaggāho sabbaññutaññāṇagatiko eva.
atk-s0305a:421_0: Idāni taṃ nayaggāhaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi bhantetiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0305a:421_1: yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā, sabbaso
atk-s0305a:421_2: vā pana mā hontu, corānaṃ āsaṅkā na hoti. Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā paccantimaṃ nagaranti
atk-s0305a:421_3: āha. Daḷhuddhāpanti thiramūlapākāraṃ. Daḷhapākāratoraṇanti thirapākārañceva thirapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭañca.
atk-s0305a:421_4: Ekadvāranti kasmā āha? Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:421_5: ekadvāreva eko vaṭṭati. Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi, tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa
atk-s0305a:422_0: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Byattoti veyyattiyena samannāgato visadañāṇo. Medhāvīti
atk-s0305a:422_2: pākāramaggaṃ. Pākārasandhinti dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhānaṃ. Pākāravivaranti
atk-s0305a:422_3: pākārassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ. Cetaso upakkileseti pañcanīvaraṇā cittaṃ upakkilissanti
atk-s0305a:422_4: kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti upatāpenti viheṭhenti, tasmā “cetaso upakkilesā”ti vuccanti. Paññāya
atk-s0305a:422_5: dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, tasmā
atk-s0305a:422_6: “paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā”ti vuccanti. Supatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu
atk-s0305a:422_7: ṭhapitacittā hutvā. Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena
atk-s0305a:422_8: bhāvetvā. Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:423_0: Apicettha satipaṭṭhānāti vipassanā, bojjhaṅgā maggo, anuttarasammāsambodhi arahattaṃ.
atk-s0305a:423_1: Satipaṭṭhānāti vā vipassanā, bojjhaṅgāmissakā, sammāsambodhi arahattameva. Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero
atk-s0305a:423_2: panāha “satipaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite
atk-s0305a:423_3: sundaro pañho bhaveyya, na panevaṃ gahita”nti. Iti thero sabbabuddhānaṃ nīvaraṇappahāne
atk-s0305a:423_4: satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṃ viya nānattābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a:424_0: Idha ṭhatvā upamā saṃsandetabbā – āyasmā hi sāriputto paccantanagaraṃ dassesi, pākāraṃ
atk-s0305a:424_1: dassesi, anupariyāyapathaṃ dassesi, dvāraṃ dassesi, paṇḍitadovārikaṃ dassesi, nagaraṃ
atk-s0305a:424_2: pavisanakanikkhamanake oḷārike pāṇe dassesi, dovārikassa tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ
atk-s0305a:424_3: dassesi. Tattha kiṃ kena sadisanti ce? Nagaraṃ viya hi nibbānaṃ, pākāro viya sīlaṃ,
atk-s0305a:424_4: anupariyāyapatho viya hirī, dvāraṃ viya ariyamaggo, paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati,
atk-s0305a:424_5: nagaraṃ pavisanakanikkhamanakā oḷārikapāṇā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā buddhā, dovārikassa
atk-s0305a:424_6: tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:424_7: sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo. Ettāvatā therena bhagavato – “evamahaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇe
atk-s0305a:424_8: ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmī”ti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0305a:425_0: Tasmāti yasmā “na kho metaṃ, bhante, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu
atk-s0305a:425_1: cetopariyañāṇaṃ atthi, apica dhammanvayo vidito”ti vadati, tasmā. Abhikkhaṇaṃ bhāseyyāsīti
atk-s0305a:425_2: punappunaṃ bhāseyyāsi, “pubbaṇhe me kathita”nti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha,
atk-s0305a:425_3: “ajja vā me kathita”nti mā paradivasādīsu na kathayitthāti attho. Sā pahīyissatīti
atk-s0305a:425_4: “sāriputtasadisopi nāma ñāṇajavanasampanno sāvako buddhānaṃ cittācāraṃ jānituṃ na
atk-s0305a:425_5: sakkoti, evaṃ appameyyā tathāgatā”ti cintentānaṃ yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, sā pahīyissatīti.
atk-s0305a:427_0: 379. Tatiye magadhesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Nālakagāmaketi rājagahassa avidūre attano
atk-s0305a:427_1: kulasantake evaṃnāmake gāme. Cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko,
atk-s0305a:427_2: taṃ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva
atk-s0305a:427_3: samudācariṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti. Upaṭṭhāko hotīti mukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānena
atk-s0305a:427_5: hoti. Parinibbāyīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto. Katarasmiṃ kāleti?
atk-s0305a:428_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – bhagavā kira vutthavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā “sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0305a:428_1: gamissāmī”ti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a:428_2: Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ gato, so tattha antevāsikesu
atk-s0305a:428_3: vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññāpetvā pāde
atk-s0305a:428_4: pakkhāletvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā phalasamāpattiṃ pāvisi. Athassa yathā paricchedena
atk-s0305a:428_5: tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṃ parivitakko udapādi “buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0305a:428_6: udāhu aggasāvakāti, tato “aggasāvakā paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0305a:428_7: So “sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissantī”ti ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0305a:429_0: Tato “rāhulo tāvatiṃsesu parinibbuto, aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero chaddantadahe, ahaṃ kattha
atk-s0305a:429_1: parinibbāyissāmī”ti punappunaṃ cintento mātaraṃ ārabbha satiṃ uppādesi – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0305a:429_2: mātā sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā, atthi nu
atk-s0305a:429_3: kho tassā upanissayo, natthi nu kho”ti. Sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā “kassa
atk-s0305a:429_4: desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati, na
atk-s0305a:429_5: aññassa. Sace kho panāhaṃ appossukko bhaveyyaṃ, bhavissanti me vattāro – “sāriputtatthero
atk-s0305a:429_6: avasesajanānampi avassayo hoti. Tathā hissa samacittasuttantadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā
atk-s0305a:429_7: arahattaṃ pattā, tayo magge paṭividdhadevatānaṃ gaṇanā natthi, aññesu ca ṭhānesu
atk-s0305a:429_8: anekā abhisamayā dissanti, there ca cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattāneva asīti kulasahassāni,
atk-s0305a:429_9: so dāni sakamātumicchādassanamattampi harituṃ nāsakkhī”ti. Tasmā mātaraṃ micchādassanā
atk-s0305a:429_10: mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “ajjeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0305a:429_11: anujānāpetvā nikkhamissāmī”ti cundattheraṃ āmantesi – “āvuso, cunda, amhākaṃ pañcasatāya
atk-s0305a:429_12: bhikkhuparisāya saññaṃ dehi. ‘Gaṇhathāvuso pattacīvarāni, dhammasenāpati nālakagāmaṃ
atk-s0305a:430_0: Bhikkhū senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Thero
atk-s0305a:430_1: senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0305a:430_2: “idaṃ dāni pacchimadassanaṃ, puna āgamanaṃ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto
atk-s0305a:430_3: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “anujānātu me bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0305a:430_4: anujānātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo me, ossaṭṭho me āyusaṅkhāro”ti. Buddhā pana yasmā
atk-s0305a:430_5: “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentīti, “mā parinibbāhī”ti vutte vaṭṭassa
atk-s0305a:430_6: guṇaṃ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṃ āropessanti, tasmā tadubhayampi na vadanti.
atk-s0305a:430_7: Tena naṃ bhagavā – “kattha parinibbāyissasi sāriputtā”ti vatvā – “atthi, bhante,
atk-s0305a:430_8: magadhesu nālakagāme jātovarako, tatthāhaṃ parinibbāyissāmī”ti vutte – “yassa dāni
atk-s0305a:430_9: tvaṃ, sāriputta, kālaṃ maññasi, idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṃ tādisassa
atk-s0305a:430_10: bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati, desehi nesaṃ dhamma”nti āha.
atk-s0305a:431_0: Thero – “satthā mayhaṃ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0305a:431_1: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a:431_2: puna dvitālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi, etenupāyena sattatālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:431_3: abbhuggantvā anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṃ ārabhi. Dissamānenapi
atk-s0305a:431_4: kāyena katheti, adissamānenapi. Uparimena vā heṭṭhimena vā upaḍḍhakāyena katheti
atk-s0305a:431_5: adissamānenapi dissamānenapi, kālena candavaṇṇaṃ dasseti, kālena sūriyavaṇṇaṃ, kālena
atk-s0305a:431_6: pabbatavaṇṇaṃ, kālena samuddavaṇṇaṃ, kālena cakkavattirājā hoti, kālena vessavaṇamahārājā,
