atk-s0305a:431_7: kālena sakko devarājā, kālena mahābrahmāti evaṃ anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento
atk-s0305a:431_8: dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Sakalanagaraṃ sannipati. Thero oruyha dasabalassa pāde vanditvā
atk-s0305a:431_9: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “ko nāmo ayaṃ sāriputta dhammapariyāyo”ti. Sīhavikīḷito
atk-s0305a:431_10: nāma, bhanteti. Taggha, sāriputta, sīhavikīḷito taggha, sāriputta, sīhavikīḷitoti.
atk-s0305a:432_0: Thero alattakavaṇṇe hatthe pasāretvā satthu suvaṇṇakacchapasadise pāde gopphakesu
atk-s0305a:432_1: gahetvā – “bhante, imesaṃ pādānaṃ vandanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0305a:432_2: pāramiyo pūritā, so me manoratho matthakaṃ patto, ito dāni paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0305a:432_3: na puna ekaṭṭhāne sannipāto samāgamo atthi, chinno esa vissāso, anekehi buddhasatasahassehi
atk-s0305a:432_4: paviṭṭhaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṃ khemaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ abhayaṃ nibbānapuraṃ pavisissāmi, sace
atk-s0305a:432_5: me kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha, khamatha taṃ bhagavā, gamanakālo mayha”nti.
atk-s0305a:432_6: Khamāmi te, sāriputta, na kho pana te kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā mayhaṃ aruccanakaṃ
atk-s0305a:432_7: atthi, yassa dāni tvaṃ, sāriputta, kālaṃ maññasīti.
atk-s0305a:433_0: Iti bhagavatā anuññātasamanantaraṃ satthu pāde vanditvā uṭṭhitamatte āyasmante sāriputte
atk-s0305a:433_2: na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya ekappahāreneva viravamānā mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantā
atk-s0305a:433_3: akampi, ākāse devadundubhiyo phaliṃsu, mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0305a:434_1: gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi. Thero tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā
atk-s0305a:434_3: pādamūle nipajjitvā tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ patthesiṃ, sā me patthanā samiddhā, diṭṭhā
atk-s0305a:434_4: tumhe, taṃ paṭhamadassanaṃ, idaṃ pacchimadassanaṃ. Puna tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ natthī”ti
atk-s0305a:434_5: vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yāva dassanavisayā abhimukhova
atk-s0305a:434_6: paṭikkamitvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Puna mahāpathavī dhāretuṃ asakkontī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampi.
atk-s0305a:435_0: Bhagavā parivāretvā ṭhite bhikkhū āha – “anugacchatha, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātika”nti.
atk-s0305a:435_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe catassopi parisā sammāsambuddhaṃ ekakaṃyeva jetavane ohāya niravasesā
atk-s0305a:435_3: parinibbāyitukāmo nikkhanto, passissāma na”nti nagaradvārāni nirokāsāni karontā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0305a:435_4: gandhamālādihatthā kese vikiritvā – “idāni mayaṃ kahaṃ mahāpañño nisinno, kahaṃ dhammasenāpati
atk-s0305a:435_5: nisinno”ti pucchantā – “kassa santikaṃ gamissāma, kassa hatthe satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a:435_6: thero pakkanto”tiādinā nayena paridevantā rodantā theraṃ anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:436_0: Thero mahāpaññāya ṭhitattā – “sabbesaṃ anatikkamanīyo esa maggo”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā
atk-s0305a:436_1: – “tumhepi, āvuso, tiṭṭhatha, mā dasabale pamādaṃ āpajjitthā”ti bhikkhusaṅghampi
atk-s0305a:436_2: nivattetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṃ pakkāmi. Yepi manussā – “pubbe ayyo paccāgamanacārikaṃ
atk-s0305a:436_3: carati, idaṃ idāni gamanaṃ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti paridevantā anubandhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0305a:436_4: Tepi – “appamattā, āvuso, hotha, evaṃbhāvino nāma saṅkhārā”ti nivattesi.
atk-s0305a:437_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sabbattha ekarattivāsena antarāmagge sattāhaṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0305a:437_1: saṅgahaṃ karonto sāyaṃ nālakagāmaṃ patvā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. Atha
atk-s0305a:437_2: uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0305a:437_3: vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero taṃ āha – “atthi gehe te ayyikā”ti. Āma bhanteti. Gaccha
atk-s0305a:437_4: amhākaṃ idhāgatabhāvaṃ ārocehi. “Kasmā āgato”ti ca vutte – “ajja kira ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0305a:437_5: antogāme vasissati, jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggatha, pañcannañca kira bhikkhusatānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:437_6: jānāthā”ti. So gantvā – “ayyike mayhaṃ mātulo āgato”ti āha. Idāni kuhinti? Gāmadvāreti.
atk-s0305a:437_7: Ekakova, aññopi koci atthīti? Atthi pañcasatā bhikkhūti. Kiṃkāraṇā āgatoti? So taṃ
atk-s0305a:437_8: pavattiṃ ārocesi. Brāhmaṇī – “kiṃ nu kho ettakānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggāpeti, daharakāle
atk-s0305a:437_9: pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0305a:437_10: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0305a:438_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha jātovarakaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi, nisīditvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0305a:438_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchathā”ti bhikkhū uyyojesi. Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo
atk-s0305a:438_2: ābādho uppajji, lohitapakkhandikā māraṇantikā vedanā vattanti. Ekaṃ bhājanaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0305a:438_3: ekaṃ nikkhamati. Brāhmaṇī – “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṃ na ruccatī”ti attano vasanagabbhadvāraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:439_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṃ viharatī”ti olokentā nālakagāme jātovarake
atk-s0305a:439_1: parinibbānamañce nipanno, pacchimadassanaṃ gamissāmā”ti āgamma vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0305a:439_2: Ke tumheti? Mahārājāno bhanteti. Kasmā āgatatthāti? Gilānupaṭṭhākā bhavissāmāti.
atk-s0305a:439_3: “Hotu, atthi gilānupaṭṭhāko, gacchatha tumhe”ti uyyojesi. Tesaṃ gatāvasāne teneva
atk-s0305a:439_4: nayena sakko devānamindo. Tasmiṃ gate mahābrahmā ca āgamiṃsu. Tepi tatheva thero uyyojesi.
atk-s0305a:440_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṃ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0305a:440_1: gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṃ gantvā “tāta, cunda, kā pavattī”ti pucchi. So
atk-s0305a:440_2: taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “mahāupāsikā, bhante, āgatā”ti āha. Thero “kasmā avelāya
atk-s0305a:440_3: āgatā”ti pucchi. Sā “tuyhaṃ, tāta, dassanatthāyā”ti vatvā “tāta, paṭhamaṃ ke āgatā”ti
atk-s0305a:440_4: pucchi. Cattāro mahārājāno upāsiketi. Tāta, tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi mahantataroti?
atk-s0305a:440_5: Ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike, amhākaṃ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā
atk-s0305a:440_6: hutvā ārakkhaṃ akaṃsūti. Tesaṃ tāta gatāvasāne ko āgatoti? Sakko devānamindoti. Devarājatopi
atk-s0305a:440_7: tvaṃ tāta mahantataroti? Bhaṇḍaggāhakasāmaṇerasadiso esa upāsike, amhākaṃ satthu
atk-s0305a:440_8: tāvatiṃsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā otiṇṇoti. Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotayamāno
atk-s0305a:440_9: viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike, tuyhaṃ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti. Mayhaṃ
atk-s0305a:440_10: bhagavato mahābrahmatopi tvaṃ, tāta, mahantataroti? Āma upāsike, ete nāma kira amhākaṃ
atk-s0305a:440_11: satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti.
atk-s0305a:441_0: Atha brāhmaṇiyā – “puttassa tāva me ayaṃ ānubhāvo, kīdiso vata mayhaṃ puttassa bhagavato
atk-s0305a:441_1: satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0305a:441_2: phari. Thero – “uppannaṃ me mātu pītisomanassaṃ, ayaṃ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā”ti
atk-s0305a:441_3: cintetvā “kiṃ cintesi mahāupāsike”ti āha. Sā “puttassa tāva me ayaṃ guṇo, satthu
atk-s0305a:441_4: panassa kīdiso bhavissatīti idaṃ, tāta, cintemī”ti āha. Mahāupāsike, mayhaṃ satthujātakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:441_5: mahābhinikkhamane sambodhiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0305a:441_6: Sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi, itipi so
atk-s0305a:442_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṃ āha
atk-s0305a:442_1: – “tāta upatissa, kasmā evamakāsi, evarūpaṃ nāma amataṃ mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na adāsī”ti.
atk-s0305a:442_2: Thero – “dinnaṃ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṃ, ettakena vaṭṭissatī”ti
atk-s0305a:442_3: cintetvā – “gaccha mahāupasike”ti brāhmaṇiṃ uyyojetvā – “cunda kā velā”ti āha. Balavapaccūsakālo,
atk-s0305a:442_4: bhanteti. Bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātehīti. Sannipatito bhante bhikkhusaṅghoti. “Maṃ
atk-s0305a:443_0: Thero bhikkhū āmantesi – “āvuso catucattālīsaṃ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṃ vicarantānaṃ
atk-s0305a:443_1: yaṃ me kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha, taṃ khamatha āvuso”ti. Ettakaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0305a:443_2: amhākaṃ chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṃ aruccanakaṃ nāma natthi, tumhe pana
atk-s0305a:443_3: amhākaṃ khamathāti. Atha thero mahācīvaraṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā mukhaṃ pidhāya dakkhiṇena
atk-s0305a:443_4: passena nipanno satthā viya nava anupubbasamāpattiyo anulomapaṭilomato samāpajjitvā
atk-s0305a:443_5: puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva catutthajjhānā samāpajji. Tato vuṭṭhāya anantaraṃyeva
atk-s0305a:444_0: Upāsikā – “kiṃ nu kho me putto, na kiñci kathetī”ti uṭṭhāya piṭṭhipāde parimajjantī
atk-s0305a:444_1: parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsaddaṃ kurumānā pādesu nipatitvā – “tāta mayaṃ ito pubbe
atk-s0305a:444_2: tava guṇaṃ na jānimhā, idāni pana taṃ ādiṃ katvā anekasate anekasahasse anekasatasahasse
atk-s0305a:444_3: bhikkhū imasmiṃ nivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojetuṃ na labhimhā, cīvarehi acchādetuṃ na
atk-s0305a:444_4: labhimhā, vihārasataṃ vihārasahassaṃ kāretuṃ na labhimhā”ti yāva aruṇuggamanā paridevi.
atk-s0305a:444_5: Aruṇe uggatamatteyeva suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭiyo
atk-s0305a:444_6: mahātulāya tulāpetvā – “pañca kūṭāgārasatāni pañca agghikasatāni karothā”ti dāpeti.
atk-s0305a:445_0: Sakkopi devarājā vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantetvā – “tāta dhammasenāpati parinibbuto,
atk-s0305a:445_1: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni pañca agghikasatāni ca māpehī”ti āha. Iti upāsikāya kāritāni
atk-s0305a:445_2: ca vissakammena nimmitāni ca sabbānipi dvesahassāni ahesuṃ. Tato nagaramajjhe sāramayaṃ
atk-s0305a:445_3: mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā maṇḍapamajjhe mahākūṭāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni parivārasaṅkhepena
atk-s0305a:445_4: ṭhapetvā sādhukīḷikaṃ ārabhiṃsu. Devānaṃ antare manussā, manussānaṃ antare devā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0305a:446_0: Revatī nāma ekā therassa upaṭṭhāyikā – “ahaṃ therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ
atk-s0305a:446_1: tayo kumbhe kāresi. “Therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti sakko devarājā aḍḍhateyyakoṭināṭakehi
atk-s0305a:446_2: parivārito otari. “Sakko otaratī”ti mahājano pacchāmukho paṭikkami. Tattha sāpi upāsikā
atk-s0305a:446_3: paṭikkamamānā garubhārattā ekamantaṃ apasakkituṃ asakkontī manussānaṃ antare pati.
atk-s0305a:446_4: Manussā apassantā taṃ madditvā agamiṃsu. Sā tattheva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0305a:446_5: kanakavimāne nibbatti. Nibbattakkhaṇeyevassā ratanakkhandho viya tigāvutappamāṇo
atk-s0305a:446_7: Athassā dibbaṃ sabbakāyikādāsaṃ purato ṭhapayiṃsu. Sā attano sirisampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0305a:446_8: – “uḷārā ayaṃ sampatti, kiṃ nu kho me kammaṃ kata”nti cintayamānā addasa – “mayā
atk-s0305a:446_9: sāriputtattherassa parinibbutaṭṭhāne tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi pūjā katā, mahājano
atk-s0305a:446_10: maṃ madditvā gato, sāhaṃ tattha kālaṃ katvā idhūpapannā, theraṃ nissāya laddhaṃ idāni
atk-s0305a:446_11: puññavipākaṃ manussānaṃ kathessāmī”ti saha vimāneneva otari.
atk-s0305a:447_0: Mahājano dūratova disvā – “kiṃ nu kho dve sūriyā uṭṭhitā”ti? Olokento – “vimāne āgacchante
atk-s0305a:447_1: kūṭāgārasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyati, nāyaṃ sūriyo, vimānametaṃ eka”nti āha. Tampi vimānaṃ
atk-s0305a:447_2: tāvadeva āgantvā therassa dārucitakamatthake vehāsaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Devadhītā vimānaṃ ākāseyeva
atk-s0305a:447_3: ṭhapetvā pathaviṃ otari. Mahājano – “kā tvaṃ, ayye”ti? Pucchi. “Na maṃ tumhe jānātha,
atk-s0305a:447_4: revatī nāmāhaṃ, tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi theraṃ pūjaṃ katvā manussehi madditā kālaṃ
atk-s0305a:447_5: katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattā, passatha me sirisampattiṃ, tumhepi dāni dānāni detha,
atk-s0305a:447_6: puññāni karothā”ti kusalakiriyāya vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā therassa citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:448_0: Mahājanopi sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷitvā sabbagandhehi citakaṃ akāsi, citakā ekūnaratanasatikā
atk-s0305a:448_1: ahosi. Therassa sarīraṃ citakaṃ āropetvā usīrakalāpakehi ālimpesuṃ. Āḷāhane sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0305a:448_2: dhammassavanaṃ pavatti. Anuruddhatthero sabbagandhodakena therassa citakaṃ nibbāpesi.
atk-s0305a:448_3: Cundatthero dhātuyo parissāvane pakkhipitvā – “na dāni mayā idheva sakkā ṭhātuṃ,
atk-s0305a:448_5: ārocessāmī”ti dhātuparissāvanaṃ therassa ca pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0305a:448_6: Ekaṭṭhānepi ca dve rattiyo avasitvā sabbattha ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a:448_7: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho cundo samaṇuddesotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:449_0: Tattha yenāyasmā ānandoti yena attano upajjhāyo dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando,
atk-s0305a:449_1: tenupasaṅkami. Kasmā panesa ujukaṃ satthu santikaṃ agantvā therassa santikaṃ agamāsīti?
atk-s0305a:449_2: Satthari ca there ca gāravena. Jetavanamahāvihāre pokkharaṇiyaṃ kirassa nhatvā paccuttaritvā
atk-s0305a:449_3: sunivatthasupārutassa etadahosi – “buddhā nāma mahāpāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuno, phaṇakatasappa
atk-s0305a:449_4: sīhabyagghamattavaravāraṇādayo viya ca durāsadā, na sakkā mayā ujukameva satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0305a:449_5: gantvā kathetuṃ, kassa nu kho santikaṃ gantabba”nti. Tato cintesi – “upajjhāyo me
atk-s0305a:449_6: dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko jeṭṭhabhātikattherassa uttamasahāyo, tassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ
atk-s0305a:449_7: ādāya satthārā saddhiṃ kathessāmī”ti satthari ceva there ca gāravena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0305a:450_0: Idamassa pattacīvaranti “ayamassa paribhogapatto, idaṃ dhātuparissāvana”nti evaṃ
atk-s0305a:450_1: ekekaṃ ācikkhi. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “idamassa pattacīvara”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Kathāpābhatanti
atk-s0305a:453_0: Bhagavantaṃ dassanāyāti bhagavantaṃ dassanatthāya. Kiṃ paniminā bhagavā na diṭṭhapubboti?
atk-s0305a:453_1: No na diṭṭhapubbo. Ayañhi āyasmā divā nava vāre, rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa
atk-s0305a:453_2: vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati. Divasassa pana satavāraṃ vā sahassavāraṃ vā gantukāmo
atk-s0305a:453_3: samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati, ekaṃ pañhadvāraṃ gahetvāva gacchati. So taṃdivasaṃ
atk-s0305a:453_4: tena kathāpābhatena gantukāmo evamāha. Idamassa pattacīvaranti theropi – “idaṃ tassa
atk-s0305a:453_5: pattacīvaraṃ, idañca dhātuparissāvana”nti pāṭiyekkaṃyeva dassetvā ācikkhi.
atk-s0305a:454_0: Satthā hatthaṃ pasāretvā dhātuparissāvanaṃ gahetvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā bhikkhū āmantesi
atk-s0305a:454_1: – “yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu purimadivase anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni katvā parinibbānaṃ
atk-s0305a:454_2: anujānāpesi, tassa idāni imā saṅkhavaṇṇasannibhā dhātuyova paññāyanti, kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0305a:454_3: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pūritapāramī esa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anupavattako
atk-s0305a:454_4: esa bhikkhu, paṭiladdhadutiyaāsano esa bhikkhu, pūritasāvakasannipāto esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a:454_5: ṭhapetvā maṃ dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu paññāya asadiso esa bhikkhu, mahāpañño esa
atk-s0305a:454_6: bhikkhu, puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a:454_7: appiccho esa bhikkhu, santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo codako pāpagarahī
atk-s0305a:454_8: esa bhikkhu, pañca jātisatāni paṭiladdhamahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajito esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a:454_9: mama sāsane pathavīsamakhantiko esa bhikkhu, chinnavisāṇausabhasadiso esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a:454_10: caṇḍālaputtasadisanīcacitto esa bhikkhu. Passatha, bhikkhave, mahāpaññassa dhātuyo,
atk-s0305a:454_11: passatha, bhikkhave, puthupaññassa hāsapaññassa javanapaññassa tikkhapaññassa nibbedhikapaññassa
atk-s0305a:454_12: appicchassa santuṭṭhassa pavivittassa asaṃsaṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyassa, codakassa,
atk-s0305a:471_0: Iti bhagavā pañcahi gāthāsatehi therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Yathā yathā bhagavā therassa
atk-s0305a:471_1: vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, tathā tathā ānandatthero sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti, biḷāramukhe pakkhantakukkuṭo
atk-s0305a:471_2: viya pavedhati. Tenāha apica me, bhante, madhurakajāto viya kāyoti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:471_3: Tattha madhurakajātotiādīnaṃ attho vuttoyeva. Idha pana dhammāti uddesaparipucchādhammā
atk-s0305a:471_4: adhippetā. Tassa hi uddesaparipucchādhamme agahite vā gahetuṃ, gahite vā sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0305a:471_5: kātuṃ cittaṃ na pavattati. Atha satthā pañcapasādavicitrāni akkhīni ummīletvā theraṃ
atk-s0305a:471_6: olokento “assāsessāmi na”nti assāsento kiṃ nu kho te, ānanda, sāriputtotiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:472_0: Tattha sīlakkhandhanti lokiyalokuttarasīlaṃ. Samādhipaññāsupi eseva nayo. Vimutti
atk-s0305a:472_1: pana lokuttarāva. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, taṃ lokiyameva. Ovādakoti
atk-s0305a:472_2: ovādadāyako. Otiṇṇoti otiṇṇesu vatthūsu nānappakārena otaraṇasīlo. Viññāpakoti dhammakathākāle
atk-s0305a:472_3: atthañca kāraṇañca viññāpetā. Sandassakoti khandhadhātuāyatanavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0305a:472_4: dhammānaṃ dassetā. Samādapakoti “idañcidañca gaṇhathā”ti evaṃ gaṇhāpako. Samuttejakoti
atk-s0305a:473_0: Akilāsu dhammadesanāyāti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhitvā “sīsaṃ vā me rujjati, hadayaṃ vā
atk-s0305a:473_1: kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā”ti evaṃ osakkanākāravirahito nikkilāsu visārado ekassāpi dvinnampi
atk-s0305a:473_2: sīhavegeneva pakkhandati. Anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnanti padassa attho khandhakavagge
atk-s0305a:473_3: vitthāritova. Dhammojaṃ dhammabhoganti ubhayenapi dhammaparibhogova kathito. Dhammānuggahanti
atk-s0305a:474_0: Satthā “ativiya ayaṃ bhikkhu kilamatī”ti puna taṃ assāsento nanu taṃ, ānanda, mayātiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:474_1: Tattha piyehi manāpehīti mātāpitābhātābhaginīādikehi jātiyā nānābhāvo, maraṇena vinābhāvo,
atk-s0305a:474_2: bhavena aññathābhāvo. Taṃ kutettha, ānanda, labbhāti tanti tasmā. Yasmā sabbehi piyehi
atk-s0305a:474_3: manāpehi nānābhāvo, tasmā dasa pāramiyo pūretvāpi sambodhiṃ patvāpi dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0305a:474_4: pavattetvāpi yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvāpi devorohanaṃ katvāpi yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ
atk-s0305a:474_5: saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ, taṃ tathāgatassāpi sarīraṃ mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati,
atk-s0305a:474_6: rodantenapi kandantenapi na sakkā taṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhunti. So palujjeyyāti so bhijjeyya.
atk-s0305a:475_0: Evameva khoti ettha yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho tassa dakkhiṇadisaṃ
atk-s0305a:475_1: gato paññāsayojaniko mahākhandho viya dhammasenāpati. Tasmiṃ mahākhandhe bhinne tato
atk-s0305a:475_2: paṭṭhāya anupubbena vaḍḍhitvā pupphaphalādīhi taṃ ṭhānaṃ pūretuṃ samatthassa aññassa
atk-s0305a:475_3: khandhassa abhāvo viya there parinibbute soḷasannaṃ paññānaṃ matthakaṃ pattassa aññassa
atk-s0305a:475_4: dakkhiṇāsane nisīdanasamatthassa sāriputtasadisassa bhikkhuno abhāvo. Tāya paribhinnāya
atk-s0305a:475_5: so rukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho khandhotveva jātoti veditabbo. Tasmāti yasmā sabbaṃ
atk-s0305a:475_6: saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ, taṃ mā palujjīti na sakkā laddhuṃ, tasmā.
atk-s0305a:477_1: dvīsu aggasāvakesu. Tesañhi dhammasenāpati kattikamāsapuṇṇamāya parinibbuto, mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0305a:477_2: tato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamma amāvasuposathe. Satthā dvīsu aggasāvakesu parinibbutesu
atk-s0305a:477_3: mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mahāmaṇḍale cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena ukkacelanagaraṃ
atk-s0305a:477_4: patvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā gaṅgāpiṭṭhe rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālikāpuline vihāsi. Tena
atk-s0305a:477_5: vuttaṃ “aciraparinibbutesu sāriputtamoggallānesū”ti. Ye mahantatarā khandhā te palujjeyyunti
atk-s0305a:477_6: idhāpi yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho, tassa dakkhiṇato ca uttarato
atk-s0305a:477_7: ca gatā paṇṇāsayojanikā dve mahākhandhā viya dve aggasāvakāti. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva
atk-s0305a:479: 382. Chaṭṭhe maccudheyyassa pāranti tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pārabhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0305a:481_0: 384. Aṭṭhame kāye vā bhikkhūti tasmiṃ kāle bhikkhuyeva natthi, evaṃ santepi yo satipaṭṭhāne
atk-s0305a:481_1: bhāveti, so kilesabhindanena bhikkhuyevāti dassento evamāha. Ekāyananti ekamaggaṃ.
atk-s0305a:481_2: Jātikkhayantadassīti jātiyā khayoti ca antoti ca nibbānaṃ, taṃ passatīti attho. Maggaṃ
atk-s0305a:481_3: pajānātīti ekāyanasaṅkhātaṃ ekamaggabhūtaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti. Ekāyanamaggo vuccati
atk-s0305a:483_0: 385. Navame sumbhesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Medakathālikāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena
atk-s0305a:483_1: laddhanāmaṃ. Mamaṃ rakkha, ahaṃ taṃ rakkhissāmīti ettha ayaṃ tassa laddhi – ācariyo
atk-s0305a:483_2: ukkhittavaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ agaṇhanto, antevāsikena pakkhantapakkhantadisaṃ agacchanto,
atk-s0305a:483_3: sabbakālañca vaṃsaggaṃ anullokento antevāsikaṃ na rakkhati nāma, evaṃ arakkhito antevāsiko
atk-s0305a:483_4: patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti. Vaṃsaṃ pana suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto, tena pakkhantapakkhantadisaṃ
atk-s0305a:483_5: gacchanto, sabbakālañca vaṃsaggaṃ ullokento taṃ rakkhati nāma. Antevāsikopi ito cito
atk-s0305a:483_6: ca pakkhanditvā migo viya kīḷanto ācariyaṃ na rakkhati nāma. Evañhi sati tikhiṇavaṃsakoṭi
atk-s0305a:483_7: ācariyassa galavāṭake vā nalāṭe vā ṭhapitā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ bhinditvā gaccheyya. Ācārasampannatāya
atk-s0305a:483_8: pana yato vaṃso namati, tato anāmento taṃ ākaḍḍhento viya ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvā vātūpathambhaṃ
atk-s0305a:483_9: gāhāpetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā niccalova nisīdanto ācariyaṃ rakkhati nāmāti.
atk-s0305a:484_0: Tvaṃ ācariya attānaṃ rakkha, ahaṃ attānaṃ rakkhissāmīti ettha ayamadhippāyo – ācariyo
atk-s0305a:484_1: vaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto, antevāsikena pakkhantapakkhantadisaṃgacchanto, sabbakālañca
atk-s0305a:484_2: vaṃsaggaṃ ullokento, attānameva rakkhati, na antevāsikaṃ. Antevāsikopi kāyampi ekatobhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:484_3: katvā vātūpathambhaṃ gāhāpetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā niccalova nisīdamāno attānaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:485_0: So tattha ñāyoti yaṃ medakathālikā āha. So tattha ñāyo, so upāyo, taṃ kāraṇanti attho.
atk-s0305a:485_1: Satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevitabbanti catubbidhaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevitabbaṃ. Āsevanāyāti kammaṭṭhānāsevanāya.
atk-s0305a:485_2: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhatīti yo bhikkhu kammārāmatādīni
atk-s0305a:485_3: pahāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ āsevanto bhāvento arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:485_4: atha naṃ paro disvā – “bhaddako vatāyaṃ, bhikkhu, sammāpaṭipanno”ti tasmiṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0305a:485_5: pasādetvā saggaparāyaṇo hoti. Ayaṃ attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a:486_0: Khantiyāti adhivāsanakhantiyā. Avihiṃsāyāti sapubbabhāgāya karuṇāya. Mettacittatāyāti
atk-s0305a:486_1: sapubbabhāgāya mettāya. Anudayatāyāti anuvaḍḍhiyā, sapubbabhāgāya muditāyāti attho.
atk-s0305a:486_2: Paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatīti ettha yo bhikkhu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gato tīsu
atk-s0305a:486_3: brahmavihāresu tikacatukkajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0305a:486_4: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ayaṃ paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:488_0: 386. Dasame janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
atk-s0305a:488_1: Sā hi yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā, nātikisā nātithūlā, nātikāḷā nāccodātā, atikkantā,
atk-s0305a:488_2: mānusavaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ, tasmā chasarīradosarahitā. Chavikalyāṇaṃ, maṃsakalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:488_3: nhārukalyāṇaṃ, aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ, vayakalyāṇanti imehi pana kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā
atk-s0305a:488_4: pañcakalyāṇehi samannāgatā nāma. Tassā hi āgantukobhāsakiccaṃ natthi, attano sarīrobhāseneva
atk-s0305a:488_5: dvādasahatthaṭṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti, piyaṅgusāmā vā hoti, suvaṇṇasāmā vā, ayamassā
atk-s0305a:488_6: chavikalyāṇatā. Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ
atk-s0305a:488_7: viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti, ayamassā maṃsakalyāṇatā. Vīsati pana nakhapattāni
atk-s0305a:488_8: maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya, muttaṭṭhāne khīradhārāsadisāni, honti
atk-s0305a:488_9: ayamassā nhārukalyāṇakatā. Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti,
atk-s0305a:488_10: ayamassā aṭṭhikalyāṇatā. Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya
atk-s0305a:489_0: Paramapāsāvinīti ettha pasavanaṃ pasāvo, pavattīti attho. Pasāvo eva pāsāvo. Paramo
atk-s0305a:489_1: pāsāvo paramapāsāvo, so assā atthīti paramapāsāvinī. Nacce ca gīte ca uttamapavatti
atk-s0305a:489_2: seṭṭhakiriyā, uttamameva naccaṃ naccati, gītaṃ vā gāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0305a:489_3: uttānatthameva. Imesu pana dvīsu suttesu pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitāti.
atk-s0305a:493: 387-388. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlāni. Dutiye ummaṅgoti pañhamaggo pañhagavesanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:495_0: 389-391. Tatiye parihānaṃ hotīti puggalavasena parihānaṃ hoti. Yo hi buddhesu dharantesupi
atk-s0305a:495_1: cattāro satipaṭṭhāne na bhāveti, tassa saddhammo antarahito nāma hoti devadattādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:495_2: viya. Iti imasmiṃ sutte tassa puggalasseva dhammantaradhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Catutthapañcamesu sabbaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0305a:497: 392. Chaṭṭhe padesaṃ bhāvitattāti padesato bhāvitattā. Cattāro hi magge tīṇi ca phalāni nibbattentena satipaṭṭhānā padesaṃ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:499: 393. Sattame samattaṃ bhāvitattāti samattā bhāvitattā. Arahattaphalaṃ uppādentena hi satipaṭṭhānā samattaṃ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:501_0: 394-396. Aṭṭhame mahābhiññatanti channaṃ abhiññānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Sahassaṃ lokaṃ
atk-s0305a:501_1: abhijānāmīti satatavihāravaseneva vuttaṃ. Thero kira pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0305a:501_2: senāsane nisinno atīte kappasahassaṃ, anāgate kappasahassaṃ anussarati, paccuppannepi
atk-s0305a:501_3: sahassaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ tassāvajjanassa gatiṃ anubandhati. Iti so dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0305a:501_4: sahassaṃ lokaṃ abhijānāti, ayamassa satatavihāro. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:504_0: 401-406. Catutthavaggassa pañcame viditā vedanāti yā vedanā sammasitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:504_1: patto tāvassa viditā uppajjanti, viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti
atk-s0305a:504_2: nāma. Yā ca pana pariggahitesu vatthārammaṇesu pavattā vedanā, tāpi viditā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:504_3: viditā upaṭṭhahanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti nāma. Vitakkādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:508_0: 408. Pañcamavaggassa dutiye āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayoti āhārasamudayena kāyasamudayo.
atk-s0305a:508_1: Eseva nayo sesesu. Manasikārasamudayāti ettha pana yonisomanasikārasamudayā bojjhaṅgadhammānaṃ
atk-s0305a:508_2: samudayo, ayonisomanasikārasamudayā nīvaraṇadhammānaṃ. Iti imasmiṃ sutte sārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:510: 410. Catutthaṃ suddhikaṃ katvā samudaye kathite bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:512_0: 412. Chaṭṭhe pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti catunnaṃ sīlānaṃ jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0305a:512_1: Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero panāha – “pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ, itarāni tīṇi sīlanti
atk-s0305a:512_2: vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Vatvā taṃ anujānanto āha – “indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhaṇamattameva,
atk-s0305a:512_3: ājīvapārisuddhi dhammeneva samena paccayuppattimattakaṃ, paccayasannissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye
atk-s0305a:512_5: sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno, ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde, sesāni rakkhissatīti
atk-s0305a:512_6: na vattabbo. Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ, sesāni puna
atk-s0305a:512_7: pākatikāni katvā rakkhitumpi sakkotī”ti. Tasmā pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ, tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena
atk-s0305a:513_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno. Aṇumattesūti appamattakesu.
atk-s0305a:513_1: Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassī. Samādāyāti sammā ādiyitvā.
atk-s0305a:513_2: Sikkhassu sikkhāpadesūti sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkha, yaṃ
atk-s0305a:513_3: yaṃ pana kiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā,
atk-s0305a:513_4: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādāya sikkhassūti ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Vitthāro pana visuddhimagge
atk-s0305a:513_5: vutto. Iti imasmiṃ sutte pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:515_1: tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. Iminā nayena pañcasattanavadasasu
atk-s0305a:515_2: kusalakammapathesu pacchimāpi tayo sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā. Sesaṃ uttānamevāti. Chaṭṭhasattamesu
atk-s0305a:519_0: 471. Indriyasaṃyuttassa paṭhame saddhindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ paññindriyanti imāni tīṇi
atk-s0305a:519_1: catubhūmakakusalavipākesu ceva kiriyāsu ca labbhanti. Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyāni
atk-s0305a:519_2: catubhūmakakusale akusale vipāke kiriyāyāti sabbattha labbhanti. Iti idaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0305a:521_0: 477. Sattame saddhindriyaṃ nappajānantīti dukkhasaccavasena na pajānanti. Saddhindriyasamudayaṃ
atk-s0305a:521_1: nappajānantīti samudayasaccavasena na pajānanti. Evaṃ nirodhaṃ nirodhasaccavasena,
atk-s0305a:522_0: Sukkapakkhe pana adhimokkhavasena āvajjanasamudayā saddhindriyasamudayo hoti, paggahavasena
atk-s0305a:522_3: paññindriyasamudayo hoti. Tathā chandavasena āvajjanasamudayā saddhindriyasamudayo
atk-s0305a:522_4: hoti, chandavasena āvajjanasamudayā vīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyasamudayo hoti. Manasikāravasena
atk-s0305a:522_5: āvajjanasamudayā saddhindriyasamudayo hoti. Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayā vīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyasamudayo
atk-s0305a:522_6: hotīti evampi attho veditabbo. Imesu paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:524_0: 478. Aṭṭhame kattha ca, bhikkhave, saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesūtiādi
atk-s0305a:524_1: imesaṃ indriyānaṃ savisaye jeṭṭhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathā hi cattāro seṭṭhiputtā
atk-s0305a:524_2: rājāti rājapañcamesu sahāyesu “nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu ekassa seṭṭhiputtassa
atk-s0305a:524_3: gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova – “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_4: detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā”ti gehe vicāreti. Dutiyassa, tatiyassa, catutthassa
atk-s0305a:524_5: gehaṃ gatakāle itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova – “imesaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_6: detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā”ti gehe vicāreti. Atha sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_7: gatakāle kiñcāpi rājā sabbattha issaro, imasmiṃ pana kāle attano geheyeva – “imesaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_8: khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ detha, gandhamālālaṅkārādīni dethā”ti gehe vicāreti. Evameva
atk-s0305a:524_9: saddhāpañcamakesu indriyesu tesu sahāyesu ekato vīthiṃ otarantesu viya ekārammaṇe
atk-s0305a:524_10: uppajjamānesupi yathā paṭhamassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova
atk-s0305a:524_11: vicāreti, evaṃ sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_12: hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Yathā dutiyassa gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī
atk-s0305a:524_13: nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ sammappadhānāni patvā paggahalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyindriyameva
atk-s0305a:524_14: jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Yathā tatiyassa gehe itare
atk-s0305a:524_15: cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ satipaṭṭhānāni patvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:524_16: satindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni honti. Yathā catutthassa
atk-s0305a:524_17: gehe itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti, gehasāmikova vicāreti, evaṃ jhānavimokkhe patvā
atk-s0305a:524_18: avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhindriyameva jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni
atk-s0305a:524_19: honti. Sabbapacchā rañño gehaṃ gatakāle pana yathā itare cattāro tuṇhī nisīdanti,
atk-s0305a:524_20: rājāva gehe vicāreti, evameva ariyasaccāni patvā pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ paññindriyameva
atk-s0305a:524_21: jeṭṭhakaṃ hoti pubbaṅgamaṃ, sesāni tadanvayāni hontīti.
atk-s0305a:526_0: 479-480. Navame satinepakkenāti ettha nipakassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0305a:526_1: Kasmā pana satibhājane paññā vuttāti? Satiyā balavabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Balavasati
atk-s0305a:526_2: hi idha adhippetā. Sā ca paññāsampayuttāva balavatī hoti, na vippayuttāti paññāsampayuttasatiṃ
atk-s0305a:526_3: dassento evamāha. Cirakatanti cirakālaṃ kataṃ dānaṃ vā sīlaṃ vā uposathakammaṃ vā.
atk-s0305a:526_4: Cirabhāsitanti “asukasmiṃ ṭhāne asukaṃ nāma bhāsita”nti evaṃ cirakāle bhāsitaṃ. Vossaggārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:526_5: katvāti nibbānārammaṇaṃ katvā. Udayatthagāminiyāti udayañca atthañca gacchantiyā,
atk-s0305a:526_6: udayabbayapariggahikāyāti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte saddhāsatipaññindriyāni pubbabhāgāni,
atk-s0305a:526_7: vīriyindriyaṃ missakaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva kathitaṃ. Dasamepi
atk-s0305a:530: 481. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame sammappadhāne ārabbhāti sammappadhāne paṭicca, sammappadhāne bhāventoti attho. Satindriyepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:532_0: 482. Dutiye tatoti vipassanāmaggaphalavasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samattāni hi paripuṇṇāni
atk-s0305a:532_1: pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti. Tato mudutarehīti tehi
atk-s0305a:532_2: arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni anāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma
atk-s0305a:532_3: honti, tato mudutarāni sakadāgāmimaggassa, tato mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni
atk-s0305a:532_4: nāma honti, tato mudutarāni dhammānusārimaggassa, tato mudutarāni saddhānusārimaggassa
atk-s0305a:533_0: Tathā samattāni paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattamaggindriyāni nāma honti, tato
atk-s0305a:533_1: mudutarāni anāgāmimaggindriyāni nāma honti, tato mudutarāni sakadāgāmimaggindriyāni
atk-s0305a:533_2: nāma honti, tato mudutarāni sotāpattimaggindriyāni nāma honti, tato mudutarāni dhammānusārimaggindriyāni,
atk-s0305a:534_0: Samattāni paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni arahattaphalindriyāni nāma honti, tato mudutarāni
atk-s0305a:534_1: anāgāmiphalindriyāni, tato mudutarāni sakadāgāmiphalindriyāni, tato mudutarāni sotāpattiphalindriyāni
atk-s0305a:534_2: nāma honti. Dhammānusārisaddhānusārino pana dvepi sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalā, maggaṭṭhapuggalavasena
atk-s0305a:534_3: nesaṃ nānattaṃ jātanti āgamanenapi maggenapi. Saddhānusārī puggalo hi uddisāpento
atk-s0305a:534_4: paripucchanto anupubbena maggaṃ pāpuṇāti, dhammānusārī ekena vā dvīhi vā savanehi.
atk-s0305a:534_5: Evaṃ tāva nesaṃ āgamanena nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:535_0: Dhammānusārissa pana maggo tikkho hoti, sūraṃ ñāṇaṃ vahati, asaṅkhārena appayogena
atk-s0305a:535_1: kilese chindati kadalikkhandhaṃ viya tikhiṇā asidhārā. Saddhānusārissa na tassa viya
atk-s0305a:535_2: maggo tikkho hoti, na sūraṃ ñāṇaṃ vahati, sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese chindati
atk-s0305a:535_3: kadalikkhandhaṃ viya atikhiṇā asidhārā. Kilesakkhaye pana tesaṃ nānattaṃ natthi.
atk-s0305a:537_0: 483. Tatiye tatoti phalavasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samattāni hi paripuṇṇāni pañcindriyāni
atk-s0305a:537_1: arahattaphalindriyāni nāma honti, arahattaphalena samannāgato puggalo arahā nāma
atk-s0305a:537_2: hoti. Arahattaphalato mudutarāni anāgāmiphalindriyāni nāma honti, tato mudutarāni
atk-s0305a:537_4: samannāgato puggalo sotāpanno nāma hoti. Indriyavemattatā phalavemattatā hotīti indriyanānattena
atk-s0305a:539_0: 484. Catutthe paripūraṃ paripūrakārī ārādhetīti paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ karonto
atk-s0305a:539_1: arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti. Padesaṃ padesakārīti avasese tayo padesamagge karonto padesaṃ
atk-s0305a:539_2: phalattayamattameva ārādheti. Iti imesu catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitāni.
atk-s0305a:541_0: 485-487. Pañcame tato mudutarehīti vipassanāvasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Paripuṇṇāni
atk-s0305a:541_1: hi pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni honti, tato mudutarāni antarāparinibbāyissa
atk-s0305a:541_2: vipassanindriyāni, tato mudutarāni upahaccaparinibbāyissa, tato mudutarāni asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa,
atk-s0305a:541_3: tato mudutarāni sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, tato mudutarāni uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmissa
atk-s0305a:542_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne arahattamaggeyeva ṭhatvā pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni. Arahattamaggassa
atk-s0305a:542_1: hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyissa vipassanindriyāni, tato
atk-s0305a:542_3: tato mudutarāni upahaccaparinibbāyissa, tato mudutarāni uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmissa
atk-s0305a:542_4: vipassanindriyāni. Asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinopi eteva pañca janā.
atk-s0305a:543_0: Idāni tīṇi nissakkāni. Sakadāgāmimaggassa hi indriyehi mudutarāni sotāpattimaggindriyāni,
atk-s0305a:543_1: sotāpattimaggeyeva indriyehi mudutarāni dhammānusārimaggindriyāni. Tehipi mudutarāni
atk-s0305a:543_2: saddhānusārimaggindriyāni. Chaṭṭhasattamāni vuttanayāneva. Imesu pana tīsupi suttesu
atk-s0305a:545_0: 488. Aṭṭhame tato mudutarehīti maggaphalavasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃ pāḷiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:545_1: vuttameva. Bāhiroti imehi aṭṭhahi puggalehi bahibhūto. Puthujjanapakkhe ṭhitoti puthujjanakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0305a:545_2: ṭhito. Imasmiṃ sutte lokuttarāneva indriyāni kathitāni.
atk-s0305a:547: 489-490. Navame indriyasampannoti paripuṇṇindriyo. Dasamaṃ uttānameva. Imasmiṃ suttadvaye missakāni indriyāni kathitānīti.
atk-s0305a:551_0: 492. Tatiyavaggassa dutiye itthindriyantiādīsu itthibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti itthindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:551_1: Purisabhāve indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti purisindriyaṃ. Jīvite indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti jīvitindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:551_2: Atthuppattikaṃ kiretaṃ suttaṃ. Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi “kati nu kho vaṭṭindriyānī”ti kathā
atk-s0305a:551_3: udapādi, atha bhagavā vaṭṭindriyāni dassento tīṇimāni bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:553_1: jānissāmī”ti paṭipannassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe uppannaṃ indriyaṃ. Aññindriyanti tesaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:553_2: ñātadhammānaṃ ājānanākārena sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu uppannaṃ indriyaṃ. Aññātāvindriyanti
atk-s0305a:553_3: aññātāvīsu arahattaphaladhammesu uppannaṃ indriyaṃ. Tattha tattha tena tenākārena
atk-s0305a:553_4: uppannassa ñāṇassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Idampi suttaṃ atthuppattikameva. Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi
atk-s0305a:553_5: “kati nu kho lokuttarindriyānī”ti kathā udapādi, atha bhagavā tāni dassento tīṇimāni,
atk-s0305a:555_0: 494. Catutthe tato mudutarehīti vipassanato nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samattāni hi pañcindriyāni
atk-s0305a:555_1: arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti, tato mudutarāni antarāparinibbāyissa
atk-s0305a:555_2: vipassanindriyāni, tato mudutarāni upahaccaparinibbāyissa, tato mudutarāni asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa,
atk-s0305a:555_3: tato mudutarāni sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa, tato mudutarāni uddhaṃsotaakaniṭṭhagāmissa
atk-s0305a:555_4: vipassanindriyāni nāma. Idhāpi purimanayeneva arahattamagge ṭhatvā pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni.
atk-s0305a:556_0: Yathā pana purimanaye sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā tīṇi nissakkāni, evamidha pañca nīharitabbāni.
atk-s0305a:556_1: Sakadāgāmimaggassa hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni,
atk-s0305a:556_2: sotāpattimaggassa ca tehi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni ekabījiādīnaṃ maggassa vipassanindriyāni.
atk-s0305a:557_0: Ettha ca ekabījītiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:557_1: ayaṃ ekabījī nāma. Yathāha “katamo ca puggalo ekabījī, idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0305a:557_2: parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so ekaññeva mānusakaṃ
atk-s0305a:557_3: bhavaṃ sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ekabījī”ti.
atk-s0305a:558_0: Yo pana dve tayo bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo nāma. Yathāha
atk-s0305a:558_1: “katamo ca puggalo kolaṃkolo. Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
atk-s0305a:558_2: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā
atk-s0305a:558_3: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kolaṃkolo”ti. Tattha kulānīti
atk-s0305a:558_4: bhavā veditabbā. “Dve vā tīṇi vā”ti idaṃ desanāmattameva, yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsaranto
atk-s0305a:559_0: Yassa sattakkhattuṃ paramā upapatti, aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyati, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo
atk-s0305a:559_1: nāma. Yathāha “katamo ca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo. Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0305a:559_2: parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo, so sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0305a:559_3: deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo
atk-s0305a:560_0: Bhagavatā gahitanāmavaseneva cetāni tesaṃ nāmāni. “Ettakañhi ṭhānaṃ gato ekabījī
atk-s0305a:560_1: nāma hoti, ettakaṃ kolaṃkolo, ettakaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0305a:560_2: gahitaṃ. Niyamato pana “ayaṃ ekabījī, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti natthi.
atk-s0305a:561_0: Ko pana nesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Keci pana therā “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0305a:561_1: keci “paṭhamamaggo”, keci “uparima tayo maggā”, keci “tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā”ti.
atk-s0305a:561_2: Tattha “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti, upari
atk-s0305a:561_3: tayo maggā anupanissayā uppannāti vacanaṃ āpajjati. “Paṭhamamaggo niyametī”ti vāde
atk-s0305a:561_4: upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. “Upari tayo maggā niyamentī”ti vāde
atk-s0305a:561_5: paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjati. “Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā
atk-s0305a:561_6: niyametī”ti vādo pana yujjati. Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0305a:561_7: ekabījī nāma hoti, tato mandatarāya kolaṃkolo, tato mandatarāya sattakkhattuparamoti.
atk-s0305a:562_0: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti vaṭṭābhirato punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati
atk-s0305a:562_1: sandissati. Anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi, visākhā upāsikā, cūḷarathamahārathā devaputtā,
atk-s0305a:562_2: anekavaṇṇo devaputto, sakko devarājā, nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā
atk-s0305a:562_3: vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-s0305a:562_4: ime idha na gahitā. Na kevalañcime, yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:562_5: pāpuṇāti, yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:562_6: pāpuṇāti, imepi idha na gahitā. Kālena deve, kālena manusse saṃsaritvā pana arahattaṃ
atk-s0305a:562_7: pāpuṇantova idha gahito. Tasmā sattakkhattuparamoti idaṃ idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassa
atk-s0305a:563_0: Dhammānusārī saddhānusārīti ettha pana imasmiṃ sāsane lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentassa
atk-s0305a:563_1: dve dhurāni, dve sīsāni, dve abhinivesā – saddhādhuraṃ, paññādhuraṃ, saddhāsīsaṃ,
atk-s0305a:563_2: paññāsīsaṃ, saddhābhiniveso, paññābhinivesoti. Tattha yo bhikkhu “sace saddhāya sakkā
atk-s0305a:563_3: nibbattetuṃ, nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ
atk-s0305a:563_4: nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti. Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto
atk-s0305a:563_5: nāma hutvā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tividho hoti. Tattha ekeko dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena
atk-s0305a:563_6: catubbidhabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti saddhādhurena dvādasa janā honti.
atk-s0305a:564_0: Yo pana “sace paññāya sakkā nibbattetuṃ, nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti paññaṃ
atk-s0305a:564_1: dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti. Phalakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:564_2: pana paññāvimutto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedena dvādasabhedova hoti. Evaṃ dve maggaṭṭhā
atk-s0305a:565_0: Tipiṭakatissatthero kira “tīṇi piṭakāni sodhessāmī”ti paratīraṃ gato. Taṃ eko kuṭumbiko
atk-s0305a:565_1: catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāsi, thero āgamanakāle “gacchāmi upāsakā”ti āha. “Kahaṃ bhante”ti?
atk-s0305a:565_2: “Amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santika”nti. “Na sakkā, bhante, mayā gantuṃ, bhaddantaṃ
atk-s0305a:565_3: pana nissāya mayā sāsanassa guṇo ñāto, tumhākaṃ parammukhā kīdisaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamāmī”ti?
atk-s0305a:565_4: Atha naṃ thero āha – “yo bhikkhu catuvīsati sotāpanne dvādasa sakadāgāmī aṭṭhacattālīsa
atk-s0305a:565_5: anāgāmī dvādasa arahante dassetvā dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti, evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0305a:565_6: upaṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Imasmiṃ sutte vipassanā kathitāti.
atk-s0305a:567_0: 495-500. Pañcame cakkhu ca taṃ cakkhudvāre nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena
atk-s0305a:567_1: indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti cakkhundriyaṃ. Sotindriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0305a:567_2: uttānameva. Imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamasuttañceva chaṭṭhādīni ca pañcāti cha suttāni catusaccavasena kathitānīti.
atk-s0305a:571_0: 501-505. Catutthavaggassa paṭhame sukhañca taṃ sahajātānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena
atk-s0305a:571_1: indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti sukhindriyaṃ. Dukkhindriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca sukhindriyadukkhindriyadomanassindriyāni
atk-s0305a:571_2: kāmāvacarāneva, somanassindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaraṃ sesaṃ tebhūmakaṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:573_0: 506. Chaṭṭhe kāyikanti kāyapasādavatthukaṃ. Sukhanti ayamassa sarūpaniddeso. Sātanti
atk-s0305a:573_1: tasseva vevacanaṃ, madhuranti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāyasamphassajanti kāyasamphassato jātaṃ.
atk-s0305a:573_2: Sukhaṃ sātanti vuttanayameva. Vedayitanti ayamassa sabbavedanāsādhāraṇo aññadhammavisiṭṭho
atk-s0305a:573_3: sabhāvaniddeso. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. Kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vāti
atk-s0305a:573_4: ettha pana cakkhādayo cattāro pasādakāye vatthuṃ katvā uppattivasena kāyikanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:575_0: 509. Navame dvinnaṃ kaṭṭhānanti dvinnaṃ araṇīnaṃ. Saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānāti saṅghaṭṭanena
atk-s0305a:575_1: ceva samodhānena ca. Usmāti usumākāro. Tejoti aggidhūmo. Ettha ca adharāraṇī viya
atk-s0305a:575_2: vatthārammaṇaṃ, uttarāraṇī viya phasso, saṅghaṭṭo viya phassasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ, aggi viya
atk-s0305a:575_3: vedanā daṭṭhabbā. Vatthārammaṇaṃ vā uttarāraṇī viya, phasso adharāraṇī viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:577_0: 510. Dasamaṃ yathādhammarasena paṭipāṭiyā vuttampi imasmiṃ indriyavibhaṅge sesasuttāni
atk-s0305a:577_1: viya adesitattā uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha nimittantiādīni sabbāni
atk-s0305a:577_2: paccayavevacanāneva. Dukkhindriyañca pajānātīti dukkhasaccavaseneva pajānāti. Dukkhindriyasamudayanti
atk-s0305a:577_3: kaṇṭakena vā viddhassa maṅkulena vā daṭṭhassa paccattharaṇe vā valiyā phuṭṭhassa
atk-s0305a:577_4: dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ etassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:578_0: Parato domanassindriyasamudayantiādīsupi tesaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇavaseneva samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:578_1: Pattacīvarādīnaṃ vā hi saṅkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikādīnaṃ vā sattānaṃ vināsena domanassindriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:578_2: uppajjatīti tesaṃ vināsaṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti. Subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā varasayane
atk-s0305a:578_4: taṃ phassaṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti. Vuttappakārānaṃ pana sattasaṅkhārānaṃ manāpānaṃ
atk-s0305a:578_5: paṭilābhavasena somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati, taṃ paṭilābhaṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:578_6: Majjhattākārena pana upekkhindriyaṃ uppajjati, taṃ sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattākāraṃ
atk-s0305a:579_0: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
atk-s0305a:579_1: kāmehītiādīsu pana ayaṃ ekatova vinicchayakathā – dukkhindriyañhi paṭhamajjhānassa
atk-s0305a:579_2: upacārakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati pahīnaṃ hoti, domanassādīni dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0305a:579_3: santepi tesaṃ atisayanirodhattā ayaṃ jhānesuyeva nirodho vutto. Atisayanirodho hi
atk-s0305a:579_4: tesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu, na nirodhoyeva, nirodhoyeva pana upacārakkhaṇe, nātisayanirodho.
atk-s0305a:579_5: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena
atk-s0305a:579_6: vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti, na tveva antoappanāyaṃ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ
atk-s0305a:579_7: na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena
atk-s0305a:579_8: sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti, sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:579_9: paṭipakkhena vihatattā. Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa
atk-s0305a:579_10: yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicārābhāve
atk-s0305a:579_11: neva uppajjati. Yattha pana uppajjati, tattha vitakkavicārabhāve, appahīnā eva ca
atk-s0305a:579_12: dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti. Na tveva dutiyajjhāne
atk-s0305a:579_13: pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhakāyassa
atk-s0305a:579_14: siyā uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
atk-s0305a:579_15: niruddhā. Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya
atk-s0305a:579_16: upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti, na tveva catutthajjhāne.
atk-s0305a:579_17: Tasmā “ettha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0305a:580_0: Yaṃ panettha tadatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti vuttaṃ, tattha alābhī samāno uppādanatthāya
atk-s0305a:580_1: cittaṃ upasaṃharati, lābhī samāno samāpajjanatthāyāti evamattho veditabbo. Imesu
atk-s0305a:584_0: 511. Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame pacchātapeti pāsādacchāyāya puratthimadisaṃ paṭicchannattā
atk-s0305a:584_1: pāsādassa pacchimadisābhāge ātapo hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhāne paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinnoti
atk-s0305a:584_2: attho. Piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamānoti yasmā sammāsambuddhassapi upādinnakasarīre uṇhakāle
atk-s0305a:584_3: uṇhaṃ hoti, sītakāle sītaṃ, ayañca himapātasītasamayo. Tasmā mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā
atk-s0305a:585_0: Kiṃ pana buddharasmiyo madditvā sūriyarasmi anto pavisituṃ sakkotīti? Na sakkoti.
atk-s0305a:585_1: Evaṃ sante kiṃ tāpetīti? Rasmitejaṃ. Yatheva hi ṭhitamajjhanhike parimaṇḍalāya chāyāya
atk-s0305a:585_2: rukkhamūle nisinnassa kiñcāpi sūriyarasmiyo sarīraṃ na phusanti, sabbadisāsu pana
atk-s0305a:585_3: tejo pharati, aggijālāhi parikkhitto viya hoti, evaṃ sūriyarasmīsu buddharasmiyo
atk-s0305a:585_4: madditvā anto pavisituṃ asakkuṇantīsupi satthā tejaṃ tāpento nisinnoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:586_0: Anomajjantoti piṭṭhiparikammakaraṇavasena anumajjanto. Acchariyaṃ bhanteti thero
atk-s0305a:586_1: bhagavato piṭṭhito mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā nisinnassa dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare suvaṇṇāvaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0305a:586_2: viya kesaggappamāṇaṃ valiyāvaṭṭaṃ disvā – “evarūpepi nāma sarīre jarā paññāyatī”ti
atk-s0305a:586_3: sañjātasaṃvego jaraṃ garahanto evamāha. Garahanacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ.
atk-s0305a:587_0: Na cevaṃ dāni, bhante, bhagavato tāva parisuddhoti yathā pakatiyā chavivaṇṇo parisuddho,
atk-s0305a:587_1: na evametarahīti dīpento evamāha. Tathāgatassa hi daharakāle saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ
atk-s0305a:587_2: usabhacammaṃ viya vihatavaliko kāyo hoti, tasmiṃ ṭhapito hattho bhassateva, na santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0305a:587_3: telapuñchanākārappatto viya hoti. Mahallakakāle pana sirājālā milāyanti, sandhipabbāni
atk-s0305a:587_4: sithilāni honti, maṃsaṃ aṭṭhito muccitvā sithilabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tattha tattha olambati.
atk-s0305a:587_5: Buddhānaṃ pana evarūpaṃ na hoti. Aññesaṃ apākaṭaṃ, santikāvacarattā ānandattherasseva
atk-s0305a:588_0: Sithilāni ca gattānīti aññesaṃ mukhe aṃsakūṭantarehi tesu tesu ṭhānesu valiyo santiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0305a:588_1: satthu panetaṃ natthi, thero ca dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare valiyāvaṭṭakaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0305a:588_2: Sabbāni valiyajātānīti idampi attano pākaṭavasena evamāha – satthu pana aññesaṃ viya
atk-s0305a:588_3: valiyo nāma natthi. Purato pabbhāro ca kāyoti satthā brahmujugatto, devanagare samussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:588_4: viyassa kāyo ujukameva uggato. Mahallakakāle pana kāyo purato vaṅko hoti, svāyaṃ
atk-s0305a:588_5: aññesaṃ apākaṭo, santikāvacarattā pana therasseva pākaṭo, tasmā evamāha. Dissati
atk-s0305a:588_6: ca indriyānaṃ aññathattanti indriyāni nāma na cakkhuviññeyyāni. Yato pana pakatiyā
atk-s0305a:588_7: parisuddho chavivaṇṇo, idāni na tathā parisuddho, aṃsakūṭantare vali paññāyati, brahmujukāyo
atk-s0305a:588_8: purato vaṅko, imināva kāraṇena cakkhādīnañca indriyānaṃ aññathattena bhavitabbanti
atk-s0305a:588_9: nayaggāhato evamāha. Dhī taṃ jammi jare atthūti lāmake jare dhī taṃ tuyhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0305a:590_0: 512. Dutiye gocaravisayanti gocarabhūtaṃ visayaṃ. Aññamaññassāti cakkhu sotassa,
atk-s0305a:590_1: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti. Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ
atk-s0305a:590_2: rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya – “iṅgha tvaṃ tāva naṃ vavatthapehi
atk-s0305a:590_3: vibhāvehi ‘kinnāmetaṃ ārammaṇa”’nti. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya
atk-s0305a:590_4: evaṃ vadeyya – “are, andhabāla, vassasatampi vassasahassampi vassasatasahassampi
atk-s0305a:590_5: paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi, taṃ āhara, cakkhupasāde
atk-s0305a:590_6: upanehi, ahametaṃ ārammaṇaṃ jānissāmi – yadi vā nīlaṃ, yadi vā pītakaṃ. Na hi eso
atk-s0305a:590_7: aññassa visayo, mayhameveso visayo”ti. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. Evametāni aññamaññassa
atk-s0305a:591_0: Kiṃ paṭisaraṇanti etesaṃ kiṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, kiṃ etāni paṭisarantīti pucchati. Mano
atk-s0305a:591_1: paṭisaraṇanti javanamano paṭisaraṇaṃ. Manova nesanti manodvārikajavanamanova etesaṃ
atk-s0305a:591_2: gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti. Cakkhuviññāṇañhi rūpadassanamattameva, ettha
atk-s0305a:591_3: rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi. Ekasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā
atk-s0305a:591_4: dussati vā muyhati vā. Sotaviññāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:592_0: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:592_1: pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu. Tesaṃ tattha macchabhāgo maṃsabhāgo, addukahāpaṇo
atk-s0305a:592_2: vā yottakahāpaṇo vā māsakahāpaṇo vā aṭṭhakahāpaṇo vā soḷasakahāpaṇo vā catusaṭṭhikahāpaṇo
atk-s0305a:592_3: vā daṇḍoti ettakamattameva pāpuṇāti, satavatthukaṃ pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ
atk-s0305a:593_0: Tattha pañcakulikagāmā viya pañcapasādā daṭṭhabbā, pañca dubbalabhojakā viya pañcaviññāṇāni;
atk-s0305a:593_1: rājā viya javanaṃ, dubbalabhojakānaṃ parittakaāyapāpuṇanaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:593_2: rūpadassanādimattaṃ, rajjanādi pana etesu natthi. Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu
atk-s0305a:593_3: dvāresu javanassa rajjanādīni veditabbāni. Evamettha manoti kusalākusalajavanaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:594_0: Sati paṭisaraṇanti maggasati paṭisaraṇaṃ. Javanamano hi maggasatiṃ paṭisarati. Vimuttīti
atk-s0305a:594_1: phalavimutti. Paṭisaraṇanti phalavimuttiyā nibbānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tañhi sā paṭisarati.
atk-s0305a:594_2: Nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhassa paricchedaṃ pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0305a:594_3: appaṭisaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ “sappaṭisaraṇa”nti pucchi. Nibbānaṃ nāmetaṃ appaṭisaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:594_4: na kiñci paṭisarati. Nibbānogadhanti nibbānabbhantaraṃ nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ. Brahmacariyanti
atk-s0305a:594_5: maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Nibbānaparāyaṇanti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati, na tato
atk-s0305a:594_6: paraṃ gacchatīti attho. Nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṃ avasānaṃ assāti nibbānapariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0305a:595_0: Mūlajātā patiṭṭhitāti maggena āgatasaddhā vuccati. Imamhi ce, bhikkhave, samayeti
atk-s0305a:595_1: kiṃ sandhāyāha? Jhānaanāgāmitaṃ. Tasmiñhi samaye brāhmaṇassa paṭhamamaggena pañca
atk-s0305a:595_2: akusalacittāni pahīnāni, paṭhamajjhānena pañca nīvaraṇānīti jhānaanāgāmiṭṭhāne ṭhito.
atk-s0305a:595_3: So aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā tattheva parinibbāyeyya. Sace panassa puttadāraṃ anusāsantassa
atk-s0305a:595_4: kammante vicārentassa jhānaṃ nassati, naṭṭhe jhāne gati anibaddhā hoti, anaṭṭhe pana
atk-s0305a:597_0: 513. Tatiye añjanavaneti añjanavaṇṇapupphānaṃ rukkhānaṃ ropitavane. Yaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0305a:597_1: saddhindriyaṃ, taṃ saddhābalanti tañhi adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0305a:597_3: indaṭṭhena indriyabhāvo, kosajjamuṭṭhasaccavikkhepāvijjāsu akampanena balabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:597_4: Evameva khoti tassā nadiyā ekasotaṃ viya saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāvasena etesaṃ
atk-s0305a:597_5: ninnānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, dve sotāni viya indaṭṭhaakampanaṭṭhehi indriyabalavasena
atk-s0305a:599: 514. Catutthe amatogadhanti amatabbhantaraṃ. Amataparāyaṇanti amatanibbattikaṃ. Amatapariyosānanti amataniṭṭhaṃ. Sādhu sādhūti therassa byākaraṇaṃ pasaṃsanto sādhukāraṃ deti.
atk-s0305a:601: 515. Pañcame tadanvayāti taṃ anugacchamānā, anuvattamānāti attho. Pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ ādiṃ katvā paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu phalindriyāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0305a:603_0: 520. Dasame ime kho te dhammāti upari saha vipassanāya tayo maggā. Ye me pubbe sutāva
atk-s0305a:603_1: ahesunti ye dhammā mayā pubbe “arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāma atthī”ti kathentānaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:603_2: sutā ahesuṃ. Kāyena ca phusitvāti nāmakāyena ca phusitvā paṭilabhitvā. Paññāya ca
atk-s0305a:603_3: ativijjha passāmīti paccavekkhaṇapaññāya ca ativijjhitvā passāmi. Yā hissa, bhante,
atk-s0305a:603_4: saddhāti ayaṃ katarasaddhā? Catūhi indriyehi sampayuttā saddhā heṭṭhā kathitāva,
atk-s0305a:603_5: ayaṃ pana paccavekkhaṇasaddhā. Sampayuttasaddhā hi missakā, paccavekkhaṇasaddhā lokiyāva.
atk-s0305a:607: 521. Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame sūrenāti sūrabhāvena. Bodhāyāti bujjhanatthāya.
atk-s0305a:609: 522. Dutiye mallesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Imasmiṃ sutte cattāri indriyāni missakāni, ariyañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ. Tampi pana catukkindriyanissitaṃ katvā missakanti bhājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:611_0: 523. Tatiye na heva kho kāyena phusitvā viharatīti na nāmakāyena phusitvā paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0305a:611_1: viharati, phusituṃ paṭilabhituṃ na sakkoti. Paññāya ca ativijjha passatīti paccavekkhaṇapaññāya
atk-s0305a:611_2: pana “upari arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāma atthī”ti pajānāti. Asekhabhūmiyaṃ phusitvā
atk-s0305a:611_4: nāma atthī”ti pajānāti. Na kuhiñci kismiñcīti dvepi aññamaññavevacanāneva, kismiñci
atk-s0305a:611_5: bhave na uppajjissantīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte pañcindriyāni lokuttarāni, cha lokikāni
atk-s0305a:613: 524-525. Catutthe yāni kānici padāni bodhāya saṃvattantīti yāni kānici dhammapadāni, ye keci dhammakoṭṭhāsā, bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti. Pañcamaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0305a:615_0: 526-527. Chaṭṭhe cittaṃ rakkhati āsavesu ca sāsavesu ca dhammesūti tebhūmakadhamme
atk-s0305a:615_1: ārabbha āsavuppattiṃ vārento āsavesu ca sāsavesu ca dhammesu cittaṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a:617_0: 528. Aṭṭhame sūkarakhatāyanti sūkarakhataleṇe. Kassapabuddhakāle kira taṃ leṇaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:617_1: buddhantare pathaviyā vaḍḍhamānāya antobhūmigataṃ jātaṃ. Athekadivasaṃ eko sūkaro
atk-s0305a:617_2: tassa chadanapariyantasamīpe paṃsuṃ khaṇi. Deve vuṭṭhe paṃsu dhotā, chadanapariyanto
atk-s0305a:617_3: pākaṭo ahosi. Eko vanacarako disvā “pubbe sīlavantehi paribhuttaṭṭhānena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:617_4: paṭijaggissāmi na”nti samantato paṃsuṃ apanetvā leṇaṃ sodhetvā kuṭiparikkhepaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:617_6: santharitaṃ pariveṇaṃ katvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā bhagavato vasanatthāya adāsi,
atk-s0305a:617_7: leṇaṃ gambhīraṃ ahosi otaritvā āruhitabbaṃ. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Paramanipaccakāranti
atk-s0305a:617_8: bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, paramanipaccakārī hutvā pavattamāno pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Anuttaraṃ
atk-s0305a:617_9: yogakkhemanti arahattaṃ. Sappatissoti sajeṭṭhako. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:620: 531-650. Sattamavagge satta phalāni pubbabhāgāni, tesaṃ heṭṭhā dve phalāni ādiṃ katvā missakāni. Sesamettha ito parañca sabbaṃ uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:622: 705-812. Balasaṃyutte balāni missakāneva kathitāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:625_0: 813. Iddhipādasaṃyuttassa paṭhame chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi chandasamādhi.
atk-s0305a:625_1: Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā. Samannāgatanti tehi dhammehi upetaṃ. Iddhiyā
atk-s0305a:625_2: pādaṃ, iddhibhūtaṃ vā pādanti iddhipādaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0305a:625_3: vitthāro pana iddhipādavibhaṅge āgatova. Visuddhimagge panassa attho dīpito. Tathā
atk-s0305a:627: 817. Pañcame iddhipadesanti tayo ca magge tīṇi ca phalāni.
atk-s0305a:629: 818. Chaṭṭhe samattaṃ iddhinti arahattaphalameva. Ādito paṭṭhāya pana navasupi suttesu vivaṭṭapādakā eva iddhipādā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:631_0: 822. Dasame nisīdananti cammakhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. Udenaṃ cetiyanti udenayakkhassa
atk-s0305a:631_1: cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati. Gotamakādīsupi eseva nayo. Bhāvitāti vaḍḍhitā. Bahulīkatāti
atk-s0305a:631_2: punappunaṃ katā. Yānīkatāti yuttayānaṃ viya katā. Vatthukatāti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu
atk-s0305a:631_3: viya katā. Anuṭṭhitāti adhiṭṭhitā. Paricitāti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. Susamāraddhāti suṭṭhu samāraddhā.
atk-s0305a:632_0: Iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento tathāgatassa khotiādimāha. Ettha ca
atk-s0305a:632_1: kappanti āyukappaṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:632_2: karonto tiṭṭheyya. Kappāvasesaṃ vāti “appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vuttavassasatato atirekaṃ
atk-s0305a:632_3: vā. Mahāsīvatthero panāha “buddhānaṃ aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ nāma natthi. Yatheva hi veḷuvagāmake
atk-s0305a:632_4: uppannaṃ māraṇantikavedanaṃ dasa māse vikkhambhesi, evaṃ punappunaṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ
atk-s0305a:632_5: samāpajjitvā dasa dasa māsepi vikkhambhento imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0305a:633_0: Kasmā pana na ṭhitoti? Upādiṇṇakasarīraṃ nāma khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyati, buddhā
atk-s0305a:633_1: nāma khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ apatvāva pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva
atk-s0305a:633_2: parinibbāyanti. Buddhānubuddhesu ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu ekakena khāṇukena
atk-s0305a:633_3: viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti, daharasāmaṇeraparivāritena vā, tato – “aho buddhānaṃ parisā”ti
atk-s0305a:633_4: hīḷetabbataṃ āpajjeyya, tasmā na ṭhitoti. Evaṃ vuttepi so pana na ruccati, “āyukappo”ti
atk-s0305a:634_0: Yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ. Yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto
atk-s0305a:634_1: ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, evameva nāsakkhi
atk-s0305a:634_2: paṭivijjhitunti attho. Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa
atk-s0305a:634_3: cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. Therassa ca cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tenassa māro cittaṃ
atk-s0305a:634_4: pariyuṭṭhāsi. So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti? Bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:634_5: vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti, tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0305a:634_6: vivaṭamukhā honti, tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati, te visaññī hutvā
atk-s0305a:634_7: tiṭṭhanti. Therassa panesa mukhe hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati? Bheravārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:634_8: pana dasseti, taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi. Jānantoyeva bhagavā kimatthaṃ
atk-s0305a:634_9: yāvatatiyakaṃ āmantesīti. Parato “tiṭṭhatu, bhante, bhagavā”ti yācite “tuyhevetaṃ
atk-s0305a:635_0: Māro pāpimāti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti māro. Pāpimāti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:635_1: So hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā “pāpimā”ti vuccati. Kaṇho, antako, namuci, pamattabandhūtipi
atk-s0305a:635_2: tasseva nāmāni. Bhāsitā kho panesāti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā aṭṭhame sattāhe
atk-s0305a:635_3: bodhimaṇḍaṃyeva āgantvā – “bhagavā yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā, so vo attho
atk-s0305a:635_4: anuppatto, paṭividdhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo lokavicaraṇenā”ti vatvā yathā ajja,
atk-s0305a:635_5: evameva – “parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu, sugato,”ti yāci. Bhagavā
atk-s0305a:635_6: cassa “na tāvāha”ntiādīni vatvā paṭikkhipi. Taṃ sandhāya “bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante,”tiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:636_0: Tattha viyattāti maggavasena byattā. Tatheva vinītā. Tathā visāradā. Bahussutāti
atk-s0305a:636_1: tepiṭakavasena bahu sutametesanti bahussutā. Tadeva dhammaṃ dhārentīti dhammadharā.
atk-s0305a:636_2: Atha vā pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca, pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva
atk-s0305a:636_3: dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhammānudhammappaṭipannāti ariyadhammassa
atk-s0305a:636_5: paṭipannā. Anudhammacārinoti anudhammacaraṇasīlā. Sakaṃ ācariyakanti attano ācariyavādaṃ.
atk-s0305a:636_6: Ācikkhissantītiādīni sabbāni aññamaññasseva vevacanāni. Sahadhammenāti sahetukena
atk-s0305a:636_7: sakāraṇena vacanena. Sappāṭihāriyanti yāva niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0305a:637_0: Brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. Iddhanti samiddhaṃ
atk-s0305a:637_1: jhānassādavasena. Phītanti vuḍḍhipattaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena.
atk-s0305a:637_2: Vitthārikanti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena. Bāhujaññanti bahūhi
atk-s0305a:637_3: ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ mahājanābhisamayavasena. Puthubhūtanti sabbākārena puthulabhāvapattaṃ.
atk-s0305a:637_4: Kathaṃ? Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitaṃ, yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā ca
atk-s0305a:638_0: Appossukkoti nirālayo. Tvañhi pāpima aṭṭhamasattāhato paṭṭhāya “parinibbātu dāni,
atk-s0305a:638_1: bhante, bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato”ti viravanto āhiṇḍittha, ajja dāni paṭṭhāya vigatussāho
atk-s0305a:638_2: hohi, mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0305a:639_0: Sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā
atk-s0305a:639_1: āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissaji pajahi. Tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0305a:639_2: ossaji, temāsamattameva pana phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti
atk-s0305a:639_3: cittaṃ uppādesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ossajī”ti. Ussajītipi pāṭho. Mahābhūmicāloti
atk-s0305a:639_4: mahanto pathavikampo. Tadā kira dasasahassilokadhātu akampittha. Bhiṃsanakoti bhayajanako.
atk-s0305a:639_5: Devadundubhiyo ca phaliṃsūti devabheriyo phaliṃsu, devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajji, akālavijjulatā
atk-s0305a:640_0: Udānaṃ udānesīti kasmā udānesi? Koci nāma vadeyya “bhagavā pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā
atk-s0305a:640_1: – ‘parinibbāyatha, bhante, parinibbāyatha, bhante’ti upadduto bhayena āyusaṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0305a:640_2: vissajjesī”ti. Tassokāso mā hotūti. Bhītassa hi udānaṃ nāma natthīti pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0305a:641_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti tulaṃ.
atk-s0305a:641_1: Kiṃ taṃ? Kāmāvacarakammaṃ. Na tulaṃ, na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyakammaṃ atthīti
atk-s0305a:641_2: atulaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Mahaggatakammaṃ. Atha vā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacarañca tulaṃ, arūpāvacaraṃ
atk-s0305a:641_3: atulaṃ. Appavipākaṃ tulaṃ, bahuvipākaṃ atulaṃ. Sambhavanti sambhavahetubhūtaṃ, piṇḍakārakaṃ
atk-s0305a:641_4: rāsikārakanti attho. Bhavasaṅkhāranti punabbhavassa saṅkhāraṃ. Avassajīti vissajjesi.
atk-s0305a:641_5: Munīti buddhamuni. Ajjhattaratoti niyakajjhattarato. Samāhitoti upacārappanāsamādhivasena
atk-s0305a:641_6: samāhito. Abhindi kavacamivāti kavacaṃ viya abhindi. Attasambhavanti attani jātakilesaṃ.
atk-s0305a:641_7: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ bhavābhisaṅkhaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0305a:641_8: ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji, saṅgāmasīse mahāyodho kavacaṃ
atk-s0305a:641_9: viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato samāhito hutvā abhindīti.
atk-s0305a:642_0: Atha vā tulanti tulento tīrento. Atulañca sambhavanti nibbānañceva bhavañca. Bhavasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0305a:642_1: bhavagāmikammaṃ. Avassaji munīti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho
atk-s0305a:642_2: nibbānaṃ nicca”ntiādinā nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ nibbāne cānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0305a:642_3: disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ “kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0305a:642_4: vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. Kathaṃ? Ajjhattarato samāhito abhindi
atk-s0305a:642_5: kavacamivattasambhavaṃ. So hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato, samathavasena samāhitoti
atk-s0305a:642_6: evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya samathavipassanābalena kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā
atk-s0305a:642_7: ṭhitaṃ, attani sambhavattā attasambhavanti laddhanāmaṃ sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ abhindi.
atk-s0305a:642_8: Kilesābhāvena ca kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena
atk-s0305a:642_9: kammaṃ jahi. Pahīnakilesassa bhayaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā abhītova āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji.
atk-s0305a:646: 823-824. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame na ca atilīnotiādīni parato āvi bhavissanti. Imasmiṃ sutte chaabhiññāpādakā iddhipādā kathitā, tathā dutiye ca.
atk-s0305a:648_0: 825. Tatiye chandanti kattukamyatāchandaṃ. Nissāyāti nissayaṃ katvā, adhipatiṃ katvāti
atk-s0305a:648_2: adhivacanaṃ. Iti ayañca chandotiādīsu chando chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi
atk-s0305a:648_3: ca, chandasamādhi chandena ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca, padhānasaṅkhārāpi chandena
atk-s0305a:648_4: ceva chandasamādhinā ca samannāgatā. Tasmā sabbe te dhamme ekato katvā ayaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0305a:648_6: pana “yo tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho tiādinā nayena imehi dhammehi samannāgatā sesaarūpino
atk-s0305a:649_0: Apica imepi tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi. Kathaṃ? Chandañhi bhāvayato chando
atk-s0305a:649_1: iddhi nāma hoti, samādhippadhānasaṅkhārā chandiddhipādo nāma. Samādhiṃ bhāventassa
atk-s0305a:649_2: samādhi iddhi nāma hoti, chandappadhānasaṅkhārā samādhiddhiyā pādo nāma. Padhānasaṅkhāre
atk-s0305a:649_3: bhāventassa padhānasaṅkhārā iddhi nāma hoti, chandasamādhi padhānasaṅkhāriddhiyā
atk-s0305a:649_4: pādo nāma, sampayuttadhammesu hi ekasmiṃ ijjhamāne sesāpi ijjhantiyeva.
atk-s0305a:650_0: Apica tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbabhāgavasenāpi etesaṃ iddhipādatā veditabbā. Paṭhamajjhānañhi
atk-s0305a:650_1: iddhi nāma, paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgaparikammasampayuttā chandādayo iddhipādo nāma.
atk-s0305a:650_2: Etenupāyena yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā, iddhividhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva dibbacakkhuabhiññā,
atk-s0305a:650_3: sotāpattimaggaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggā nayo netabbo. Sesiddhipādesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:651: Keci pana “anibbatto chando iddhipādo”ti vadanti. Idha tesaṃ vādamaddanatthāya abhidhamme uttaracūḷavāro nāma āgato –
atk-s0305a:652_1: Tattha katamo chandiddhipādo? Idha, bhikkhu, yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti
atk-s0305a:652_2: niyyānikaṃ apacayagāmiṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva
atk-s0305a:652_3: kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati dukkhāpaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ, yo
atk-s0305a:652_4: tasmiṃ samaye chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando, ayaṃ vuccati chandiddhipādo.
atk-s0305a:654_0: Tattha raṭṭhapālatthero chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Soṇatthero
atk-s0305a:654_1: vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā; sambhutatthero cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā, āyasmā mogharājā vīmaṃsaṃ
atk-s0305a:654_2: dhuraṃ katvāti. Tattha yathā catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā rājānaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0305a:654_3: viharantesu eko upaṭṭhāne chandajāto rañño ajjhāsayañca ruciñca ñatvā divā ca ratto
atk-s0305a:654_4: ca upaṭṭhahanto rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇi. Evaṃ chandadhurena lokuttaradhammanibbattako veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:655_0: Eko pana – “divase divase upaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkomi, uppanne kicce parakkamena ārādhessāmī”ti
atk-s0305a:655_1: kupite paccante raññā pahito parakkamena sattumaddanaṃ katvā pāpuṇi. Yathā so, evaṃ
atk-s0305a:655_2: vīriyadhurena lokuttaradhammanibbattako veditabbo. Eko “divase divase upaṭṭhānampi
atk-s0305a:655_3: urena sattisarasampaṭicchanampi bhāroyeva, mantabalena ārādhessāmī”ti khattavijjāya
atk-s0305a:655_4: kataparicayattā mantasaṃvidhānena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā pāpuṇi. Yathā so, evaṃ cittadhurena
atk-s0305a:656_0: Aparo – “kiṃ imehi upaṭṭhānādīhi, rājāno nāma jātisampannassa ṭhānantaraṃ denti,
atk-s0305a:656_1: tādisassa dento mayhaṃ dassatī”ti jātisampattimeva nissāya ṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇi. Yathā
atk-s0305a:656_2: so, evaṃ suparisuddhaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ nissāya vīmaṃsadhurena lokuttaradhammanibbattako
atk-s0305a:658_0: 826. Catutthe uddhatāti uddhaccapakatikā vipphandamānacittā. Uddhaccena hi ekārammaṇe
atk-s0305a:658_1: cittaṃ vipphandati dhajayaṭṭhiyaṃ vātena pahatadhajo viya. Unnaḷāti uggatanaḷā, uṭṭhitatucchamānāti
atk-s0305a:658_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Capalāti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādicāpallena yuttā. Mukharāti mukhakharā,
atk-s0305a:658_3: kharavacanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vikiṇṇavācāti asaṃyatavacanā divasampi niratthakavacanappalāpino.
atk-s0305a:658_4: Muṭṭhassatīti naṭṭhassatino. Asampajānāti paññārahitā. Asamāhitāti upacārappanāsamādhivirahitā.
atk-s0305a:658_5: Bhantacittāti ubbhantacittā samādhivirahena laddhokāsena uddhaccena. Pākatindriyāti
atk-s0305a:658_6: asaṃvutindriyā. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya pāsādapatiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0305a:658_7: pathavibhāgaṃ “udaka”nti adhiṭṭhāya, udakapiṭṭhe ṭhitapāsādaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0305a:658_8: aṅguṭṭhakena pahari. Gambhīranemoti gambhīraāvāṭo, gambhīrabhūmibhāgaṃ anupaviṭṭhoti
atk-s0305a:658_9: attho. Sunikhātoti suṭṭhu nikhāto, koṭṭetvā suṭṭhu ṭhapito. Idha abhiññāpādakiddhi kathitā.
atk-s0305a:660: 827. Pañcame chandappahānatthanti taṇhāchandassa pahānatthaṃ. Idhāpi vivaṭṭapādakiddhi kathitā.
atk-s0305a:662: 831. Navame yo so bhikkhave maggoti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0305a:664_0: 832. Dasame kosajjasahagatoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto
atk-s0305a:664_1: nisīdati. Athassa citte līnākāro okkamati, so “līnākāro me okkanto”ti ñatvā apāyabhayena
atk-s0305a:664_2: cittaṃ tajjetvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Athassa puna līnākāro
atk-s0305a:664_3: okkamati. So puna apāyabhayena cittaṃ tajjetvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi
atk-s0305a:664_4: karotīti evamassa kosajjena vokiṇṇattā chando kosajjasahagato nāma hoti. Kosajjasampayuttoti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:665_0: Uddhaccasahagatoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a:665_1: Athassa cittaṃ uddhacce patati. So buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā
atk-s0305a:665_2: tosetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Athassa
atk-s0305a:665_3: puna cittaṃ uddhacce patati. So puna buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā
atk-s0305a:665_4: tosetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa
atk-s0305a:665_5: uddhaccena vokiṇṇattā chando uddhaccasahagato nāma hoti.
atk-s0305a:666_0: Thinamiddhasahagatoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a:666_1: Athassa thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. So “uppannaṃ me thinamiddha”nti ñatvā udakena mukhaṃ
atk-s0305a:666_2: puñchitvā, kaṇṇe ākaḍḍhitvā paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ sajjhāyitvā divā gahitaṃ vā ālokasaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:666_3: manasikaritvā thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0305a:666_4: Athassa puna thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati. So vuttanayeneva puna thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0305a:666_5: chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa thinamiddhena vokiṇṇattā
atk-s0305a:667_0: Anuvikkhittoti idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto nisīdati.
atk-s0305a:667_1: Athassa kāmaguṇārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati. So “bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ me citta”nti ñatvā
atk-s0305a:667_2: anamatagga devadūta- celopama anāgatabhayasuttādīni āvajjento suttadaṇḍena cittaṃ
atk-s0305a:667_3: tajjetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā puna chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti. Athassa
atk-s0305a:667_4: puna cittaṃ vikkhipati. So puna suttadaṇḍena cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā chandaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0305a:667_5: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karotīti evamassa kāmavitakkavokiṇṇattā chando bahiddhā pañca
atk-s0305a:668_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti kammaṭṭhānavasenapi desanāvasenapi purimapacchimatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:668_1: Kathaṃ? Kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma, arahattaṃ pacchā nāma.
atk-s0305a:668_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā atilīnādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu cittassa
atk-s0305a:668_3: okkamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā, duṭṭhagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassaghaṭikaṃ otārento
atk-s0305a:668_4: viya catunnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ ekaṭṭhānepi asajjanto saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a:668_5: Ayampi yathā pure tathā pacchā viharati nāma. Ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānavasena purimapacchimatā.
atk-s0305a:668_6: Desanāvasena pana kesā pure nāma, matthaluṅgaṃ pacchā nāma. Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu
atk-s0305a:668_7: abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto catūsu ṭhānesu asajjanto
atk-s0305a:668_8: yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti, ayampi yathā pure tathā pacchā viharati nāma. Evaṃ
atk-s0305a:668_9: desanāvasena purimapacchimatā veditabbā. Yathā pacchā tathā pureti idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:669_0: Yathā adho tathā uddhanti idaṃ sarīravasena veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha “uddhaṃ pādatalā
atk-s0305a:669_1: adho kesamatthakā”ti. Tattha yo bhikkhu pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesamatthakā dvattiṃsākāravasena
atk-s0305a:669_2: vā pādaṅguliaggapabbaṭṭhito yāva sīsakaṭāhaṃ, sīsakaṭāhato yāva pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbaṭṭhīni,
atk-s0305a:669_3: tāva aṭṭhivasena vā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti catūsu ṭhānesu ekaṭṭhānepi asajjanto. Ayaṃ yathā
atk-s0305a:669_4: uddhaṃ tathā adho, yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a:670_0: Yehi ākārehīti yehi koṭṭhāsehi. Yehi liṅgehīti yehi saṇṭhānehi. Yehi nimittehīti
atk-s0305a:670_1: yehi upaṭṭhānehi. Ālokasaññā suggahitā hotīti yo bhikkhu aṅgaṇe nisīditvā ālokasaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:670_2: manasi karoti, kālena nimīleti, kālena ummīleti. Athassa yadā nimīlentassāpi ummīletvā
atk-s0305a:670_3: olokentassa viya ekasadisameva upaṭṭhāti, tadā ālokasaññā jātā nāma hoti. “Divāsaññā”tipi
atk-s0305a:670_4: tasseva nāmaṃ. Sā ca pana rattiṃ uppajjamānā suggahitā nāma hoti. Svādhiṭṭhitātipi
atk-s0305a:670_5: tasseva vevacanaṃ. Suṭṭhu adhiṭṭhitā suṭṭhu ṭhapitā svādhiṭṭhitā nāma vuccati. Sā
atk-s0305a:670_6: atthato suggahitāyeva. Yo vā ālokena thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā chandaṃ uppādetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:670_7: manasi karoti, tassa divāpi ālokasaññā suggahitā svādhiṭṭhitā nāma. Ratti vā hotu
atk-s0305a:670_8: divā vā yena ālokena thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti, tasmiṃ thinamiddhavinodane
atk-s0305a:670_9: āloke uppannā saññā suggahitāyeva nāma. Vīriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ sutte channaṃ
atk-s0305a:674_0: 834. Tatiyavaggassa dutiye iminā cātumahābhūtikenāti iminā catumahābhūtamayena evaṃ
atk-s0305a:674_1: bhārikena garukena samānenāpi. Omātīti pahoti sakkoti, idaṃ tepiṭake buddhavacane
atk-s0305a:674_2: asambhinnapadaṃ. Kāyampi citte samodahatīti kāyaṃ gahetvā citte āropeti, cittasannissitaṃ
atk-s0305a:674_3: karoti, cittagatiyā peseti. Cittaṃ nāma mahaggatacittaṃ, cittagatigamanaṃ lahukaṃ
atk-s0305a:674_4: hoti. Cittampi kāye samodahatīti cittaṃ gahetvā kāye āropeti, kāyasannissitaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:674_5: kāyagatiyā peseti, kāyo nāma karajakāyo, kāyagatigamanaṃ dandhaṃ hoti. Sukhasaññañca
atk-s0305a:674_6: lahusaññañcāti abhiññācittasahajātasaññā. Sā hi santasukhasamannāgatattā sukhasaññā
atk-s0305a:674_7: nāma hoti, kilesadandhāyitattassa ca abhāvā lahusaññā nāma.
atk-s0305a:675_0: Ayoguḷo divasaṃ santatto lahutaro ceva hotīti so hi dvīhi tīhi janehi ukkhipitvā
atk-s0305a:675_1: kammāruddhane pakkhittopi divasaṃ paccamāno vivarānupaviṭṭhena tejena ceva vāyena
atk-s0305a:675_2: ca vāyosahagato ca usmāsahagato ca tejosahagato ca hutvā evaṃ lahuko hoti, yathā
atk-s0305a:675_3: naṃ kammāro mahāsaṇḍāsena gahetvā ekato parivatteti ukkhipati bahi nīharati. Evaṃ
atk-s0305a:675_4: pana mudu ca hoti kammaniyo ca. Yathā naṃ so khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ vicchindati, kūṭena
atk-s0305a:675_5: hananto dīghacaturassādibhedaṃ karoti. Imasmiṃ sutte vikubbaniddhi kathitā.
atk-s0305a:677_0: 835-842. Tatiye vivaṭṭapādakiddhi kathitā, tathā catutthe. Apica dve phalāni ādiṃ
atk-s0305a:677_1: katvā heṭṭhā missakiddhipādā kathitā, sattasu phalesu pubbabhāgā. Sattamādīni cattāri
atk-s0305a:679: 843-844. Ekādasamadvādasamesu cha abhiññā kathitā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:682_0: 899-900. Anuruddhasaṃyuttassa paṭhame āraddhāti paripuṇṇā. Saṅkhepato panettha chattiṃsāya
atk-s0305a:682_1: ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā, dutiye dvādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pāpetvā vipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0305a:684: 901. Tatiye mahābhiññatanti chaabhiññābhāvaṃ. Hīnaṃ dhammantiādīsu imāya pāḷiyā attho veditabbo –
atk-s0305a:685_0: “Katame dhammā hīnā? Dvādasa akusalacittuppādā, ime dhammā hīnā. Katame dhammā majjhimā?
atk-s0305a:685_1: Tīsu bhūmīsu kusalaṃ, tīsu bhūmīsu vipāko, tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ sabbañca rūpaṃ,
atk-s0305a:685_2: ime dhammā majjhimā. Katame dhammā paṇītā? Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā, cattāri ca
atk-s0305a:687_0: 902-905. Catutthe kaṇḍakīvaneti mahākaramandavane. Chaṭṭhe sahassaṃ lokanti iminā
atk-s0305a:687_1: therassa satata vihāro dassito. Thero hi pātova mukhaṃ dhovitvā atītānāgate kappasahassaṃ
atk-s0305a:687_2: anussarati. Paccuppanne pana dasacakkavāḷasahassaṃ ekāvajjanassa āpāthamāgacchati.
atk-s0305a:689: 906. Aṭṭhame salaḷāgāreti salaḷarukkhamayāya paṇṇasālāya, salaḷarukkhassa vā dvāre ṭhitattā evaṃnāmake agāre. Imasmiṃ sutte vipassanāya saddhiṃ vipassakapuggalo kathito.
atk-s0305a:691: 907. Navame āsabhiṃ vācanti attano arahattabhāvadīpakaṃ uttamavācaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:694: 909-922. Dutiyavagge ṭhānañca ṭhānatotiādīhi thero dasabalañāṇaṃ paṭijānāti. Kimpanetaṃ sāvakānaṃ hotīti? Ekadesena hoti, sabbaññubuddhānaṃ panetaṃ nippadesaṃ sabbākāraparipūranti.
atk-s0305a:698: 977. Ānāpānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ekadhammoti eko dhammo. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaniddese vuttameva.
atk-s0305a:700_0: 982. Chaṭṭhe bhāvetha noti bhāvetha nu. Kāmacchandoti pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo. Ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0305a:700_1: bahiddhā ca dhammesūti ajjhattikabāhiresu dvādasasu āyatanadhammesu. Paṭighasaññā
atk-s0305a:700_2: suppaṭivinītāti paṭighasampayuttasaññā suṭṭhu paṭivinītā, samucchinnāti attho. Iminā
atk-s0305a:700_3: attano anāgāmimaggaṃ katheti. Idāni arahattamaggassa vipassanaṃ dassento so satova
