atk-s0305a:702: 983. Sattame iñjitattaṃ vā phanditattaṃ vāti ubhayenapi calanameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:704_0: 984. Aṭṭhame neva kāyopi kilamati na cakkhūnīti aññesu hi kammaṭṭhānesu kammaṃ karontassa
atk-s0305a:704_1: kāyopi kilamati, cakkhūnipi vihaññanti. Dhātukammaṭṭhānasmiñhi kammaṃ karontassa
atk-s0305a:704_2: kāyo kilamati, yante pakkhipitvā pīḷanākārappatto viya hoti. Kasiṇakammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ
atk-s0305a:704_3: karontassa cakkhūni phandanti kilamanti, nikkhamitvā patanākārappattāni viya honti.
atk-s0305a:704_4: Imasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karontassa neva kāyo kilamati, na akkhīni vihaññanti. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0305a:705_0: Sabbaso rūpasaññānantiādi kasmā vuttaṃ, kiṃ ānāpāne kasiṇugghāṭanaṃ labbhatīti? Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero
atk-s0305a:705_1: panāha – “yasmā ānāpānanimittaṃ tārakarūpamuttāvalikādisadisaṃ hutvā paññāyati, tasmā
atk-s0305a:705_2: tattha kasiṇugghāṭanaṃ labbhatī”ti. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero “na labbhatevā”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:705_3: Alabbhante ayaṃ ariyiddhiādiko pabhedo kasmā gahitoti? Ānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ. Ariyaṃ
atk-s0305a:705_4: vā hi iddhiṃ cattāri vā rūpāvacarajjhānāni catasso vā arūpasamāpattiyo nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0305a:705_5: vā patthayamānena bhikkhunā ayaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhi sādhukaṃ manasikātabbo. Yathā
atk-s0305a:705_6: hi nagare laddhe yaṃ catūsu disāsu uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ catūhi dvārehi nagarameva
atk-s0305a:705_7: pavisatīti, janapado laddho ca hoti. Nagarasseva heso ānisaṃso. Evaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanāya
atk-s0305a:705_8: ānisaṃso esa ariyiddhiādiko pabhedo, sabbākārena bhāvite ānāpānassatisamādhismiṃ
atk-s0305a:705_9: sabbametaṃ yogino nipphajjatīti ānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sukhañceti ettha soti
atk-s0305a:705_10: kasmā na vuttaṃ? Yasmā bhikkhūti imasmiṃ vāre nāgataṃ.
atk-s0305a:707_0: 985. Navame vesāliyanti evaṃnāmake itthiliṅgavasena pavattavohāre nagare. Tañhi nagaraṃ
atk-s0305a:707_1: tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena visālībhūtattā vesālīti vuccati. Idampi ca
atk-s0305a:707_2: nagaraṃ sabbaññutaṃ patteyeva sammāsambuddhe sabbākāravepullataṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:707_3: Evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā nivāsaṭṭhānamāha mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti. Tattha mahāvanaṃ
atk-s0305a:707_4: nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ. Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ
atk-s0305a:707_5: himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ. Idaṃ tādisaṃ
atk-s0305a:707_6: na hoti, saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vananti mahāvanaṃ. Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya
atk-s0305a:707_7: kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā sabbākārasampannā buddhassa
atk-s0305a:708_0: Anekapariyāyena asubhakathaṃ kathetīti anekehi kāraṇehi asubhākārasandassanappavattaṃ
atk-s0305a:708_1: kāyavicchandanīyakathaṃ katheti. Seyyathidaṃ – atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā
atk-s0305a:708_2: dantā…pe… muttanti. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Bhikkhave, imasmiṃ byāmamatte kaḷevare sabbākārenapi
atk-s0305a:708_3: vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā candanaṃ vā kuṅkumaṃ
atk-s0305a:708_4: vā kappuraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati, atha kho paramaduggandhaṃ
atk-s0305a:708_5: jegucchaassirikadassanaṃ kesalomādinānappakāraṃ asucimeva passati, tasmā na ettha
atk-s0305a:708_6: chando vā rāgo vā karaṇīyo. Yepi uttamaṅge sirasi jātā kesā nāma, tepi asubhā ceva
atk-s0305a:708_7: asucino ca paṭikūlā ca. So ca nesaṃ asubhāsucipaṭikūlabhāvo vaṇṇatopi saṇṭhānatopi
atk-s0305a:708_8: gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopīti pañcahākārehi veditabbo. Evaṃ lomādīnampīti ayamettha
atk-s0305a:708_9: saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Iti bhagavā ekamekasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:709_0: Asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti uddhumātakādivasena asubhamātikaṃ nikkhipitvā padabhājanīyena
atk-s0305a:709_1: taṃ vibhajanto vaṇṇento asubhāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati. Asubhabhāvanāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti
atk-s0305a:709_2: yā ayaṃ kesādīsu vā uddhumātakādīsu vā ajjhattabahiddhāvatthūsu asubhākāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0305a:709_3: pavattassa cittassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā phātikammaṃ, tassā asubhabhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0305a:709_4: dassento vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, guṇaṃ parikitteti. Seyyathidaṃ – “asubhabhāvanābhiyutto,
atk-s0305a:709_5: bhikkhave, bhikkhu kesādīsu vā vatthūsu uddhumātakādīsu vā pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0305a:709_6: tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ paṭilabhati. So taṃ paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0305a:709_7: cittamañjūsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
atk-s0305a:710_0: Icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyitunti ahaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0305a:710_1: paṭisallīyituṃ nilīyituṃ ekakova hutvā viharituṃ icchāmīti attho. Nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo
atk-s0305a:710_2: aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenāti yo attanā payuttavācaṃ akatvā mamatthāya saddhesu
atk-s0305a:710_3: kulesu paṭiyattapiṇḍapātaṃ nīharitvā mayhaṃ upanāmeti, taṃ piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0305a:710_4: bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā nāmhi aññena kenaci bhikkhunā vā gahaṭṭhena vā upasaṅkamitabboti.
atk-s0305a:711_0: Kasmā pana evamāhāti? Atīte kira pañcasatā migaluddakā mahatīhi daṇḍavāgurādīhi araññaṃ
atk-s0305a:711_1: parikkhipitvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā ekatoyeva yāvajīvaṃ migapakkhighātakammena jīvikaṃ kappetvā
atk-s0305a:711_2: niraye uppannā. Te tattha paccitvā pubbe katena kenacideva kusalakammena manussesu
atk-s0305a:711_3: uppannā kalyāṇūpanissayavasena sabbepi bhagavato santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca
atk-s0305a:711_4: labhiṃsu. Tesaṃ tato mūlākusalakammato avipakkavipākā aparāparacetanā tasmiṃ aḍḍhamāsabbhantare
atk-s0305a:711_5: attūpakkamena ca parūpakkamena ca jīvitūpacchedāya okāsamakāsi. Taṃ bhagavā addasa.
atk-s0305a:711_6: Kammavipāko ca nāma na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhituṃ. Tesu ca bhikkhūsu puthujjanāpi atthi,
atk-s0305a:711_7: sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmikhīṇāsavāpi. Tattha khīṇāsavā appaṭisandhikā, itare ariyasāvakā
atk-s0305a:712_0: Atha bhagavā cintesi – “ime attabhāve chandarāgena maraṇabhayabhītā na sakkhissanti
atk-s0305a:712_1: gatiṃ visodhetuṃ, handa nesaṃ chandarāgappahānāya asubhakathaṃ kathemi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0305a:712_2: attabhāve vigatacchandarāgatāya gativisodhanaṃ katvā sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0305a:712_3: evaṃ tesaṃ mama santike pabbajjā sātthikā bhavissatī”ti. Tato tesaṃ anuggahāya asubhakathaṃ
atk-s0305a:712_4: kathesi kammaṭṭhānasīsena, no maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇanādhippāyena. Kathetvā ca panassa
atk-s0305a:712_5: etadahosi – “sace imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ maṃ bhikkhū passissanti, ‘ajja eko bhikkhu mato,
atk-s0305a:712_6: ajja dve…pe… ajja dasā’ti āgantvā ārocessanti, ayañca kammavipāko na sakkā mayā vā
atk-s0305a:712_7: aññena vā paṭibāhituṃ, svāhaṃ taṃ sutvāpi kiṃ karissāmi, kiṃ me anatthakena anayabyasanena
atk-s0305a:712_8: sutena, handāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adassanaṃ upagacchāmī”ti. Tasmā evamāha – “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0305a:712_9: bhikkhave, aḍḍhamāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ, nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena
atk-s0305a:713_0: Apare panāhu – “parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ evaṃ vatvā paṭisallīno”ti. Pare kira bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0305a:713_2: sāvake aññamaññaṃ ghātente nivāretuṃ na sakkoti, kiṃ aññaṃ sakkhissatī”ti? Tatra
atk-s0305a:713_3: paṇḍitā vakkhanti – “bhagavā paṭisallānamanuyutto na imaṃ pavattiṃ jānāti, kocissa
atk-s0305a:713_4: ārocayitāpi natthi, sace jāneyya addhā nivāreyyā”ti. Idaṃ pana icchāmattaṃ, paṭhamamevettha
atk-s0305a:713_5: kāraṇaṃ. Nāssudhāti ettha assudhāti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇatthe vā nipāto, neva
atk-s0305a:714_0: Anekehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīhi kāraṇehi vokāro assāti anekākāravokāro. Anekākāravokiṇṇo
atk-s0305a:714_1: anekākārena sammissoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ko so? Asubhabhāvanānuyogo, taṃ anekākāravokāraṃ.
atk-s0305a:714_2: Asubhabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharantīti yuttappayuttā viharanti. Aṭṭīyamānāti tena
atk-s0305a:714_3: kāyena aṭṭā dukkhitā honti. Harāyamānāti lajjamānā. Jigucchamānāti jigucchaṃ uppādayamānā.
atk-s0305a:714_4: Satthahārakaṃ pariyesantīti jīvitaharaṇakasatthaṃ pariyesanti. Na kevalañca te satthaṃ
atk-s0305a:714_5: pariyesitvā attanā vā attānaṃ jīvitā voropenti, migalaṇḍikampi pana samaṇakuttakaṃ
atk-s0305a:714_6: upasaṅkamitvā, “sādhu no, āvuso, jīvitā voropehī”ti vadanti. Ettha ca ariyā neva
atk-s0305a:714_7: pāṇātipātaṃ kariṃsu, na samādapesuṃ, na samanuññā ahesuṃ. Puthujjanā pana sabbamakaṃsu.
atk-s0305a:715_0: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti tesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ jīvitakkhayappattabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0305a:715_1: tato ekībhāvato vuṭṭhito jānantopi ajānanto viya kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0305a:715_2: ānandaṃ āmantesi. Kiṃ nu kho, ānanda, tanubhūto viya bhikkhusaṅghoti ito, ānanda,
atk-s0305a:715_3: pubbe bahū bhikkhū ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti, uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhanti, sajjhāyanti,
atk-s0305a:715_4: ekapajjoto viya ārāmo dissati. Idāni pana aḍḍhamāsamattassa accayena tanubhūto viya
atk-s0305a:715_5: tanuko mando appako viraḷo viya jāto bhikkhusaṅgho. Kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ? Kiṃ disāsu pakkantā bhikkhūti?
atk-s0305a:716_0: Athāyasmā ānando kammavipākena tesaṃ jīvitakkhayappattiṃ asallakkhento asubhakammaṭṭhānānuyogapaccayā
atk-s0305a:716_1: pana sallakkhento tathā hi pana, bhante bhagavātiādiṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ arahattappattiyā
atk-s0305a:716_2: aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācanto, sādhu, bhante, bhagavātiādimāha. Tassattho – sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0305a:716_3: bhagavā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācikkhatu, yena bhikkhusaṅgho arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya. Mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0305a:716_4: orohaṇatitthāni viya aññānipi dasānussati, dasakasiṇa, catudhātuvavatthāna, brahmavihāra,
atk-s0305a:716_5: ānāpānassatipabhedāni bahūni nibbānorohaṇakammaṭṭhānāni santi, tesu bhagavā bhikkhū
atk-s0305a:717_0: Atha bhagavā tathā kātukāmo theraṃ uyyojento tenahānandātiādimāha. Tattha vesāliṃ
atk-s0305a:717_1: upanissāyāti vesāliyaṃ upanissāya samantā gāvutepi aḍḍhayojanepi yāvatikā viharanti,
atk-s0305a:717_2: te sabbe sannipātehīti attho. Sabbe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sannipātetvāti attanā gantuṃ
atk-s0305a:717_3: yuttaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ gantvā aññattha daharabhikkhū pahiṇitvā muhutteneva anavasese
atk-s0305a:717_4: bhikkhū upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ samūhaṃ katvā. Yassadāni, bhante, bhagavā kālaṃ maññatīti
atk-s0305a:717_5: ettha ayamadhippāyo – bhagavā bhikkhusaṅgho sannipatito, esa kālo bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0305a:717_6: kātuṃ, anusāsaniṃ dātuṃ, idāni yassa tumhe kālaṃ jānātha, taṃ kātabbanti.
atk-s0305a:718_0: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi, ayampi kho, bhikkhaveti. Āmantetvā ca pana bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0305a:718_1: arahattappattiyā pubbe ācikkhitaasubhakammaṭṭhānato aññaṃ pariyāyaṃ ācikkhanto ānāpānassatisamādhītiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:718_2: Tattha ānāpānassatisamādhīti ānāpānapariggāhikāya satiyā saddhiṃ sampayutto samādhi,
atk-s0305a:718_3: ānāpānassatiyaṃ vā samādhi, ānāpānassatisamādhi. Bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā.
atk-s0305a:718_4: Bahulīkatoti punappunaṃ kato. Santo ceva paṇīto cāti santo ceva paṇīto ceva. Ubhayattha
atk-s0305a:718_5: evasaddena niyamo veditabbo. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ayañhi yathā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-s0305a:718_6: paṭivedhavasena santañca paṇītañca, oḷārikārammaṇattā pana paṭikūlārammaṇattā ca
atk-s0305a:718_7: ārammaṇavasena neva santaṃ na paṇītaṃ, na evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena asanto vā appaṇīto
atk-s0305a:718_8: vā, apica kho ārammaṇasantatāyapi santo vūpasanto nibbuto, paṭivedhasaṅkhātāya aṅgasantatāyapi,
atk-s0305a:718_9: ārammaṇapaṇītatāya paṇīto atittikaro, aṅgapaṇītatāyapīti. Tena vuttaṃ “santo ceva paṇīto cā”ti.
atk-s0305a:719_0: Asecanako ca sukho ca vihāroti ettha pana nāssa secananti asecanako, anāsittako abbokiṇṇo
atk-s0305a:719_1: pāṭiyekko āveṇiko, natthi ettha parikammena vā upacārena vā santatā, ādisamannāhārato
atk-s0305a:719_2: pabhuti attano sabhāveneva santo ca paṇīto cāti attho. Keci “asecanako”ti anāsittako
atk-s0305a:719_3: ojavanto, sabhāveneva madhuro”ti vadanti. Evamayaṃ asecanako ca appitappitakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a:719_4: kāyikacetasikasukhappaṭilābhāya saṃvattanato sukho ca vihāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:720_0: Uppannuppanneti avikkhambhite. Pāpaketi lāmake. Akusale dhammeti akosallasambhūte
atk-s0305a:720_1: dhamme. Ṭhānaso antaradhāpetīti khaṇeneva antaradhāpeti vikkhambheti. Vūpasametīti
atk-s0305a:720_2: suṭṭhu upasameti, nibbedhabhāgiyattā anupubbena ariyamaggavuddhippatto samucchindati,
atk-s0305a:720_3: paṭippassambhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gimhānaṃ pacchime māseti āsāḷhamāse. Ūhataṃ rajojallanti
atk-s0305a:720_4: aṭṭha māse vātātapasukkhāya gomahiṃsādipādappahārasambhinnāya pathaviyā uddhaṃ hataṃ
atk-s0305a:720_5: ūhataṃ ākāse samuṭṭhitaṃ rajañca reṇuñca. Mahā akālameghoti sabbaṃ nabhaṃ ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0305a:720_6: uṭṭhito āsāḷhajuṇhapakkhe sakalaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ vassanakamegho. So hi asampatte vassakāle
atk-s0305a:720_7: uppannattā akālameghoti idha adhippeto. Ṭhānaso antarādhāpeti vūpasametīti khaṇeneva
atk-s0305a:720_8: adassanaṃ neti pathaviyaṃ sannisīdāpeti. Evameva khoti opammanidassanametaṃ. Tato
atk-s0305a:722_0: 986. Dasame kimilāyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Etadavocāti thero kira cintesi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:722_1: desanā na yathānusandhikā katā, yathānusandhiṃ gamessāmī”ti desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭento
atk-s0305a:722_2: etaṃ avoca. Kāyaññataranti pathavīādīsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vadāmi vāyokāyaṃ vadāmīti
atk-s0305a:722_3: attho. Atha vā cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… kabaḷīkāro āhāroti pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā rūpakāyo
atk-s0305a:722_4: nāma, tesu ānāpānaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatane saṅgahitattā kāyaññataraṃ hoti, tasmāpi evamāha.
atk-s0305a:722_5: Tasmātihāti yasmā catūsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vāyokāyaṃ, pañcavīsati koṭṭhāse vā rūpakāye
atk-s0305a:722_6: aññataraṃ ānāpānaṃ anupassati, tasmā kāye kāyānupassīti attho. Evaṃ sabbattha attho
atk-s0305a:722_7: veditabbo. Vedanāññataranti tīsu vedanāsu aññataraṃ, sukhavedanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:723_0: Sādhukaṃ manasikāranti pītipaṭisaṃveditādivasena uppannaṃ sundaraṃ manasikāraṃ. Kiṃ
atk-s0305a:723_1: pana manasikāro sukhā vedanā hotīti? Na hoti, desanāsīsaṃ panetaṃ. Yatheva hi “aniccasaññābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā”ti
atk-s0305a:723_2: ettha saññānāmena paññā vuttā, evamidhāpi manasikāranāmena jhānavedanā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:723_3: Etasmiñhi catukke paṭhamapade pītisīsena vedanā vuttā, dutiyapade sukhanti sarūpeneva
atk-s0305a:723_4: vuttā. Cittasaṅkhārapadadvaye “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā
atk-s0305a:723_5: cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato “vitakkavicāre ṭhapetvā sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā
atk-s0305a:723_6: cittasaṅkhāre saṅgahitā”ti vacanato cittasaṅkhāranāmena vedanā vuttā. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0305a:724_0: Evaṃ santepi yasmā esā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti, tasmā vedanānupassanā na yujjatīti.
atk-s0305a:724_1: No na yujjati, mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsupi hi taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:724_2: vedanā vedayati, taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya “ahaṃ vedayāmī”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:724_3: taṃ sandhāya “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apica
atk-s0305a:725_0: “Dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti – ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca. Kathaṃ ārammaṇato
atk-s0305a:725_1: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena
atk-s0305a:725_2: ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā. Kathaṃ asammohato
atk-s0305a:725_3: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttapītiṃ
atk-s0305a:725_4: khayato vayato sammasati, tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇappaṭivedhena asammohato pīti
atk-s0305a:725_5: paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “‘dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ
atk-s0305a:725_6: avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti, tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā
atk-s0305a:725_7: hotī’ti. Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī”ti.
atk-s0305a:726_0: Iti yatheva jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pītisukhacittasaṅkhārā paṭisaṃviditā honti,
atk-s0305a:726_1: evaṃ imināpi jhānasampayuttena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato vedanā
atk-s0305a:726_2: paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Tasmā suvuttametaṃ “vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:727_0: Nāhaṃ, ānanda, muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassāti ettha ayamadhippāyo – yasmā “cittapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0305a:727_1: assāsissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavatto bhikkhu kiñcāpi assāsapassāsanimittamārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:727_2: karoti, tassa pana cittassa ārammaṇe satiñca sampajaññañca upaṭṭhāpetvā pavattanato
atk-s0305a:727_3: citte cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti. Na hi muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā
atk-s0305a:727_4: atthi, tasmā ārammaṇato cittapaṭisaṃviditavasena “citte cittānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:728_0: So yaṃ taṃ hoti abhijjhādomanassānaṃ pahānaṃ, taṃ paññāya disvā sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā
atk-s0305a:728_1: hotīti ettha abhijjhā kāmacchandanīvaraṇameva, domanassavasena byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:728_2: Idañhi catukkaṃ vipassanāvaseneva vuttaṃ, dhammānupassanā ca nīvaraṇapabbādivasena
atk-s0305a:728_3: pañcavidhā hoti, tassā nīvaraṇapabbaṃ ādi, tassāpi idaṃ nīvaraṇadvayaṃ ādi. Iti dhammānupassanāya
atk-s0305a:728_4: ādiṃ dassetuṃ abhijjhādomanassānanti āha. Pahānanti aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:728_5: pajahatīti evaṃ pahānakarañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Taṃ paññāya disvāti taṃ aniccavirāganirodhapaṭinissaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0305a:728_6: pahānañāṇaṃ aparāya vipassanāpaññāya, tampi aparāyāti evaṃ vipassanāparamparaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a:728_7: Ajjhupekkhitā hotīti yañcassa pathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:728_8: ajjhupekkhatīti dvidhā ajjhupekkhati nāma. Tattha sahajātānampiajjhupekkhanā hoti
atk-s0305a:728_9: ārammaṇassāpi ajjhupekkhanā. Idha ārammaṇa ajjhupekkhanā adhippetā. Tasmātihānandāti
atk-s0305a:728_10: yasmā “aniccānupassī assāsissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavatto na kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme,
atk-s0305a:728_11: abhijjhādomanassasīsena pana vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānakarañāṇampi paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā
atk-s0305a:728_12: hoti, tasmā dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:729_0: Evameva khoti ettha catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni daṭṭhabbāni. Tasmiṃ paṃsupuñjo
atk-s0305a:729_1: viya chasu āyatanesu kilesā. Catūhi disāhi āgacchantā sakaṭarathā viya catūsu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0305a:729_2: pavattā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Ekena sakaṭena vā rathena vā paṃsupuñjassa upahananaṃ
atk-s0305a:729_3: viya kāyānupassanādīhi pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upaghāto veditabboti.
atk-s0305a:733_0: 987-988. Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame evaṃ byākareyyāthāti kasmā attano vihārasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0305a:733_1: ācikkhati? Upārambhamocanatthaṃ. Sace hi te “na jānāmā”ti vadeyyuṃ, atha nesaṃ titthiyā
atk-s0305a:733_2: “tumhe ‘asukasamāpattiyā nāma no satthā temāsaṃ vihāsī’tipi na jānātha, atha kasmā
atk-s0305a:733_3: naṃ upaṭṭhahantā viharathā”ti upārambhaṃ āropeyyuṃ, tato mocanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0305a:734_0: Atha kasmā yathā aññattha “satova assasati, dīghaṃ vā assasanto”ti eva-vākāro vutto.
atk-s0305a:734_1: Evaṃ idha na vuttoti? Ekantasantattā. Aññesañhi assāso vā pākaṭo hoti passāso vā,
atk-s0305a:734_2: bhagavato ubhayampetaṃ pākaṭameva niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāyāti ekantasantattā na vutto.
atk-s0305a:734_3: Atha “sikkhāmī”ti avatvā kasmā “assasāmī”ti ettakameva vuttanti? Sikkhitabbābhāvā.
atk-s0305a:734_4: Satta hi sekhā sikkhitabbabhāvā sekhā nāma, khīṇāsavā sikkhitabbābhāvā asekhā nāma,
atk-s0305a:734_5: tathāgatā asikkhitabbā asekkhā nāma natthi tesaṃ sikkhitabbakiccanti sikkhitabbābhāvā
atk-s0305a:736_0: 989-996. Tatiye pavicinatīti aniccādivasena pavicinati. Itaraṃ padadvayaṃ etasseva
atk-s0305a:736_1: vevacanaṃ. Nirāmisāti nikkilesā kāyikacetasikadarathapaṭipassaddhiyā kāyopi cittampi
atk-s0305a:736_2: passambhati. Samādhiyatīti sammā ṭhapiyati, appanācittaṃ viya hoti. Ajjhupekkhitā
atk-s0305a:737_0: Evaṃ cuddasavidhena kāyapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno tasmiṃ kāye sati satisambojjhaṅgo,
atk-s0305a:737_1: tāya satiyā sampayuttañāṇaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, taṃsampayuttameva kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ
atk-s0305a:737_4: Yatheva hi samappavattesu assesu sārathino “ayaṃ olīyatī”ti tudanaṃ vā, “ayaṃ atidhāvatī”ti
atk-s0305a:737_5: ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā natthi, kevalaṃ evaṃ passamānassa ṭhitākārova hoti, evameva imesaṃ
atk-s0305a:737_7: nāma hoti. Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ? Ekacittakkhaṇikā nānāsarasalakkhaṇā vipassanābojjhaṅgā nāma kathitā.
atk-s0305a:738_0: Vivekanissitantiādīni vuttatthāneva. Ettha pana soḷasakkhattukā ānāpānassati missakā
atk-s0305a:738_1: kathitā, ānāpānamūlakā satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, tesaṃ mūlabhūtā ānāpānassati pubbabhāgā.
atk-s0305a:738_2: Bojjhaṅgamūlakā satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, tepi bojjhaṅgā pubbabhāgāva. Vijjāvimuttipūrakā
atk-s0305a:738_3: pana bojjhaṅgā nibbattitalokuttarā, vijjāvimuttiyo ariyaphalasampayuttā. Vijjā vā
atk-s0305a:741_0: 997. Sotāpattisaṃyuttassa paṭhame kiñcāpīti anuggahagarahaṇesu nipāto. Catunnañhi
atk-s0305a:741_1: mahādīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ anuggaṇhanto catunnañca apāyānaṃ appahīnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0305a:741_2: garahanto satthā “kiñcāpi, bhikkhave, rājā cakkavattī”tiādimāha. Tattha catunnaṃ
atk-s0305a:741_3: dīpānanti dvisahassadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ. Issariyādhipaccanti issarabhāvo
atk-s0305a:741_4: issariyaṃ, adhipatibhāvo ādhipaccaṃ, issariyaṃ ādhipaccaṃ etasmiṃ rajje, na chedanabhedananti
atk-s0305a:741_5: issariyādhipaccaṃ. Kāretvāti evarūpaṃ rajjaṃ pavattāpetvā. Kiñcāpi, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakoti
atk-s0305a:741_6: ettha anuggahapasaṃsāsu nipāto. Piṇḍiyālopena hi yāpanaṃ anuggahanto catunnañca apāyānaṃ
atk-s0305a:741_7: pahīnabhāvaṃ pasaṃsanto satthā “kiñcāpi, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0305a:741_8: nantakānīti anantakāni. Terasahatthopi hi vatthasāṭako dasacchedanato paṭṭhāya nantakanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0305a:742_0: Aveccappasādenāti acalappasādena. So panāyaṃ pasādo kiṃ eko, anekoti? Ekova, so maggena
atk-s0305a:742_1: āgatappasādo. Yesu pana vatthūsu apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ruhati, tesaṃ vasena “buddhe aveccappasādenā”tiādinā
atk-s0305a:742_2: nayena tidhā vutto. Yasmā ca eko, tasmāva ninnānākaraṇo hoti. Ariyasāvakassa hi buddheyeva
atk-s0305a:742_3: pasādo ca pemañca gāravañca mahantaṃ, na dhamme vā saṅghe vā, dhammeyeva vā mahantaṃ,
atk-s0305a:742_4: na buddhe vā saṅghe vā, saṅgheyeva vā mahantaṃ, na buddhe vā dhamme vāti etaṃ natthi.
atk-s0305a:743_0: Ariyakantehīti ariyānaṃ kantehi piyehi manāpehi. Pañca hi sīlāni bhavantaragatāpi
atk-s0305a:743_1: ariyā na kopenti, evaṃ tesaṃ piyāni. Tāni sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Akhaṇḍehītiādi sadisavasena
atk-s0305a:743_2: vuttaṃ. Mukhavaṭṭiyañhi chinnekadesā pāti khaṇḍāti vuccati, majjhe bhinnā chiddāti,
atk-s0305a:743_3: ekasmiṃ padese visabhāgavaṇṇā gāvī sabalāti, nānābinducittā kammāsāti, evameva paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0305a:743_4: ādimhi vā ante vā bhinnaṃ sīlaṃ khaṇḍaṃ nāma, majjhe bhinnaṃ chiddaṃ, yattha katthaci
atk-s0305a:743_5: dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā paṭipāṭiyā bhinnattā sabalaṃ, ekantaraṃ bhinnaṃ kammāsaṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0305a:743_6: dosānaṃ abhāvena akhaṇḍāditā veditabbā. Bhujissehīti bhujissabhāvakarehi. Viññuppasatthehīti
atk-s0305a:743_7: buddhādīhi viññūhi pasaṃsitehi. Aparāmaṭṭhehīti “idaṃ nāma tayā kataṃ, idaṃ vītikkanta”nti
atk-s0305a:743_8: evaṃ parāmasituṃ asakkuṇeyyehi. Samādhisaṃvattanikehīti appanāsamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ
atk-s0305a:745_0: 998. Dutiye yesaṃ saddhāti padena buddhe pasādo gahito. Sīlanti padena ariyakantāni
atk-s0305a:745_1: sīlāni gahitāni. Pasādoti padena saṅghe pasādo gahito. Dhammadassananti padena dhamme
atk-s0305a:745_2: pasādo gahitoti evaṃ cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni vuttāni. Kālena paccentīti kālena pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0305a:745_3: Brahmacariyogadhaṃ sukhanti brahmacariyaṃ ogāhitvā ṭhitaṃ uparimaggattayasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0305a:745_4: sukhaṃ. Yo panesa gāthāya āgato pasādo, so katarapasādo hotīti. Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero
atk-s0305a:745_6: Ubhopi therā paṇḍitā bahussutā, ubhinnaṃ subhāsitaṃ. Missakappasādo esoti.
atk-s0305a:747_0: 999. Tatiye tasmāti yasmā catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu sandissasi, tasmā. Vijjābhāgiyeti
atk-s0305a:747_1: vijjākoṭṭhāsike. Sabbasaṅkhāresūti sabbesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu. Evamassa upari tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:749_0: 1000-1001. Catuttha uttānameva. Pañcame sotāpattiyaṅganti sotāpattiyā pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0305a:749_1: Buddhe aveccappasādādayo pana paṭiladdhaguṇā sotāpannassa aṅgā nāma, tepi pana sotāpattiyaṅganti
atk-s0305a:749_2: āgatā. Tatrāyaṃ dvinnampi vacanattho – sappurise sevanto bhajanto payirupāsanto dhammaṃ
atk-s0305a:749_3: suṇanto yoniso manasikaronto dhammānudhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto sotāpattiṃ
atk-s0305a:749_4: paṭilabhatīti sappurisasaṃsevādayo sotāpattiatthāya aṅganti sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ nāma,
atk-s0305a:749_5: itare paṭhamamaggasaṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā aṅgantipi sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ, paṭividdhasotāpattimaggassa
atk-s0305a:751_0: 1002. Chaṭṭhe sādhuke paṭivasantīti sādhukanāmake attano bhogagāmake vasanti. Tesu
atk-s0305a:751_1: isidatto sakadāgāmī, purāṇo sotāpanno sadārasantuṭṭho. Magge purisaṃ ṭhapesunti tesaṃ
atk-s0305a:751_2: kira gāmadvārena bhagavato gamanamaggo. Tasmā “bhagavā kāle vā akāle vā amhākaṃ suttānaṃ
atk-s0305a:751_3: vā pamattānaṃ vā gaccheyya, atha passituṃ na labheyyāmā”ti maggamajjhe purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0305a:752_0: Anubandhiṃsūti na dūratova piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṃsu, bhagavā pana sakaṭamaggassa
atk-s0305a:752_1: majjhe jaṅghamaggena agamāsi, itare ubhosu passesu anugacchantā agamaṃsu. Maggā okkammāti
atk-s0305a:752_2: buddhānañhi kenaci saddhiṃ gacchantānaṃyeva paṭisanthāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati kenaci saddhiṃ
atk-s0305a:752_3: ṭhitakānaṃ, kenaci saddhiṃ divasabhāgaṃ nisinnānaṃ. Tasmā bhagavā cintesi – “imehi
atk-s0305a:752_4: me saddhiṃ gacchantassa paṭisanthāraṃ kātuṃ ayuttaṃ, ṭhitakenapi kātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a:752_5: ime hi mayhaṃ sāsane sāmino āgataphalā. Imehi saddhiṃ nisīditvāva divasabhāgaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0305a:752_6: karissāmī”ti maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0305a:753_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti te kira chattupāhanaṃ kattaradaṇḍaṃ pādabbhañjanatelādīni
atk-s0305a:753_1: ceva aṭṭhavidhañca pānakaṃ sarabhapādapallaṅkañca gāhāpetvā agamaṃsu, ābhataṃ pallaṅkampi
atk-s0305a:753_2: paññāpetvā adaṃsu, satthā tasmiṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsūti sesāni chattupāhanādīni
atk-s0305a:753_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa dethāti vatvā sayampi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:754_0: Sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṃ pakkamissatītiādi sabbaṃ majjhimapadesavasenava vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:754_1: Kasmā? Niyatattā. Bhagavato hi cārikācaraṇampi aruṇuṭṭhāpanampi niyataṃ, majjhimapadeseyeva
atk-s0305a:754_2: cārikaṃ carati, majjhimadese aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetīti niyatattā majjhimadesavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:754_3: Āsanne no bhagavā bhavissatīti ettha na kevalaṃ āsannattāyeva tesaṃ somanassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:754_4: atha kho “idāni dānaṃ dātuṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ kātuṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ
atk-s0305a:755_0: Tasmātiha thapatayo sambādho gharāvāsoti thapatayo yasmā tumhākaṃ mayi dūrībhūte
atk-s0305a:755_1: anappakaṃ domanassaṃ, āsanne anappakaṃ somanassaṃ hoti, tasmāpi veditabbametaṃ “sambādho
atk-s0305a:755_2: gharāvāso”ti. Gharāvāsassa hi dosena tumhākaṃ evaṃ hoti. Sace pana gharāvāsaṃ pahāya
atk-s0305a:755_3: pabbajitā, atha evaṃ vo mayā saddhiṃyeva gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca taṃ na bhaveyyāti
atk-s0305a:755_4: imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha. Tattha sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena sambādhatā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:755_5: Mahāvāse vasantassapi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova. Rajāpathoti
atk-s0305a:755_6: rāgadosamoharajānaṃ āpatho, āgamanaṭṭhānanti attho. Abbhokāso pabbajjāti pabbajjā
atk-s0305a:755_7: pana akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena abbhokāso. Caturatanikepi hi gabbhe dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0305a:755_8: pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭetvā nisinnānampi akiñcanaapalibodhaṭṭhena pabbajjā abbhokāso
atk-s0305a:755_9: nāma hoti. Alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāyāti evaṃ sambādhe gharāvāse vasantānaṃ
atk-s0305a:756_0: Ekaṃ purato ekaṃ pacchato nisīdāpemāti te kira dvepi janā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu
atk-s0305a:756_1: dvīsu nāgesu tā itthiyo evaṃ nisīdāpetvā rañño nāgaṃ majjhe katvā ubhosu passesu
atk-s0305a:756_2: gacchanti, tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Nāgopi rakkhitabboti yathā kiñci visevitaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0305a:756_3: evaṃ rakkhitabbo hoti. Tāpi bhaginiyoti yathā pamādaṃ nāpajjanti, evaṃ rakkhitabbā
atk-s0305a:756_4: honti. Attāpīti sitahasitakathitavipekkhitādīni akarontehi attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
atk-s0305a:756_5: (Tehi tathā karontehi na attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti). Tathā karonto hi “sāmidubbho eso”ti
atk-s0305a:756_6: niggahetabbo hoti. Tasmātiha thapatayoti yasmā tumhe rājā niccaṃ rājabhaṇḍaṃ paṭicchāpeti,
atk-s0305a:756_7: tasmāpi sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho. Yasmā pana paṃsukūlikabhikkhuṃ evaṃ paṭicchāpento
atk-s0305a:756_8: natthi, tasmā abbhokāso pabbajjā. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi alañca pana vo thapatayo appamādāya
atk-s0305a:757_0: Muttacāgoti vissaṭṭhacāgo. Payatapāṇīti āgatāgatānaṃ dānatthāya dhotahattho. Vossaggaratoti
atk-s0305a:757_1: vossaggasaṅkhāte cāge rato. Yācayogoti yācitabbakayutto. Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dānena
atk-s0305a:757_2: ceva appamattakampi kiñci laddhā tatopi saṃvibhāge rato. Appaṭivibhattanti “idaṃ
atk-s0305a:757_3: amhākaṃ bhavissati, idaṃ bhikkhūna”nti evaṃ akatavibhāgaṃ, sabbaṃ dātabbameva hutvā ṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0305a:759_0: 1003. Sattame veḷudvāranti gāmadvāre paveṇiāgatassa veḷugacchassa atthitāya evaṃladdhanāmo
atk-s0305a:759_1: gāmo. Attupanāyikanti attani upanetabbaṃ. Samphabhāsenāti amantabhāsena. Samphappalāpabhāsenāti
atk-s0305a:761_0: 1004-5. Aṭṭhame ñātiketi ekaṃ taḷākaṃ nissāya dvinnaṃ cūḷapitimahāpitiputtānaṃ dve
atk-s0305a:761_1: gāmā, tesu ekasmiṃ gāmake. Giñjakāvasatheti iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe. Orambhāgiyānanti
atk-s0305a:761_2: heṭṭhābhāgiyānaṃ, kāmabhaveyeva paṭisandhiggāhāpakānanti attho. Oranti laddhanāmehi
atk-s0305a:761_3: vā tīhi maggehi pahātabbānītipi orambhāgiyāni. Tattha kāmacchando byāpādoti imāni
atk-s0305a:761_4: dve samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhitāni maggena vā asamucchinnāni nibbattivasena uddhaṃ
atk-s0305a:761_5: bhāgaṃ rūpabhavaṃ arūpabhavaṃ vā gantuṃ na denti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi tattha
atk-s0305a:761_6: nibbattampi ānetvā puna idheva nibbattāpentīti sabbānipi orambhāgiyāneva. Anāvattidhammoti
atk-s0305a:762_0: Rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttāti ettha kadāci uppattiyā ca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya cāti dvedhāpi
atk-s0305a:762_1: tanubhāvo veditabbo. Sakadāgāmissa hi puthujjanānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ rāgādayo na uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:762_2: kadāci karahaci uppajjanti. Uppajjamānā ca na puthujjanānaṃ viya bahalabahalā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:762_3: makkhipattaṃ viya tanukā uppajjanti. Dīghabhāṇakatipiṭakamahāsīvatthero panāha –
atk-s0305a:762_4: “yasmā sakadāgāmissa puttadhītaro honti, orodhā ca honti, tasmā bahalā kilesā. Idaṃ
atk-s0305a:762_5: pana bhavatanukavasena kathita”nti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a:762_6: aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi, sakadāgāmissa dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu
atk-s0305a:762_7: bhavatanukaṃ natthi, anāgāmissa rūpārūpabhavaṃ ṭhapetvā kāmabhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi,
atk-s0305a:762_8: khīṇāsavassa kismiñci bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthī”ti vuttattā paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:763_0: Imaṃ lokanti imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sace hi
atk-s0305a:763_1: manussesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patto devesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti, iccetaṃ
atk-s0305a:763_2: kusalaṃ. Asakkonto pana avassaṃ manussalokaṃ āgantvā sacchikaroti. Devesu sakadāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0305a:763_3: pattopi sace manussesu nibbattitvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Asakkonto
atk-s0305a:764_0: Vinipatanaṃ vinipāto, nāssa vinipāto dhammoti avinipātadhammo, catūsu apāyesu avinipātanasabhāvoti
atk-s0305a:764_1: attho. Niyatoti dhammaniyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā
atk-s0305a:764_2: sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ assa gati paṭisaraṇaṃ avassaṃ pattabbāti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-s0305a:764_3: Vihesāvesāti tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagatiṃ ñāṇūpapattiṃ ñāṇābhisamparāyaṃ olokentassa kāyakilamathova
atk-s0305a:764_4: esa, ānanda, tathāgatassāti dīpeti. Cittavihesā pana buddhānaṃ natthi.
atk-s0305a:765_0: Dhammādāsanti dhammamayaṃ ādāsaṃ. Yenāti yena dhammādāsena samannāgato. Khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti
atk-s0305a:765_1: idaṃ nirayādīnaṃyeva vevacanavaseneva vuttaṃ. Nirayādayo hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato
atk-s0305a:765_2: apetattā apāyo, dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti. Duggati, dukkaṭakārino ettha vivasā
atk-s0305a:767_0: 1006. Dasame paropaññāsāti atirekapaññāsa. Sādhikanavutīti atirekanavuti. Chātirekānīti
atk-s0305a:767_1: chahi adhikāni. So kira gāmo kiñcāpi nātimahā ahosi, ariyasāvakā panettha bahū. Tattha
atk-s0305a:767_2: tattha ahivātarogena ekappahāreneva catuvīsati pāṇasatasahassāni kālamakaṃsu, tesu
atk-s0305a:767_3: ariyasāvakā ettakā nāma ahesuṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:771_0: 1007. Dutiyassa paṭhame rājakārāmeti raññā kāritattā evaṃ laddhanāme ārāme, taṃ raññā
atk-s0305a:771_1: pasenadikosalena kataṃ. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0305a:771_2: titthiyā cintayiṃsu – “samaṇo gotamo lābhaggayasaggapatto, na kho panesa aññaṃ kiñci
atk-s0305a:771_3: sīlaṃ vā samādhiṃ vā nissāya evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapatto. Bhūmisīsaṃ pana tena gahitaṃ,
atk-s0305a:771_4: sace mayampi jetavanasamīpe ārāmaṃ kārāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāma, lābhaggayasaggapattā bhaveyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0305a:771_5: Te attano attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā satasahassamatte kahāpaṇe labhitvā te ādāya
atk-s0305a:771_6: rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā “kiṃ eta”nti? Pucchi. Mayaṃ jetavanasamīpe titthiyārāmaṃ
atk-s0305a:771_7: karoma, sace samaṇo gotamo vā samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā vā āgantvā vāressanti, vāretuṃ
atk-s0305a:771_8: mā adatthāti lañjaṃ adaṃsu. Rājā lañjaṃ gahetvā “gacchatha kārethā”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:772_0: Te gantvā, attano upaṭṭhākehi dabbasambhāre āharāpetvā, thambhussāpanādīni karontā,
atk-s0305a:772_1: uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ekakolāhalaṃ akaṃsu. Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma pamukhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0305a:772_2: “ke pana te, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?, Pucchi.
atk-s0305a:772_3: Titthiyā, bhante, jetavanasamīpe titthiyārāmaṃ karontīti. Ānanda, ime sāsanena paṭiviruddhā
atk-s0305a:772_4: bhikkhusaṅghassa aphāsuvihāraṃ karissanti, rañño ārocetvā vārāpehīti.
atk-s0305a:773_0: Thero bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Rañño “therā, deva, āgatā”ti
atk-s0305a:773_1: nivedayiṃsu. Rājā lañjassa gahitattā na nikkhami. Therā gantvā satthu ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:773_2: Satthā sāriputtamoggallāne pesesi. Rājā tesampi dassanaṃ na adāsi. Te āgantvā satthu
atk-s0305a:773_3: ārocayiṃsu “na, bhante, rājā nikkhanto”ti. Satthā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva byākāsi – “attano
atk-s0305a:773_4: rajje ṭhatvā kālaṃ kātuṃ na labhissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:774_0: Dutiyadivase ca sāmaṃyeva bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “satthā
atk-s0305a:774_1: āgato”ti sutvā nikkhamitvā, nivesanaṃ pavesetvā, sārapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā, yāgukhajjakaṃ
atk-s0305a:774_2: adāsi. Satthā paribhuttayāgukhādanīyo “yāva bhattaṃ niṭṭhāti, tāva satthu santike
atk-s0305a:774_3: nisīdissāmī”ti āgantvā nisinnaṃ rājānaṃ “tayā, mahārāja, idaṃ nāma kata”nti avatvā,
atk-s0305a:774_4: “kāraṇeneva naṃ saññāpessāmī”ti idaṃ atītakāraṇaṃ āhari – mahārāja, pabbajite nāma
atk-s0305a:774_5: aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Atītepi isayo aññamaññaṃ yujjhāpetvā saha raṭṭhena
atk-s0305a:775_0: Atīte, mahārāja, bharuraṭṭhe bharurājā nāma rajjaṃ kāreti. Pañcasatā pañcasatā dve
atk-s0305a:775_1: isigaṇā pabbatapādato loṇambilasevanatthāya bharunagaraṃ gantvā nagarassa avidūre
atk-s0305a:775_2: dve rukkhā atthi, paṭhamaṃ āgato isigaṇo ekassa rukkhassa mūle nisīdi, pacchāgatopi
atk-s0305a:775_3: ekassāti. Te yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā pabbatapādaṃ eva agamaṃsu. Te puna āgacchantāpi
atk-s0305a:775_4: attano rukkhamūleyeva nisīdanti. Addhāne gacchante eko rukkho sukkhi, tasmiṃ sukkhe
atk-s0305a:775_5: āgatā tāpasā “ayaṃ rukkho mahā, amhākampi tesampi pahossatī”ti itaresaṃ rukkhamūlassa
atk-s0305a:775_6: ekapadese nisīdiṃsu. Te pacchā āgacchantā rukkhamūlaṃ apavisitvā bahi ṭhitāva “kasmā
atk-s0305a:775_7: tumhe ettha nisīdathā”ti āhaṃsu. Ācariyā amhākaṃ rukkho sukkho, ayaṃ rukkho mahā,
atk-s0305a:775_8: tumhepi pavisatha, tumhākampi amhākampi pahossatīti. Te “na mayaṃ pavisāma, nikkhamatha
atk-s0305a:775_9: tumhe”ti kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “na tumhe attanova manena nikkhamissathā”ti hatthādīsu
atk-s0305a:775_10: gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu. Te “hotu sikkhāpessāma ne”ti iddhiyā sovaṇṇamayāni dve cakkāni
atk-s0305a:775_11: rajatamayañca akkhaṃ māpetvā pavaṭṭentā rājadvāraṃ agamiṃsu. Rañño “evarūpaṃ, deva,
atk-s0305a:775_12: tāpasā paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā ṭhitā”ti nivedayiṃsu. Rājā tuṭṭho “pakkosathā”ti te pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0305a:775_13: “mahākammaṃ tumhehi kataṃ, atthi vo kiñci mayā kattabba”nti āha. Āma, mahārāja, amhākaṃ
atk-s0305a:775_14: nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ ekarukkhamūlaṃ atthi, taṃ aññehi isīhi gahitaṃ, taṃ no dāpehīti. Rājā
atk-s0305a:776_0: Te bahi ṭhitā “kiṃ nu kho datvā labhiṃsū”ti olokayamānā “idaṃ nāmā”ti disvā “mayampi
atk-s0305a:776_1: lañjaṃ datvā puna gaṇhissāmā”ti iddhiyā sovaṇṇamayaṃ rathapañjaraṃ māpetvā ādāya
atk-s0305a:776_2: agamaṃsu. Rājā disvā tuṭṭho – “kiṃ, bhante, kātabba”nti?, Āha. Mahārāja amhākaṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0305a:776_3: añño isigaṇo nisinno, taṃ no rukkhamūlaṃ dāpehīti. Rājā purise pesetvā te nikkaḍḍhāpesi.
atk-s0305a:776_4: Tāpasā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ katvā, “ananucchavikaṃ amhehi kata”nti vippaṭisārino hutvā
atk-s0305a:776_5: pabbatapādameva agamaṃsu. Tato devatā “ayaṃ rājā dvinnaṃ isigaṇānaṃ hatthato lañjaṃ
atk-s0305a:776_6: gahetvā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kārāpesī”ti kujjhitvā mahāsamuddaṃ ubbaṭṭetvā tassa rañño
atk-s0305a:778: Ucchinno saha raṭṭhehi, sa rājā vibhavaṅgato”ti. –
atk-s0305a:779_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ atīte dassite yasmā buddhānaṃ nāma kathā okappaniyā hoti,
atk-s0305a:779_1: “tasmā rājā attano kiriyaṃ sallakkhetvā anupadhāretvā mayā akattabbaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0305a:779_2: “gacchatha, bhaṇe, titthiye nikkaḍḍhathā”ti nikkaḍḍhāpetvā cintesi – “mayā kārito
atk-s0305a:779_3: vihāro nāma natthi, tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vihāraṃ kāressāmī”ti tesaṃ dabbasambhārepi adatvā
atk-s0305a:781: 1008-9. Dutiye udayagāmininti attano samaye vaḍḍhigāminiṃ. Maraṇaṃ āgameyyāsīti maraṇaṃ iccheyyāsi, pattheyyāsi vā. Tatiyaṃ uttānameva.
atk-s0305a:785: 1011. Pañcame sabbaduggativinipātabhayaṃ samatikkantoti manussadobhaggena saddhiṃ cattāro apāyā paṭikkhittā.
atk-s0305a:787_0: 1012. Chaṭṭhe mittāti aññamaññassa gehe āmisaparibhogavasena vohāramittā. Amaccāti
atk-s0305a:789_0: 1013. Sattame aññathattaṃ nāma pasādaññathattaṃ bhāvaññathattaṃ gatiaññathattaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ
atk-s0305a:789_1: vipariṇāmaññathattanti anekavidhaṃ. Tattha mahābhūtesu bhāvaññathattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0305a:789_2: Suvaṇṇādibhāvena hi ghanasaṇṭhitāya pathavidhātuyā vilīyitvā udakabhāvaṃ āpajjamānāya
atk-s0305a:789_3: purimabhāvo vigacchati, bhāvaññathattaṃ paññāyati. Lakkhaṇaṃ pana na vigacchati,
atk-s0305a:789_4: kakkhaḷalakkhaṇāva hoti. Ucchurasādibhāvena ca yūsākārasaṇṭhitāya āpodhātuyā sussitvā
atk-s0305a:789_5: ghanapathavibhāvaṃ āpajjamānāya purimabhāvo vigacchati, bhāvaññathattaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a:789_6: Lakkhaṇaṃ pana na vigacchati, ābandhanalakkhaṇāva hoti. Tatridaṃ aññathattanti ettha
atk-s0305a:789_7: pana gatiaññathattaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañhi ariyasāvakassa natthi. Pasādaññathattampi
atk-s0305a:789_8: natthiyeva, idha pana pasādaphalaṃ pakāsetuṃ gatiaññathattameva dassitaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:793_0: 1017-18. Tatiyassa paṭhame iddhanti telamadhuphāṇitādīhi samiddhaṃ. Phītanti hatthūpagasīsūpagagīvūpagādialaṅkāravasena
atk-s0305a:793_1: supupphitaṃ. Ākiṇṇamanussanti nirantaramanussaṃ. Sambādhabyūhanti byūhā vuccanti
atk-s0305a:793_2: avinibbiddharacchāyo, yā paviṭṭhamaggeneva niggacchanti, tā sambādhā byūhā bahukā
atk-s0305a:793_3: etthāti sambādhabyūhaṃ. Imināpi nagarassa ghanavāsameva dīpeti. Bhantenāti ito cito
atk-s0305a:795_0: 1019. Tatiye bhagavāva etaṃ jāneyya etehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ vā asamannāgataṃ
atk-s0305a:795_1: vāti idaṃ so sakko tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa puggalassa sotāpannabhāvaṃ, catūhi
atk-s0305a:795_2: vā dhammehi samannāgatassa sotāpannabhāvaṃ bhagavāva jānātīti adhippāyena āha.
atk-s0305a:796_0: Kocideva dhammasamuppādo uppajjeyyāti kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ uppajjeyya. Ekato assa bhagavā,
atk-s0305a:796_1: ekato bhikkhusaṅghoti yasmiṃ kāraṇe uppanne bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena nānāladdhiko
atk-s0305a:796_2: hutvā ekaṃ vādaṃ vadanto ekato assa, bhikkhusaṅghopi ekaṃ vadanto ekatoti attho.
atk-s0305a:796_3: Tenevāhanti yaṃ vādaṃ tumhe vadetha, tamevāhaṃ gaṇheyyanti. Nanu ca ariyasāvakassa
atk-s0305a:796_4: ratanattaye pasādanānattaṃ natthi, atha kasmā esa evamāhāti? Bhagavato sabbaññutāya.
atk-s0305a:796_5: Evañhissa hoti “bhikkhusaṅgho attano asabbaññutāya ajānitvāpi katheyya, satthu pana
atk-s0305a:796_6: aññāṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Tasmā evamāha. Aññatra kalyāṇā aññatra kusalāti kalyāṇameva
atk-s0305a:796_7: kusalameva vadāmi, na kalyāṇakusalavimuttanti. Apicassa anavajjanadoso esoti.
atk-s0305a:798_0: 1020. Catutthe idha mahānāma ekacco puggaloti idaṃ na kevalaṃ saraṇāni eva apāyato
atk-s0305a:798_1: mutto, imepi puggalā muttāti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Mattaso nijjhānaṃ khamantīti pamāṇena
atk-s0305a:798_2: ca olokanaṃ khamanti. Iminā dhammānusārimaggaṭṭhapuggalaṃ dasseti. Agantā nirayanti
atk-s0305a:798_3: maggaṭṭhapuggalo hi apāyato parimuttoti vā parimuccissatīti vā vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0305a:798_4: parimuccatīti pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmā ca parimuccati, tasmā gantā nāma na hotīti,
atk-s0305a:798_5: “agantā”ti vutto, na gacchatīti attho. Saddhāmattaṃ pemamattanti iminā saddhānusārimaggaṭṭhapuggalaṃ
atk-s0305a:798_6: dasseti. Mahāsālāti samīpe ṭhiteva cattāro mahāsārarukkhe dassento āha. Maraṇakāle
atk-s0305a:798_7: sikkhaṃ samādiyīti maraṇasamaye tīsu sikkhāsu paripūrakārī ahosīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:800_0: 1021. Pañcame dukkhettanti visamakhettaṃ. Dubbhūmanti ūsarabhūmiṃ loṇūpahataṃ. Khaṇḍānīti
atk-s0305a:800_1: paribhinnāni. Pūtīnīti udakena temetvā pūtibhāvaṃ āpannāni. Vātātapahatānīti vātātapena
atk-s0305a:800_2: hatattā nirojabhāvaṃ gatāni. Asārādānīti anādinnasārāni agahitasārāni. Asukhasayitānīti
atk-s0305a:800_3: na koṭṭhādīsu pakkhipitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapitāni. Sukhasayitānīti ṭhapitaṭṭhānato cattāro māse acalitāni.
atk-s0305a:802_0: 1022. Chaṭṭhe ṭhānaso vedanā paṭippassambheyyāti khaṇena vedanā paṭippassambheyya.
atk-s0305a:802_2: saddhañca sīlañcāti gāthā vuttatthā eva. Yatra hi nāmāti yo nāma.
atk-s0305a:804: 1023. Sattame samparāyikaṃ maraṇabhayanti samparāyahetukaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ gihisāmīcikānīti gihīnaṃ anucchavikāni. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:808: 1027. Catutthassa paṭhame puññābhisandā kusalābhisandāti puññanadiyo kusalanadiyo. Sukhassāhārāti sukhassa paccayā.
atk-s0305a:810_0: 1030. Catutthe devapadānīti devānaṃ ñāṇena, devassa vā ñāṇena akkantapadāni. Visuddhiyāti
atk-s0305a:810_1: visujjhanatthāya. Pariyodapanāyāti puriyodapanatthāya jotanatthāya. Imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0305a:810_2: cattāropi phalaṭṭhapuggalā visuddhaṭṭhena devā nāma jātā.
atk-s0305a:812_0: 1034. Aṭṭhame pāraṃgantvāti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ patvāti attho. Āsavānaṃ khayāya
atk-s0305a:812_1: saṃvattantīti na paṭhamaṃ nibbānaṃ gantvā pacchā saṃvattanti, gacchamānā eva saṃvattanti.
atk-s0305a:814_0: 1036. Dasame divā pavivekāya rattiṃ paṭisallānāyāti divā pavivekatthāya rattiṃ paṭisallānatthāya.
atk-s0305a:814_1: Dhammā na pātubhavantīti samathavipassanā dhammā na uppajjanti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:818_0: 1037. Pañcamassa paṭhame asaṅkhyeyyoti āḷhakagaṇanāya asaṅkhyeyyo, yojanavasena panassa
atk-s0305a:818_1: saṅkhyā atthi. Bahubheravanti saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakānaṃ bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena bahubheravaṃ.
atk-s0305a:818_2: Puthūti bahu. Savantīti sandamānā. Upayantīti upagacchanti.
atk-s0305a:820: 1038. Dutiye yatthimā mahānadiyo saṃsandanti samentīti yasmiṃ saṃbhajje etā mahānadiyo ekībhavanti, nirantarā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0305a:822_0: 1039. Tatiye puññakāmoti puññatthiko. Kusale patiṭṭhitoti maggakusale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0305a:822_1: Bhāveti maggaṃ amatassa pattiyāti nibbānassa pāpuṇanatthaṃ arahattamaggaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0305a:822_2: Dhammasārādhigamoti dhammasāro vuccati ariyaphalaṃ dhammasāro, adhigamo assāti dhammasārādhigamo,
atk-s0305a:822_3: adhigataphaloti attho. Khaye ratoti kilesakkhaye rato.
atk-s0305a:824: 1040. Catutthe aḍḍho mahaddhanoti sattavidhena ariyadhanena aḍḍho ceva mahaddhano ca. Teneva bhogena mahābhogo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:828_0: 1048. Chaṭṭhassa dutiye ayamadhippāyo – sotāpanno bhikkhu ettakena vosānaṃ anāpajjitvā
atk-s0305a:828_1: tāneva indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sakadāgāmimaggaṃ
atk-s0305a:828_2: pāpuṇissati, sakadāgāmī anāgāmimaggaṃ, anāgāmī arahattamagganti imamatthaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0305a:828_3: bhagavatā imasmiṃ sutte sāsane tanti paveṇī kathitāti.
atk-s0305a:830_0: 1049. Tatiye dhammadinnoti sattasu janesu eko. Buddhakālasmiñhi dhammadinno upāsako,
atk-s0305a:830_1: visākho upāsako, uggo gahapati, citto gahapati, hatthako āḷavako, cūḷaanāthapiṇḍiko,
atk-s0305a:830_2: mahāanāthapiṇḍikoti ime satta janā pañcasataupāsakaparivārā ahesuṃ. Etesu esa aññataro.
atk-s0305a:831_0: Gambhīrāti dhammagambhīrā sallasuttādayo. Gambhīratthāti atthagambhīrā cetanāsuttantādayo.
atk-s0305a:831_2: khajjanikasuttantādayo. Upasampajja viharissāmāti paṭilabhitvā viharissāma. Evañhi
atk-s0305a:831_3: vo, dhammadinna, sikkhitabbanti evaṃ tumhehi candopamapaṭipadaṃ rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0305a:831_4: moneyyapaṭipadaṃ mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ pūrentehi sikkhitabbaṃ. Iti satthā imesaṃ
atk-s0305a:831_5: upāsakānaṃ asayhabhāraṃ āropesi. Kasmā? Ete kira na attano bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā ovādaṃ
atk-s0305a:831_6: yāciṃsu, avisesena pana sabbabhāraṃ ukkhipituṃ samatthā viya “ovadatu no, bhante,
atk-s0305a:831_7: bhagavā”ti yāciṃsu. Tena tesaṃ satthā asayhabhāraṃ āropento evamāha. Na kho netanti
atk-s0305a:831_8: na kho etaṃ. Nakāro panettha byañjanasandhimattamevāti veditabbo. Tasmāti yasmā idāni
atk-s0305a:831_9: attano bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā ovādaṃ yācatha, tasmā.
atk-s0305a:833_0: 1050. Catutthe na kho panetanti na kho amhehi etaṃ. Sappañño upāsakoti sotāpanno
atk-s0305a:833_1: adhippeto. Assāsanīyehi dhammehīti assāsakarehi dhammehi. Assāsatāyasmāti assāsatu
atk-s0305a:833_2: āyasmā. Mārisoti maraṇapaṭibaddho. Maraṇadhammoti maraṇasabhāvo. Adhimocehīti ṭhapehi.
atk-s0305a:833_3: Adhimocitanti ṭhapitaṃ. Evaṃ vimuttacittassāti evaṃ arahattaphalavimuttiyā vimuttacittassa.
atk-s0305a:833_4: Yadidaṃ vimuttiyā vimuttanti yaṃ idaṃ vimuttiṃ ārabbha vimuttiyā nānākaraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ
atk-s0305a:833_5: siyā, na taṃ vadāmi. Bhikkhusaṅghassa hi cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattesu ceva asītikkhandhakavattesu
atk-s0305a:833_6: cāti āgamanīyaguṇesu pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi, paṭividdhe pana magge vā phale vā upāsakānañca
atk-s0305a:835_0: 1055. Navame paññāpaṭilābhāya saṃvattantīti ettha satta sekkhā paññaṃ paṭilabhanti
atk-s0305a:835_1: nāma, khīṇāsavo paṭiladdhapañño nāmāti veditabbo. Parato paññābuddhiyātiādīsupi eseva
atk-s0305a:839_0: 1058. Sattame mahāpaññatāya saṃvattantītiādīsu “mahante atthe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā”tiādinā
atk-s0305a:839_1: paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayeneva sabbattha sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:842_0: 1071. Saccasaṃyuttassa paṭhame samādhiṃ, bhikkhaveti te kira bhikkhū cittekaggatāya
atk-s0305a:842_1: parihāyanti, atha nesaṃ satthā – “evamete cittekaggataṃ labhitvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā,
atk-s0305a:842_2: visesaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, “idaṃ dukkha”nti
atk-s0305a:842_3: yogo karaṇīyoti ettha yathābhūtādivasena kāraṇacchedo veditabbo. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0305a:842_4: – bhikkhave, yasmā samāhito bhikkhu cattāri saccāni yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, tasmā tumhehi
atk-s0305a:842_5: ca samāhitehi catunnaṃ saccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānanatthāya “idaṃ dukkha”nti yogo
atk-s0305a:842_6: karaṇīyo. Tathā yasmā cattāri saccāni tathāgatasseva pātubhāvā pākaṭāni honti, yasmā
atk-s0305a:842_7: ca tathāgatena suvibhattāni, yasmā ca tesu aparimāṇā vaṇṇā aparimāṇāni padabyañjanāni,
atk-s0305a:842_8: yasmā ca tesaṃ appaṭividdhattā vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhati, tesaṃ paṭividdhakālato paṭṭhāya na
atk-s0305a:842_9: vaḍḍhati, tasmā “evaṃ no vaṭṭaṃ na vaḍḍhissatī”ti tumhehi “idaṃ dukkha”nti yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0305a:846_0: 1073-75. Tatiye abhisamayāyāti abhisamayatthāya. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti cettha sāsanāvacarā
atk-s0305a:846_1: adhippetā. Tathā catutthapañcamesu, tena tena abhilāpena bujjhanakānaṃ pana ajjhāsayenetāni vuttāni.
atk-s0305a:848: 1076. Chaṭṭhe abhisambuddhaṃ pakāsesunti abhisambuddho ahanti evaṃ attānaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ pakāsayiṃsu. Imasmiñhi sutte sabbaññubuddhā ca samaṇagahaṇena gahitā.
atk-s0305a:850_0: 1080. Dasame anekavihitanti anekavidhaṃ. Tiracchānakathanti aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ
atk-s0305a:850_1: tiracchānabhūtaṃ kathaṃ. Rājakathantiādīsu rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā
atk-s0305a:850_2: dhammāsoko evaṃ mahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena pavattakathā rājakathā. Esa nayo corakathādīsu.
atk-s0305a:850_3: Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā nayena gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā
atk-s0305a:850_4: hoti. “Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve
atk-s0305a:850_5: tiṭṭhati. Coresupi “mūladevo evaṃ mahānubhāvo meghamālo evaṃ mahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ
atk-s0305a:850_6: kammaṃ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehasitakathāva tiracchānakathā. Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu
atk-s0305a:850_7: “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā,
atk-s0305a:850_8: “tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti. Apica
atk-s0305a:850_9: annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha
atk-s0305a:850_10: pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṃ pana katvā
atk-s0305a:850_11: “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ
atk-s0305a:850_12: sīlavantānaṃ adamha, cetiye pūjaṃ akarimhā”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:851_0: Ñātikathādīsupi “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā, “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi
atk-s0305a:851_1: yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi
atk-s0305a:851_2: no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā, “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā
atk-s0305a:851_4: sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā
atk-s0305a:851_5: pasannā”ti vā, “khayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a:852_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā
atk-s0305a:852_1: khayaṃ gatā”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Sūrakathāpi “nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī”ti
atk-s0305a:852_2: assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, “saddho pasanno ahosi, khayaṃ gato”ti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:852_3: Surākathātipi pāṭho. Sāpi cesā surākathā “evarūpā nāma surā pītā ratijananī hotī”ti
atk-s0305a:852_4: assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, ādīnavavasena pana “ummattakasaṃvattanikā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0305a:852_6: vāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā assādavaseneva vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā khayaṃ
atk-s0305a:852_7: gatā”ti eccevaṃ vaṭṭati. Kumbhaṭṭhānakathāti udakatitthakathā vuccati, kumbhadāsikathā
atk-s0305a:852_8: vā. Sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā”tiādinā nayeneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:853_0: Pubbapetakathāti atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo. Nānattakathāti
atk-s0305a:853_1: purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā. Lokakkhāyikāti
atk-s0305a:853_2: “ayaṃ loko kena nimmito, asukena nāma nimmito, kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā, balākā
atk-s0305a:853_3: rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā. Samuddakkhāyikā
atk-s0305a:853_4: nāma “kasmā samuddo sāgaro, sāgaradevena khanitattā sāgaro, khato meti hatthamuddāya
atk-s0305a:853_5: niveditattā samuddo”ti evamādikā niratthakasamuddakkhāyikakathā. Iti bhavo iti abhavoti
atk-s0305a:853_6: yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā. Ettha ca
atk-s0305a:853_7: bhavoti sassataṃ, abhavoti ucchedaṃ. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti kāmasukhaṃ,
atk-s0305a:853_8: abhavoti attakilamatho. Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa
atk-s0305a:853_9: tiracchānakathā nāma honti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0305a:857_0: 1081. Dutiyassa paṭhame bārāṇasiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Isipatane migadāyeti isīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:857_1: patanuppatanavasena evaṃladdhanāme migānaṃ abhayadānavasena dinnattā migadāyasaṅkhāte
atk-s0305a:857_2: ārāme. Ettha hi uppannuppannā sabbaññuisayo patanti, dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisīdantīti
atk-s0305a:857_3: attho. Nandamūlakapabbhārato sattāhaccayena nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitā anotattadahe
atk-s0305a:857_4: katamukhadhovanādikiccā ākāsena āgantvā paccekabuddhaisayopettha otaraṇavasena patanti,
atk-s0305a:857_5: uposathatthañca anuposathatthañca sannipatanti, gandhamādanaṃ paṭigacchantāpi tatova
atk-s0305a:857_6: uppatantīti iminā isīnaṃ patanuppatanavasena taṃ “isipatana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0305a:858_0: Āmantesīti dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrento anupubbena
atk-s0305a:858_1: pacchimabhave katābhinikkhamano anupubbena bodhimaṇḍaṃ patvā tattha aparājitapallaṅke
atk-s0305a:858_2: nisinno mārabalaṃ bhinditvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
atk-s0305a:858_3: visodhetvā pacchimayāmāvasāne dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento sabbaññutaṃ patvā satta
atk-s0305a:858_4: sattāhāni bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā mahābrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0305a:858_5: lokaṃ voloketvā lokānuggahena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā pañcavaggiye saññāpetvā dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0305a:859_0: Dveme, bhikkhave, antāti dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā. Imassa pana padassa saha samudāhārena
atk-s0305a:859_1: samudāhāranigghoso heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ patvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0305a:859_2: aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃyeva samaye aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhā brahmāno samāgacchiṃsu, pacchimadisāya
atk-s0305a:859_3: sūriyo atthameti, pācīnadisāya āsāḷhanakkhattena yutto puṇṇacando uggacchati. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0305a:859_4: samaye bhagavā imaṃ dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṃ ārabhanto “dveme, bhikkhave, antā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:860_0: Tattha pabbajitenāti gihisaṃyojanaṃ chinditvā pabbajjupagatena. Na sevitabbāti na
atk-s0305a:860_1: vaḷañjetabbā. Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogoti yo ca ayaṃ vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasukhassa
atk-s0305a:860_2: anuyogo. Hīnoti lāmako. Gammoti gāmavāsīnaṃ santako. Pothujjanikoti andhabālajanena
atk-s0305a:860_3: āciṇṇo. Anariyoti na ariyo na visuddho na uttamo na vā ariyānaṃ santako. Anatthasaṃhitoti
atk-s0305a:860_4: na atthasaṃhito, hitasukhāvahakāraṇaṃ anissitoti attho. Attakilamathānuyogoti attano
atk-s0305a:860_5: kilamathassa anuyogo, attano dukkhakaraṇanti attho. Dukkhoti kaṇṭakāpassayaseyyādīhi
atk-s0305a:861_0: Paññācakkhuṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī. Dutiyapadaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Upasamāyāti kilesūpasamatthāya.
atk-s0305a:861_1: Abhiññāyāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ abhijānanatthāya. Sambodhāyāti tesaṃyeva sambujjhanatthāya.
atk-s0305a:861_2: Nibbānāyāti nibbānasacchikiriyāya. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ heṭṭhā tattha
atk-s0305a:861_3: tattha vuttameva. Saccakathāpi sabbākāreneva visuddhimagge vitthāritā.
atk-s0305a:862_0: Tiparivaṭṭanti saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ parivaṭṭānaṃ vasena tiparivaṭṭaṃ.
atk-s0305a:862_1: Ettha hi “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, idaṃ dukkhasamudaya”nti evaṃ catūsu saccesu yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0305a:862_2: ñāṇaṃ saccañāṇaṃ nāma. Tesuyeva “pariññeyyaṃ pahātabba”nti evaṃ kattabbakiccajānanañāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:862_3: kiccañāṇaṃ nāma. “Pariññātaṃ pahīna”nti evaṃ tassa tassa kiccassa katabhāvajānanañāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:862_4: katañāṇaṃ nāma. Dvādasākāranti tesaṃyeva ekekasmiṃ sacce tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena
atk-s0305a:862_5: dvādasākāraṃ. Ñāṇadassananti etesaṃ tiparivaṭṭānaṃ dvādasannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena uppannañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0305a:862_6: dassanaṃ. Dhammacakkhunti aññattha tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni dhammacakkhu nāma honti,
atk-s0305a:863_0: Dhammacakketi paṭivedhañāṇe ceva desanāñāṇe ca. Bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa hi catūsu
atk-s0305a:863_1: saccesu uppannaṃ dvādasākāraṃ paṭivedhañāṇampi, isipatane nisinnassa dvādasākārāya
atk-s0305a:863_2: saccadesanāya pavattitaṃ desanāñāṇampi dhammacakkaṃ nāma. Ubhayampi hetaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0305a:863_3: ure pavattañāṇameva. Imāya desanāya pakāsentena bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ
atk-s0305a:863_4: nāma. Taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi
atk-s0305a:863_5: saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāti, tāva naṃ bhagavā pavatteti nāma, patiṭṭhite ca
atk-s0305a:863_6: pavattitaṃ nāma. Taṃ sandhāya pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā
atk-s0305a:864_0: Tattha bhummāti bhūmaṭṭhakadevatā. Saddamanussāvesunti ekappahāreneva sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0305a:864_1: datvā – “etaṃ bhagavatā”tiādīni vadantā anusāvayiṃsu. Obhāsoti sabbaññutaññāṇobhāso.
atk-s0305a:864_2: So hi tadā devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ atikkamitvā virocittha. Aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍaññoti
atk-s0305a:864_3: imassapi udānassa udāhāranigghoso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:866_0: 1089. Navame aparimāṇā vaṇṇāti appamāṇāni akkharāni. Byañjanāti tesaṃyeva vevacanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:866_1: vaṇṇānaṃ vā ekadesā yadidaṃ byañjanā nāma. Saṅkāsanāti vibhattiyo. Ekamekasmiñhi
atk-s0305a:866_2: sacce sabbākārena vitthāriyamāne vaṇṇādīnaṃ anto nāma natthi. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0305a:868_0: 1090. Dasame sabhāvāvijahanaṭṭhena tathaṃ. Dukkhañhi dukkhameva vuttaṃ. Sabhāvassa
atk-s0305a:868_1: amoghatāya avitathaṃ. Na hi dukkhaṃ adukkhaṃ nāma hoti. Aññabhāvānupagamena anaññathaṃ.
atk-s0305a:868_2: Na hi dukkhaṃ samudayādibhāvaṃ upagacchati. Samudayādīsupi eseva nayoti.
atk-s0305a:872: 1091. Tatiyassa paṭhame ananubodhāti ananubujjhanena. Appaṭivedhāti appaṭivijjhanena.
atk-s0305a:876: 1097. Sattame tasmā ariyasaccānīti yasmā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyānaṃ saccānīti vuccanti. Na hi vitathāni ariyā ariyasaccato paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0305a:878: 1098. Aṭṭhame tathāgato ariyo, tasmā “ariyasaccānī”ti yasmā ariyena tathāgatena paṭividdhattā desitattā ca tāni ariyasantakāni honti, tasmā ariyassa saccattā ariyasaccānīti attho.
atk-s0305a:880: 1100. Dasame sahañcaniketi sahañcaniyanagare. Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatītiādi ekapaṭivedhavasena vuttaṃ, imasmiñhi sutte ekapaṭivedhova kathito.
atk-s0305a:884: 1101. Catutthassa paṭhame yadidaṃ uparīti yāni imāni upari. Sīsapāvaneti sīsapārukkhe.
atk-s0305a:886: 1102. Dutiye anabhisameccāti ñāṇena anabhisamāgantvā, appaṭivijjhitvāti attho.
atk-s0305a:888_0: 1103. Tatiye asmā lokā paraṃ lokanti imamhā manussalokā paraṃ nirayampi, tiracchānayonimpi,
atk-s0305a:888_1: pettivisayampi, manussalokampi, devalokampi, gacchanti, punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva
atk-s0305a:890: 1105. Pañcame evañcetaṃ, bhikkhave, assāti, bhikkhave, evaṃ ce etaṃ bhaveyya, nirantaraṃ sattisatehi haññamānassa dukkhadomanassehi sahevesa saccābhisamayo bhaveyya ceti attho.
atk-s0305a:892: 1109. Navame mukhaṃ olokentīti ajjhāsayaṃ olokenti. Ajjhāsayo idha mukhanti adhippeto.
atk-s0305a:894_0: 1110. Dasame silāyūpoti silāthambho. Soḷasakukkukoti soḷasahattho. Soḷasakukkūtipi
atk-s0305a:894_1: pāṭho. Heṭṭhā nemaṅgamāti heṭṭhā āvāṭaṃ paviṭṭhā. Aṭṭha kukku uparinemassāti aṭṭha
atk-s0305a:894_2: hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ. Bhusāti balavatī. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a:898_0: 1111. Pañcamassa paṭhame sumāgadhāya pokkharaṇiyāti evaṃnāmikāya pokkharaṇiyā. Lokacintaṃ
atk-s0305a:898_1: cintentoti, “kena nu kho candimasūriyā katā, kena mahāpathavī, kena mahāsamuddo,
atk-s0305a:898_2: kena sattā uppāditā, kena pabbatā, kena ambatālanāḷikerādayo”ti evarūpaṃ lokacintaṃ cintento nisīdi.
atk-s0305a:899_0: Vicetoti vigatacitto vikkhittacitto vā. Bhūtaṃyeva addasāti te kira asurā sambarimāyaṃ
atk-s0305a:899_1: samparivattetvā yathā ne so puriso hatthiassādīsu āruhante ukkhipitvā, bhisamuḷālacchiddehi
atk-s0305a:899_2: pavisante passati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsu. Taṃ sandhāya satthā “bhūtaṃyeva addasā”ti
atk-s0305a:899_3: āha. Devānaṃyeva mohayamānāti devānaṃ cittaṃ mohayantā. Tasmāti yasmā lokacintaṃ
atk-s0305a:901: 1112-13. Dutiye paṭibhānakūṭoti eko mahanto pabbatasadiso mariyādapāsāṇo. Tatiye aniṭṭharūpanti aniṭṭhasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0305a:903: 1114. Catutthe heṭṭhimaṃ gharaṃ akaritvāti thambhabhittipādussāpanādinā gharassa heṭṭhimabhāgaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0305a:905_0: 1115. Pañcame santhāgāreti sippuggaṇhanasālāyaṃ. Upāsanaṃ karonteti kaṇḍakhipanasippaṃ
atk-s0305a:905_1: karonte. Asanaṃ atipātenteti kaṇḍaṃ atikkamente. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti ekaṃ kaṇḍaṃ khipitvā
atk-s0305a:905_2: yathā assa sarassa poṅkhaṃ vijjhati, aparaṃ anupoṅkhaṃ nāma dutiyassa poṅkhaṃ, puna
atk-s0305a:905_3: aparaṃ tassa poṅkhanti evaṃ atipātente addasa. Yatra hi nāmāti ye nāma. Durabhisambhavataranti
atk-s0305a:905_4: dukkarataraṃ. Sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti ekaṃ vālaṃ
atk-s0305a:905_5: sattadhā bhinditvā, tassa ekaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā, vātiṅgaṇamajjhe bandhitvā, aparaṃ
atk-s0305a:905_6: bhedaṃ kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiyaṃ bandhitvā, usabhamatte ṭhito kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyā taṃ
atk-s0305a:905_7: vātiṅgaṇabaddhakoṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā evaṃ duppaṭivijjhāni cattāri saccāni, tasmā.
atk-s0305a:907: 1117. Sattame aññamaññakhādikāti aññamaññaṃ khādanaṃ. Dubbalakhādikāti balavantehi macchādīhi dubbalānaṃ macchādīnaṃ khādanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:909_0: 1118. Aṭṭhame mahāpathavīti cakkavāḷagabbhantarā mahāpathavī. Adhiccamidaṃ, bhanteti
atk-s0305a:909_1: idaṃ adhiccuppattikaṃ sace taṃ yugaṃ na pūti bhaveyya, samudde udakaṃ na susseyya,
atk-s0305a:909_2: so ca kacchapo na mareyya, api nāma yadicchāvasena siyāti attho.
atk-s0305a:910_0: Evaṃ adhiccamidaṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha mahāsīvatthero cattāri yugāni dasseti – puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0305a:910_1: ṭhitena purisena pakkhittayugassa hi chiggaḷena tassa andhakacchapassa gīvāya pavesanaṃ
atk-s0305a:910_2: viya manussapaṭilābho adhiccapaṭilābhī. Dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhitena pakkhittassa
atk-s0305a:910_3: pana paribbhamantassa purimayugaṃ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari āruḷhassa chiggaḷena
atk-s0305a:910_5: ṭhitena pakkhittassa pana paribbhamantassa purimayugadvayaṃ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari
atk-s0305a:910_6: āruḷhassa chiggaḷena gīvappavesanaṃ viya tathāgatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa dīpanaṃ
atk-s0305a:910_7: adhiccatarasambhavaṃ. Uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhitena pakkhittassa pana paribbhamantassa
atk-s0305a:910_8: purimayugattayaṃ patvā chiggaḷena chiggaḷupari āruḷhassa chiggaḷena gīvappavesanaṃ
atk-s0305a:910_9: viya catusaccapaṭivedho ativiya adhiccatarasambhavo veditabbo. Navamādīni abhisamayasaṃyutte vuttanayānevāti.
atk-s0305a:916: 1133. Āmakadhaññapeyyāle ariyena paññācakkhunāti vipassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā lokiyalokuttarena ñāṇacakkhunā.
atk-s0305a:918_0: 1134. Surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratāti ettha surā nāma piṭṭhasurā, odanasurā,
atk-s0305a:918_1: pūvasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañcavidhā. Merayaṃ nāma pupphāsavo,
atk-s0305a:918_2: phalāsavoti, evaṃ vutto yo koci āsavo. Majjanti tadeva ubhayaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi
atk-s0305a:918_3: surāsavavinimuttaṃ madanīyaṃ. Yāya cetanāya taṃ pivanti, sā pamādassa kāraṇattā pamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:920: 1136-37. Matteyyāti mātuhitā, mātari sammāpaṭipannāti attho. Petteyyādīsu pituhitā petteyyā.
atk-s0305a:922: 1138-39. Samaṇānaṃ hitā sāmaññā. Brāhmaṇānaṃ hitā brahmaññā. Tesu tesu sammā paṭipannānaṃyevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:924: 1140. Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyinoti kule jeṭṭhānaṃ apacāyino, nīcavuttinoti attho.
atk-s0305a:927_1: bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa
atk-s0305a:927_2: ca samārambhā, chedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a:929: 1149. Vikālabhojanāti kālātikkantabhojanā, majjhanhikātikkamato paṭṭhāya yāvakālikaparibhogāti attho.
atk-s0305a:931_0: 1150. Mālādīsu mālāti yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti
atk-s0305a:931_1: chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Tattha piḷandhantā dhārenti nāma, ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrentā maṇḍenti nāma,
atk-s0305a:931_2: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyantā vibhūsenti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0305a:931_3: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a:934_0: 1151. Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā
atk-s0305a:934_1: naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenāpi
atk-s0305a:934_2: pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni
atk-s0305a:934_3: hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0305a:936: 1152. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇaṃ, tato paṭiviratāti attho.
atk-s0305a:938_0: 1153. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo – lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti
atk-s0305a:938_1: ye vohāraṃ gacchanti, tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratā. Neva naṃ uggaṇhanti
atk-s0305a:938_2: na uggaṇhāpenti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyantīti attho.
atk-s0305a:940_1: sattavidhassāpi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva,
atk-s0305a:942: 1155. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra uddissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:944: 1156. Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha itthīti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva.
atk-s0305a:946: 1157. Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, “kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:949_1: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0305a:949_2: Yattha vā ubhayaṃ ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena
atk-s0305a:951_0: 1162-63. Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ, gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:951_1: vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ. Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa
atk-s0305a:951_2: khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā dūteyyapahiṇagamanānuyogāti
atk-s0305a:953_0: 1164. Tulākūṭādīsu kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ,
atk-s0305a:953_1: gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā
atk-s0305a:953_2: samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0305a:953_3: gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-s0305a:953_4: gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:953_5: anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
atk-s0305a:954_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:954_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Tato janapadaṃ gantvā, kiñcideva
atk-s0305a:954_2: aḍḍhakulaṃ pavisitvā, “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā, agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ
atk-s0305a:954_3: dātukāmā honti, tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0305a:954_4: gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:955_0: Mānakūṭaṃ hadayabheda-sikhābheda-rajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-s0305a:955_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti
atk-s0305a:955_2: vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0305a:955_3: deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ
atk-s0305a:955_4: ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena sikhaṃ bhindanto deti. Rajjubhedo khettavatthuminanakāle
atk-s0305a:955_5: labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantaṃ mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0305a:957_0: 1165. Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi
atk-s0305a:957_1: tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃvatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-s0305a:957_2: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto “kiṃ, bho, migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti?, Āha.
atk-s0305a:957_3: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā, migapotakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0305a:957_4: thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me, bho, migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena
atk-s0305a:957_5: hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. Nanu, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinnoti. Āma dinnoti.
atk-s0305a:957_6: Imampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo, ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti
atk-s0305a:957_7: dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0305a:958_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti amaṇiṃ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:958_1: suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo. Etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ
atk-s0305a:958_2: nāmaṃ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogā vañcanasāciyogā nikatisāciyogāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:958_3: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti. Taṃ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:960_0: 1166-71. Chedanādīsu chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti maraṇaṃ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-s0305a:960_1: bandhanaṃ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yaṃ himapātasamaye
atk-s0305a:960_2: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggapaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ
atk-s0305a:961_0: Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ vilopakaraṇaṃ. Sahasākāroti sāhasakiriyā, gehaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0305a:961_1: manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā, icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedanavadhabandhanaviparāmosaālopasahasākārā
atk-s0305a:979: Yaṃ puññamupacitaṃ tena hotu sabbo sukhī loko.
atk-s0305a:983: Yaṃ samadhigataṃ puññaṃ tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū”ti.
atk-s0305a:984_6: therena katā ayaṃ sāratthappakāsinī nāma saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathā.
